column2: move that blue bowl closer to the pot of boiling water . pull noodles from the blue bowl with your hands . place noodles carefully in the boiling water so you do n't get splashed . hold long wooden spoon and keep stirring until i say stop . i will pick up the hot noodles and pour the heavy noodle pot into a strainer to drain water out .

column1: place the egg noodles into a bowl and separate .
column2: take the fresh egg noodles out of the packaging . put the egg noodles in a strainer . use your fingers to gently take the noodles apart to loosen each bundle . use kitchen scissors cut the noodles into shorter pieces .

column1: place the egg noodles into a bowl and separate .
column2: take three bunches of egg noodles out of their package and place the noodles into a big bowl . pick up one bunch of noodles at a time and pull the noodles apart , then do the same with the other two bundles . after you have unraveled all three bunches use a pair of kitchen scissors to cut the noodles shorter . pick up a bunch of noodles at a time with your hand and cut them shorter with the scissors . ask a parent for help using the scissors . cutting the noodles shorter makes them easier to cook and easier to eat .

column1: place the egg noodles into a bowl and separate .
column2: take a large bowl . add three packets of egg noodles in to the bowl . separate the egg noodles in the bowl . now repeat the same with other two egg noodles . mix them properly .

column1: add oil and noodles to a pan and stir .
column2: make sure the wok is heated over medium heat . use a measuring spoon and put 2 tablespoons of oil in the wok . place the noodles on the hot wok . do n't put too many noodles in the wok or they will stick . if your wok is small you have to make it in batches . stir fry noodles for 6 to 7 minutes making sure you are stirring them .

column1: add oil and noodles to a pan and stir .
column2: pour oil into a pan in circles . use your hands and spread noodles all over the pan evenly . stir with a wooden spoon .

column1: add oil and noodles to a pan and stir .
column2: put the wok onto the stove over medium - high heat . using a measuring spoon add two tablespoons of oil to the wok . add the noodles to the wok and spread them out as much as possible . if you have a smaller wok you may want to stir fry the noodles in more than one batch so they do not clump together . using two wooden spatulas toss and spread out the noodles as you cook them so that they do not clump together , stir fry noodles for about 6 - 7 minutes .

column1: cut garlic carrots celery onion and bok choy into thin slices .
column2: cut garlic in to small pieces . cut the carrots in to long thin slices . cut celery in to long thin slices . cut the onion in to long thin slices . cut the bok choy in to small pieces .

column1: cut garlic carrots celery onion and bok choy into thin slices .
column2: put the garlic on a cutting board and use the side of the knife to smash . remove the skin from the garlic and chop into very small piece . cut the carrots into thin slices at a slight angle , and then into thin strips . cut the celery into 2 inch sections , then into thin strips and onions into thin slices . cut the boy choy stems into thin strips and the leaves into a rough chop .

column1: cut garlic carrots celery onion and bok choy into thin slices .
column2: get a cutting board . get a knife from the cutting block . smash the garlic and remove the skin and mince into small pieces . cut the carrot into 2 inch sections and cut then into thin slices and then into thin strips cut the celery into 2 inch sections and then cut each section into thin strips . cut the onions in half from the root end , remove the skin and cut it into thin slices . for the bok choy , cut the leafy parts and cut the stems in 2 inch sections and cut into thin strips . cut the leafy parts into half an roughly chop the leaves .

column1: put chickpeas parsley chopped onion chili powder ground cumin in food processor .
column2: add the chickpeas to the mixer . add a little bit of parsley . carefully cut up an onion and add it to the mix . add one teaspoon of chili powder . then put in one teaspoon of ground cumin .

column1: put chickpeas parsley chopped onion chili powder ground cumin in food processor .
column2: tear apart the parsley some while putting it in the food processor . crush the garlic with the flat part of the knife . peel the onion before and cut in half before chopping it . chop the onion by cutting it into small pieces .

column1: put chickpeas parsley chopped onion chili powder ground cumin in food processor .
column2: add a can of chickpeas to the processor bowl . next add coriander and parsley to the bowl . next add some garlic and cut up some onion and add to the bowl .. . then add chili powder to bowl . lastly , add some ground cumin to the bowl .

column1: squeeze some lime juice to it and add some olive oil .
column2: cut the lime in half . squeeze as much of the liquid out of your lime into the bowl . add a few tablespoons of the sesame oil to your bowl . now you are going to need some flower because you added the liquid to the chickpeas .

column1: squeeze some lime juice to it and add some olive oil .
column2: hold and squeeze the limes in your hand to get the juice out over the bowl . pour in some olive oil .

column1: squeeze some lime juice to it and add some olive oil .
column2: squeeze two halves lime juice to the processor bowl . and then add sesame oil to the processor .

column1: add some flour and blend everything .
column2: add two tablespoons of plain flour . then blend it up . this makes it easier to mold .

column1: add some flour and blend everything .
column2: we want to take 2 tablespoons of plain flower and add it to our mixing bowl . just slowly pour it in there . now take the lid and place it over your dish . you then want to blind the mixture slowly with small bursts from the blender .

column1: add some flour and blend everything .
column2: put in 2 tablespoons of flour . put the lid on the blender . blend the mixture .

column1: add ground pepper salt and blend again .
column2: place the mixture into a blender . add a little bit of salt and pepper ; about half a teaspoon of each . turn the blender on and blend it up .

column1: add ground pepper salt and blend again .
column2: open the food processor and add a little bit of salt and pepper . add a little bit of both and taste to see if it needs more salt or pepper . once you are done put the lid back on and turn on the food processor to mix everything together .

column1: add ground pepper salt and blend again .
column2: add ground salt and pepper to the container . turn on the food processor .

column1: shape the mixture into balls .
column2: take a handful of the mixture and gently squeeze it in your hand to form a ball . place balls of mixture onto your cutting board .

column1: shape the mixture into balls .
column2: reach into the bowl and grab some of the mixture . squeeze them into your fist . roll in your palm and make into a ball .

column1: shape the mixture into balls .
column2: wet your hands . take out some mix and roll with your hands into balls .

column1: place the falafel in a pan .
column2: after you have heated the oil in the frying pan , slowly place the falafel in the pan . use tongs to do this so you do n't burn your hands . if the falafel is packed tightly they should stay in the same shape as they cook . you should have the heat high enough on the oven so you hear a little sizzle while they cook .

column1: place the falafel in a pan .
column2: be sure the balls are tight enough that they will keep their shape . place the balls on the hot oiled pan .

column1: place the falafel in a pan .
column2: when the pan and oil are hot add the falafel to the pan carefully . let them cook . they should stay round .

column1: add oil and spices to a pan .
column2: put 1 tablespoon of oil into the pan . add spices to the pan . cook the spices in the pan for about 30 seconds , while using a wooden spatula to stir .

column1: add oil and spices to a pan .
column2: step one preheat a pan on the stove . step two add a tablespoon of oil to the pan . step three add all your spices to the pan . step four fry for 30 seconds .

column1: add oil and spices to a pan .
column2: gather the oil and spices that you will need . open the oil and pour into the pan . open the spices and use teaspoon or tablespoon ( whichever is mentioned ) to pour into the pan . carefully , with a long handled spoon , stir the oil and spices .

column1: add the chopped onions the pan .
column2: pour the chopped onion into the pan . using a spatula , stir the onions until they turn light brown .

column1: add the chopped onions the pan .
column2: add the bowl of chopped onion into the pan . cook the onion for about 3 - 4 minutes until the onion turns brown .

column1: add the chopped onions the pan .
column2: pour in chopped onions . stir occasionally while cooking .

column1: add sliced onions to a pan .
column2: turn on the stove and place a pan to be heated . into heated pan , add 2 tablespoons of oil . add sliced onions to the pan . cook on medium heat . cook gently until they turn brown .

column1: add sliced onions to a pan .
column2: heat 2 tablespoons of oil in the pan on medium - low heat . put in the sliced onions into the pan . stir the onions carefully with a spoon until they are a light brown color .

column1: add sliced onions to a pan .
column2: use a pan and heat 2 tablespoons of oil on the stove . use a spoon to add the sliced onions to the heated pan with oil . use the spoon to move the onions around in the pan as they cook slowly at a medium - low heat until they are caramelized . caramelized onions will be slightly brown and soft .

column1: add the chilies and tomatoes to the pan of diced onions .
column2: put some chilies and tomatoes in with the diced onions in the hot pan . stir , cook for about 10 minutes .

column1: add the chilies and tomatoes to the pan of diced onions .
column2: add green chili and tomatoes to the pan . cook for about ten minutes to reduce the tomatoes . ( reduce means to cook down an item to make it soft or smaller in size . ) .

column1: add the chilies and tomatoes to the pan of diced onions .
column2: first cook the cut up onions until they start to brown . next add green chilies to the pan . then add cut up tomatoes to the pan . cook for 10 minutes to reduce the tomatoes .

column1: add yogurt and vegetables to the pan .
column2: take the yogurt in to a bowl . add the yogurt in to the pan . cut the vegetables in to small pieces . add the vegetables in to the pan . mix everything with the spoon .

column1: add yogurt and vegetables to the pan .
column2: add yogurt and vegetables to the pan . stir .

column1: add yogurt and vegetables to the pan .
column2: slowly pour yogurt into pan , stirring after every 1/4 of cup added . add pre cut vegetables to pan .

column1: place the rice in the pot .
column2: with a plastic or wooden spoon , place 1/3 of the total rice inside of the bottom of the pan . make sure the rice covers all the surface at the bottom .

column1: place the rice in the pot .
column2: use a large spoon or ladle . scoop 1/3 of mixture into bottom of pot .

column1: place the rice in the pot .
column2: use a spoon . spoon rice into a pot .

column1: layer the vegetables and rice on top .
column2: get a large pot and place it on an even surface . pour in about half of the rice , ( enough to evenly cover the bottom of the pot . pour half of the vegetables over the rice and even them out with a large spoon . evenly cover the vegetables with half of the remaining rice , and then pour in the rest of the vegetables evenly . finally , cover the vegetables with the remaining rice .

column1: layer the vegetables and rice on top .
column2: put some cooked rice into bottom of pan and use a spoon to spread with a spoon . put the cooked vegetables on top or rice and spread using a spoon . keep doing this until all rice and vegetables are used .

column1: layer the vegetables and rice on top .
column2: first line the pot with rice . then add vegetables to the top of the rice and spread around . next add half of the remaining rice . then again add vegetables and spread around . add the rest of the rice on top .

column1: sprinkle saffron water on top .
column2: using two fingers , hold container of saffron water over rice . using a light shaking motion , sprinkle the water over top of the rice . once you sprinkle the saffron water , cover pot with lid .

column1: sprinkle saffron water on top .
column2: take a pot on the stove . take rice in the pot . take a small bowl with water . add some saffron in to the water . add saffron water in to the rice in pot .

column1: sprinkle saffron water on top .
column2: pour a few drops of the saffron water over the top of the rice . do n't pour too much .

column1: add chopped shallots garlic parsley walnut salt pepper and the juice of one lemon to a bowl .
column2: take a medium sized bowl . cut shallots , garlic and walnut in to very small pieces . add cut pieces of shallots and garlic in to the bowl . add cut parsley and walnuts in to the bowl . squeeze half a lemon in to the bowl and mix with a spoon .

column1: add chopped shallots garlic parsley walnut salt pepper and the juice of one lemon to a bowl .
column2: add chopped shallots to the bowl . then add chopped parsley to the same bowl . add chopped parsley to the bowl as well . add chopped walnuts . add a little salt and pepper , and then the juice of one lemon . mix all with a fork .

column1: add chopped shallots garlic parsley walnut salt pepper and the juice of one lemon to a bowl .
column2: first add chopped shallots to bowl . then add garlic to the mixture along . next add some parsley , walnuts , and salt and pepper to the mixture . add the last ingredient of lemon juice to the bowl . mix all the ingredients together .

column1: flatten the batter between two layers of baking paper and place on ice to harden .
column2: put the batter on baking paper . cover the batter with another layer of baking paper . using a rolling pin , push it over the baking paper to make the batter flat . put the flattered batter into ice water to harden it .

column1: flatten the batter between two layers of baking paper and place on ice to harden .
column2: place the batter between two layers of baking paper . roll over the paper the surrounds the batter with a rolling pin . spread it out until it looks pretty flat . while it 's still in the paper , place it over ice so it starts to harden .

column1: flatten the batter between two layers of baking paper and place on ice to harden .
column2: get 2 sheets of baking paper . put your mixture on one piece of the baking paper . lay the other piece of baking paper on top of the mixture . get your rolling pin and roll the mixture out in a thin rectangle shape . leave the mixture between the paper and lay it on ice to harden .

column1: pour cream into a pan of cooked spinach .
column2: cook 1 cup of cooked spinach in skillet . next mix a little cream into the spinach .

column1: pour cream into a pan of cooked spinach .
column2: get your cup of cream . pour the cream into the pan of cooked spinach . stir the ingredients in the pan together .

column1: pour cream into a pan of cooked spinach .
column2: pour some of the cream into the pan that has the cooked spinach in it . using a spoon , stir it up well .

column1: place the spinach onto a plate and add the snails .
column2: spoon the spinach onto the plate . add 12 snails to the top of the spinach .

column1: place the spinach onto a plate and add the snails .
column2: add a little bit of spinach to 4 dishes . add some cooked snails on top of each one .

column1: place the spinach onto a plate and add the snails .
column2: use a spoon to place two or three spoon fulls of the spinach mixture into the center of four dishes . use a spoon to place 12 snails on top of the spinach on all four plates .

column1: cover the snails with the butter and breadcrumbs and place in the oven .
column2: first spread butter over the snails . next place breadcrumbs over the dish . then bake in a hot oven for 5 minutes .

column1: cover the snails with the butter and breadcrumbs and place in the oven .
column2: put a slice of the hardened butter mixture on top of the snails . sprinkle enough bread crumbs to cover the butter mixture . put the individual dishes on a baking sheet . put on oven mitts and put them in a hot oven . bake for 5 minutes .

column1: add lemon juice crushed garlic grated parmesan salt and pepper to a bowl with butter milk and stir .
column2: pour lemon juice into the bowl . smash the garlic with your garlic press and add the garlic to the bowl . add grated parmesan to the bowl . sprinkle salt and pepper into the bowl . stir the stuff in the bowl with your whisk .

column1: add lemon juice crushed garlic grated parmesan salt and pepper to a bowl with butter milk and stir .
column2: squeeze one lemon in to juice in to the bowl . crush the garlic in to pieces and add in to the bowl . add parmesan cheese in to the bowl . add salt and pepper in to the bowl with butter milk . stir everything properly .

column1: add lemon juice crushed garlic grated parmesan salt and pepper to a bowl with butter milk and stir .
column2: add 1 1/2 cups of buttermilk to bowl . then add 2 tablespoons of lemon juice . then add 1 diced clove of garlic . then add 1/4 cup of grated parmesan cheese and salt and pepper . mix all ingredients together .

column1: pour some of it into a cup and put the rest into a bag with chicken .
column2: pour a 1/2 of cup of the mixture into a measuring cup for later . next pour the rest of the mixture over three chicken breasts in a ziplock bag . put into refrigerator .

column1: pour some of it into a cup and put the rest into a bag with chicken .
column2: use a measuring cup to measure out 1/2 cup of the mixture for your dressing . get a bag that can be sealed and put three boneless skinless chicken breasts in it . in the same bag as your chicken , add the rest of your mixture and seal it up tight .

column1: pour some of it into a cup and put the rest into a bag with chicken .
column2: save half of the marinade into a cup to use later . then take the bag with the chicken in it and you 're going to pour the rest of the marinade you did n't use in there .

column1: brush two slices of bread with oil top with salt and broil .
column2: take two slices of bread . brush them with oil . sprinkle with salt . " place in oven on broil " " setting " " . "

column1: brush two slices of bread with oil top with salt and broil .
column2: take two slices of bread on a baking tray . add oil on the bread with brush . take some salt in a small bowl . sprinkle some salt on top of bread slices . broil them till they are golden brown .

column1: brush two slices of bread with oil top with salt and broil .
column2: use a kitchen brush to spread olive oil on one side of 2 slices of bread . preheat the oven on the broil setting . place the bread on an oven sheet and place in the oven when it is finished preheating . watch the bread carefully ( this will happen quickly ) and pull out when the bread has toasted to a golden - brown color . when the bread cools , cut the pieces of bread into small squares .

column1: take chicken out of the bag place onto the pan and cook in the oven .
column2: take your chicken out of the bag . be careful to let as much of the sauce drip back into the bag . place the chicken onto your baking sheet that has foil on it . make sure your oven is already set to broil . leave it in the oven for 13 to 15 minutes .

column1: take chicken out of the bag place onto the pan and cook in the oven .
column2: open bag and take out chicken with tongs . hold chicken with tongs and let drain into bag . place on foil covered baking sheet . preheat the broiler setting by pressing the broil button until hot enough . cook for 13 - 15 minutes .

column1: take chicken out of the bag place onto the pan and cook in the oven .
column2: use tongs take chicken out of the bag . put your chicken onto your pan .

column1: in a bowl mix together mayonnaise and the rest of the marinade .
column2: get a bowl and put the mayonnaise in . then take the rest of the marinade that you have made . pour the marinade into the bowl with the mayonnaise . then use the whisk to mix the mayonnaise and the marinade together .

column1: in a bowl mix together mayonnaise and the rest of the marinade .
column2: in a medium bowl put 1/4 cup mayonnaise . pour reserved buttermilk marinade with cheese into bowl with mayonnaise . stir with a whisk to mix .

column1: in a bowl mix together mayonnaise and the rest of the marinade .
column2: get a large bowl . put one quarter cup of light mayonnaise . add your buttermilk . mix your ingredients with a whip . this is a wonderful dressing for your caesar salad .

column1: cut the lettuce into pieces and place in a bowl .
column2: use one hand to hold the lettuce . use your other hand to hold the knife . use your knife to cut the lettuce into pieces . put your lettuce pieces in the bowl .

column1: cut the lettuce into pieces and place in a bowl .
column2: chop the lettuce on its side till it is in several pieces . pick up lettuce and place inside bowl .

column1: cut the lettuce into pieces and place in a bowl .
column2: cut the lettuce up with a sharp knife . put the lettuce in the bowl .

column1: add the lettuce and radicchio to bowl with the dressing and mix together .
column2: take a large bowl for mixing the salad . cut the lettuce in to small pieces . add the lettuce in to the salad bowl . cut radicchio in to small pieces and add it in to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

column1: add the lettuce and radicchio to bowl with the dressing and mix together .
column2: add chopped lettuce and radicchio to your dressing . mix together well so that the dressing coats all of the vegetables .

column1: add the lettuce and radicchio to bowl with the dressing and mix together .
column2: put the romaine lettuce into the bowl with the dressing . next add the radicchio to the bowl . mix the lettuce and radicchio into the dressing until covered .

column1: cut the cooked chicken and toasted bread and toss into the salad .
column2: cut the cooked chicken into small pieces using a knife .. . place the cut up chicken into the bowl with the salad . cut the bread into small pieces like a crouton using a knife . add it to the bowl with the chicken and salad . mix the salad , chicken and croutons together using tongs .

column1: cut the cooked chicken and toasted bread and toss into the salad .
column2: use a sharp knife to cut the chicken into pieces . put the cut chicken into the salad bowl . cut the bread into small squares and add to salad bowl . toss everything together with dressing .

column1: cut the cooked chicken and toasted bread and toss into the salad .
column2: take the cooked chicken on a cutting board . cut the cooked chicken in to thin slices . cut the toasted bread in to small pieces . add the toasted bread and chicken pieces in to the salad bowl . mix everything in the bowl with a spatula .

column1: pour drained liquid from tinned beans and chickpeas to a bowl .
column2: open the cans of beans and chickpeas and pour the liquid into a bowl . you can use the lid to hold the beans and peas in the can while pouring the liquid out .

column1: pour drained liquid from tinned beans and chickpeas to a bowl .
column2: open the can part of the way . pour the juice out of the can into a bowl .

column1: pour drained liquid from tinned beans and chickpeas to a bowl .
column2: open the can by flipping the tab on top and pulling back the lid a little bit . do n't pull the lid off all the way . pour the liquid out of opening at the top of the can , but keep the chickpeas in the can .

column1: put the beans and chickpeas in a food processor .
column2: drain the chick peas and beans by pouring off the liquid from the can . put chick peas and beans in the food processor . take out a few chick peas to save for decorating later .

column1: put the beans and chickpeas in a food processor .
column2: plug up food processor with take top off . pull back top of beans and chickpeas cans halfway . hold can upside down over a bowl to drain . take out a small amount by hand for use later .

column1: put the beans and chickpeas in a food processor .
column2: put a can of chickpeas into a food processor . drain all the water out of a can of beans . pour the beans into the food processor . put a few of the chickpeas aside to be used for decorating the bowl later on .

column1: add 2 cloves of garlic lemon juice tahini salt and pepper to the food processor .
column2: put in 4 cloves in the food processor . add juice of one squeezed lemon . put in two teaspoons of tahini . add one teaspoon of cumin seed which is a seasoning in your moms cupboard . add a teaspoon of pepper and sea salt .

column1: add 2 cloves of garlic lemon juice tahini salt and pepper to the food processor .
column2: get 2 little parts of the big garlic head . get some lemon juice from the squeezy yellow lemon in the refrigerator . put the garlic and the lemon in the food processor . add 2 tablespoons of ground sesame seeds to the food processor . put in 1 teaspoon of cumin , and add pepper and flaky salt too .

column1: add 2 cloves of garlic lemon juice tahini salt and pepper to the food processor .
column2: add 2 large cloves or 4 medium sized cloves . add the juice of 1 lemon . add 2 tablespoons of tahini . add 1 teaspoon of ground cumin seeds . add salt and pepper to taste .

column1: add the liquid to the food processor .
column2: put about a half of a cup of liquid into the food processor . use a measuring cup to measure the liquid .

column1: add the liquid to the food processor .
column2: grab your bowl of the liquid . use a measuring spoon to measure half a cup of the liquid . add the half cup of the liquid into the food processor .

column1: add the liquid to the food processor .
column2: take a food processor with beans in it . take the liquid in a medium sized bowl . take a measuring spoon . add about 2 spoons of liquid in to the food processor . mix the liquid with the contents in the food processor .

column1: blend everything in the food processor .
column2: get a grown up to help you . plug in the food processor . open the lid and put in your ingredients . do not remove the lid while you are pushing the start button . process until the mixture looks smooth or your grown up says to stop .

column1: blend everything in the food processor .
column2: plug in food processor . gather all ingredients . chop up ingredients if they need to be smaller . place ingredients in food processor . turn and blend .

column1: blend everything in the food processor .
column2: put all the food together . place it inside the food processor careful to not touch the blade . once the food is in the food processor place lid on top and turn to the right to make sure it is closed . push the button to turn the food processor on . watch as the food blends together . once it looks like liquid milk it is finished turn off the food processor .

column1: peel the potatoes and cut them .
column2: start by using a potato peeler and peeling all the skin off of 5 pounds of potatoes . cut them in half and then cut the halves into half .

column1: peel the potatoes and cut them .
column2: peel the potatoes . cut them into small pieces .

column1: peel the potatoes and cut them .
column2: use a vegetable peeler to carefully remove the skin from the potatoes . start with the vegetable peeler at the top of the potato , then , using slight pressure , drag the vegetable peeler towards yourself . cut each potato in half , then cut each half in half again - turning each potato into four sections .

column1: put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water add some salt and bring the water to boil .
column2: cut the potatoes in to inch sized pieces . add the potatoes in to the pot . add cold water in to the pot . add some salt in to the water . bring the water to boil .

column1: put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water add some salt and bring the water to boil .
column2: put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water . add a couple of tablespoons of salt to the pot with the potatoes .

column1: put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water add some salt and bring the water to boil .
column2: with a knife peel several potatoes and cut into bite size chunks . place the potatoes in a large pan and pour cold water into the pan until the potatoes are covered . add salt to the pan . place the pan on the eye of the stove and turn the eye to high . wait for the water to start bubbling up .

column1: boil the potatoes .
column2: make the water get hot and begin to bubble a little . then turn temperature on the stove top to medium . let the potatoes stay in the pot for 10 to 12 minutes until they are hard and firm .

column1: boil the potatoes .
column2: take a big pot on a stove . add water in to the pot and boil . cut the potatoes in to inch shaped pieces . add the potatoes to the boiling water . boil the potatoes .

column1: boil the potatoes .
column2: place the potatoes into the pot and heat the water in the pot until it begins to bubble . lower the heat on the stove by turning the dial on the stove down . place a top onto the pot to trap the heat inside and cook the potatoes between 10 and 15 minutes . the potatoes should be tender but firm at the end .

column1: chop the garlic .
column2: while potatoes cook . cut the garlic into small pieces .

column1: chop the garlic .
column2: while the potatoes are cooking chop three or four cloves of garlic . be sure to peel the skins from the garlic before chopping . roughly chop the cloves of garlic with a knife .

column1: chop the garlic .
column2: while the potatoes are cooking start to prepare the garlic . use a sharp knife to chop up 3 to 4 cloves of garlic .

column1: drain the potatoes and return them to the pot .
column2: when the potatoes have cooked until you can poke a fork through , place a strainer in the sink . use a pot holder to pick up the hot pan . pour the hot water and potatoes into the strainer . when all water is gone from the pot and potatoes , put them back into the pot .

column1: drain the potatoes and return them to the pot .
column2: remove all water from the potatoes by pouring into a strainer . pour the drained potatoes back into the pot .

column1: drain the potatoes and return them to the pot .
column2: boil water in a pot . once the water is boiling put the potatoes in the pot and let cook until soft . drain the water out of the pot into a steel strainer . when the water is all drained out return the potatoes to the pot .

column1: add butter grated parmesan cheese chopped chives cream cheese and minced garlic .
column2: put a half a cup of softened butter into the potatoes . add two cups of grated parmesan cheese , 1 cup of chives . then 1 and a half cups of cream cheese and minced ( cut into small pieces ) garlic . use a potato masher to mash .

column1: add butter grated parmesan cheese chopped chives cream cheese and minced garlic .
column2: first add some room temperature butter in the amount of 1/2 cup . just drop it onto the potatoes . we will mix it in later . now add these ingredients into the bowl in the exact same way . 2 cups of graded parmesan cheese . 1 cup of chives and 1 and a half cup of creamed cheese . now pour your and the minced garlic .

column1: add butter grated parmesan cheese chopped chives cream cheese and minced garlic .
column2: take a pot and add potatoes pieces . add one block of butter in to the bowl . add one cup of parmesan cheese in to the bowl . add the cut pieces of chives and cut pieces of garlic in to the bowl . add about one and half blocks of cream cheese in to the bowl .

column1: mash the potatoes .
column2: take your potato masher , and start pressing it down into your pot full of potatoes . do this quickly , that way your able to make sure the potatoes stay warm and do n't go cold . just keep mashing until the mixture becomes smooth .

column1: mash the potatoes .
column2: once the potatoes are cooked . open the lid . take a potato masher . mash the potatoes properly .

column1: mash the potatoes .
column2: get potato masher . push down until you hit the bottom of the pot . lift masher . repeat until smooth .

column1: season with salt and pepper to taste and mash .
column2: take a large bowl . add boiled potatoes in to the bowl . mash the potatoes with a masher . add some salt in to the bowl . add pepper powder and mix them in the bowl .

column1: season with salt and pepper to taste and mash .
column2: take a pinch of salt and a pinch of pepper and add it to your potatoes . with a potato masher , smush the potatoes .

column1: season with salt and pepper to taste and mash .
column2: add salt to the mashed potatoes . add as much pepper as you think it needs . mix in the salt and pepper by mashing some more .

column1: garnish with pepper and chives .
column2: sprinkle with pepper and chives . serve in a bowl . put up to keep cool overnight . add more pepper and chives .

column1: garnish with pepper and chives .
column2: grab a pinch of pepper and sprinkle over potatoes . grab a pinch of chives and sprinkle over potatoes .

column1: garnish with pepper and chives .
column2: sprinkle some pepper on top . sprinkle a little bit of green chives on top .

column1: stretch out the dough .
column2: make the dough with the help of flour . stretch the dough . make it big with our hands into large shape .

column1: stretch out the dough .
column2: have a clean surface that has been floured . use about a quarter of a cup of flour to start . take the dough and using your hands , start to flatten the dough from the middle of the sphere , working your way out to the outer edges . as you stretch the dough , turn it over so the other side is also floured . work the sphere along the edge to spread out the dough and continue to stretch it until the dough is about twelve inches . the stretching motion will be done across the surface of the sphere , continue to rotate the sphere to thin out the thick areas . you will use the base of your palms as you stretch and flatten the dough , not just your fingertips .

column1: stretch out the dough .
column2: take a medium sized ball of dough . stretch the dough with the hands . press the dough with the finger tips . roll the dough with the hands in a circle . stretch the dough in to uniform thickness .

column1: season the pizza with sea salt and basil .
column2: take a pinch of sea salt in fingers . sprinkle in a circular motion around the pizza . pick some of the fresh basil leaves . place leaves around the pizza .

column1: season the pizza with sea salt and basil .
column2: use your fingers to grab a pinch of sea salt . sprinkle the sea salt on your pizza in a circle . grab some basil leaves and place them evenly around the pizza . you want to make sure every slice will have some on it .

column1: season the pizza with sea salt and basil .
column2: sprinkle sea salt all around the pizza . tear some basil leaves and make pattern on pizza .

column1: pour some olive oil on top and bake the pizza in an oven .
column2: pour some olive oil on top of the pizza . use the pizza peel to place the pizza in the oven . the pizza will bake for about 90 seconds .

column1: pour some olive oil on top and bake the pizza in an oven .
column2: take the prepared ingredients on a plate . take olive oil in a jar . add some olive oil on top of ingredients . transfer the pizza in to the oven . bake the pizza in the oven .

column1: pour some olive oil on top and bake the pizza in an oven .
column2: pour enough olive oil to lightly cover the pizza onto the pizza , in a circular motion . take the peel , a large and flat metal spatula , and slide it under the pizza . move the pizza with the peel over to the oven . slide the pizza onto the ovens shelf .

column1: put some mozzarella cheese on the pizza .
column2: pinch the ball of mozzarella cheese and pull tiny pieces of it off . add the pinched pieces of cheese on the pizza covering it evenly .

column1: put some mozzarella cheese on the pizza .
column2: flatten dough . roll dough out to large circle . spoon sauce onto dough . spread sauce over to near edge of dough . add small pieces of mozzarella cheese to dough .

column1: put some mozzarella cheese on the pizza .
column2: ladle some sauce onto the pizza crust . spread the sauce out evenly , leaving only the edges bare . pinch off pieces of fresh mozzarella cheese . place the cheese all over the pizza crust . it does n't have to cover the entire pizza , because it will melt and spread when you bake it . use up the entire amount of cheese we measured out at the beginning before moving on to the next step .

column1: pour some tomato paste on the dough .
column2: take a spoon and scoop some tomato paste and pour it onto the dough . use the spoon to spread the paste around evenly on the dough .

column1: pour some tomato paste on the dough .
column2: roll the dough flat and shape into a large circle . open a can of tomato paste and empty it into a large bowl . use a spoon to ladle out several portions of tomato paste into the center of the dough circle . use the back of the spoon to spread the tomato paste from the center of the dough out toward the edge using swirling motions . be sure to leave enough of the edge clear to create a crust .

column1: pour some tomato paste on the dough .
column2: using a large spoon , put 2 spoonfuls of tomato paste in the middle of the dough . place the spoon on the tomato paste , and make sure the spoon is laying flat . when the spoon is laying flat , use it to spread the tomato paste . make large circles with the flat part of the spoon until the paste is almost to the edge of the dough . make sure the paste is spread in even amounts , leaving just a little room around the edge .

column1: put potatoes back in fryer .
column2: turn on frying machine , make sure it has oil in it . get french fries . gently place the fries into the basket . lower basket into oil . cook in oil for one minute .

column1: put potatoes back in fryer .
column2: return the potatoes to the fryer . fry them until they are crispy .

column1: put potatoes back in fryer .
column2: put the potatoes back into the fryer basket . lower the basket down carefully . fry the potatoes for about one minute more .

column1: put the fish in a cone .
column2: with your hands take the fish . with your hands put the fish in the cone .

column1: put the fish in a cone .
column2: take fish and add batter to it . then put it in a deep fryer . add oil . allow to turn light brown . then put in a paper cone .

column1: put the fish in a cone .
column2: remove the fish from the plate . place the fish into the serving cone .

column1: remove and drain potatoes from fryer .
column2: open the fryer . grab the handle of the basket and slowly lift it up . hold it above the oil and let the excess drain off . put it on a plate that has paper towels on it to soak up the grease .

column1: remove and drain potatoes from fryer .
column2: when the fries are crispy , take the basket out of the fryer and tap it a little bit so that the oil can drain . put some paper towels on a plate and dump the potatoes out on the plate .

column1: remove and drain potatoes from fryer .
column2: now we want to take our fries out of the fryer . just remove the basket and place them onto a plate with several paper towels to catch the grease .

column1: fry the potatoes in a deep fryer .
column2: with your fingers put your fries into the deep fryer . place the fryer down to the oil .

column1: fry the potatoes in a deep fryer .
column2: put cut potatoes into fryer basket . slowly lower fryer basket with potatoes into the oil . keep and eye on the fryer and cook potatoes for 5 minutes .

column1: fry the potatoes in a deep fryer .
column2: put the potatoes into the fryer basket . put the basket into the hot oil . cook the potatoes for 5 minutes .

column1: season potatoes with salt .
column2: carefully pour the french fries out of the fryer basket onto a plate lined with paper towels . sprinkle a small amount of salt onto the fries as soon as you finish getting them onto the plate so that the salt will stick to the fries .

column1: season potatoes with salt .
column2: pinch some salt with you fingers . sprinkle the salt all over the potatoes .

column1: season potatoes with salt .
column2: pour the fries onto paper towels . add some salt over the top .

column1: remove and drain the fish from the fryer .
column2: remove the fish from the fryer with a strainer . shake the basket to drain the excess grease .

column1: remove and drain the fish from the fryer .
column2: hold on to the handle of the basket that 's in the fryer with the fish in it . very carefully so you do n't splatter hot oil , lift the basket up and gently move it around and shake it to help drain the grease off of the fish . gently dump the fish out of the basket onto a plate with a paper towel on it .

column1: remove and drain the fish from the fryer .
column2: take the fish out of the fryer . drain the extra grease . put the fish onto a plate with a paper towel on it .

column1: place potatoes in the cone with the fish .
column2: use tongs to grab the potatoes . put the potatoes in the holder .

column1: place potatoes in the cone with the fish .
column2: use a pair of tongs to carefully pick up some of the fries . then , place the fries inside the cone with the fish .

column1: place potatoes in the cone with the fish .
column2: using tongs pick up the cooked fries . put the fries into the paper cone with the fish .

column1: add vinegar to the batter .
column2: put the batter into a large mixing bowl . mix the batter with a whisk . measure two capfuls of vinegar and add to batter .

column1: add vinegar to the batter .
column2: pour vinegar into the batter . use the whisk to mix it in with the batter .

column1: add vinegar to the batter .
column2: hold vinegar over the batter bowl . pour a little vinegar into the batter carefully .

column1: whisk flour salt and ale together in a bowl .
column2: put flour , salt and ale into a large bowl . use a wire whisk to mix together , until the lumps are gone .

column1: whisk flour salt and ale together in a bowl .
column2: add flour to the bowl . add salt to the bowl . add ale to the bowl . using a whisk mix the mixture together .

column1: whisk flour salt and ale together in a bowl .
column2: add flour to the bowl . mix in some salt . pour in some ale into the bowl . use a whisk to mix everything together .

column1: peel the potatoes .
column2: use a knife or potato peeler to peel the potato . cut all of the skin off of the outside of the potato .

column1: peel the potatoes .
column2: take some potatoes . take a peeler . remove the peel of the potatoes . repeat the same for other two potatoes . keep the peeled potatoes aside .

column1: peel the potatoes .
column2: take the potatoes and clean it properly . peel off the skin using a peeler .

column1: coat the fish with flour and batter .
column2: put the fish into the batter , covering both sides . dip the fish into the flour and get flour on both sides .

column1: coat the fish with flour and batter .
column2: pick up the fish piece with you hand . lay the fish onto the flour . take the fish and dip it in the batter mix to cover the whole thing .

column1: coat the fish with flour and batter .
column2: put the fish in the bowl of flour . flip over the fish to make sure both sides are covered . shake off the excess flour . put the chicken coated in flour in the batter . allow the batter to fully coat the chicken .

column1: place the fish in the deep fryer .
column2: slowly dip the fish into the batter . while your oil is heating , slowly remove the fish from the batter , careful to let it drip the extra batter into the bowl . slowly add the battered fish into the oil about halfway , slowly dropping the fish as you 're careful to not allow your fingers touch the oil .

column1: place the fish in the deep fryer .
column2: when the fish is fully coated , remove from batter bowl . slowly lower the fish into the deep fryer . this will set the batter before you let it go .

column1: place the fish in the deep fryer .
column2: put the fish into the batter until it is completely covered . slowly lower the fish into the dryer .

column1: serve with sauce and garnish with lemon .
column2: spoon out some sauce on the board . put a slice of lemon beside the sauce .

column1: serve with sauce and garnish with lemon .
column2: serve the finished product with sides . put some tartar sauce on the side . add a slice of lemon on the side .

column1: serve with sauce and garnish with lemon .
column2: serve the fried fish in an individual paper wrapper . add a spoonful of the mayonnaise , capers , and gherkin sauce on the side , either on the cutting board or on an individual serving dish . using a knife , cut a lemon into 8 wedges . serve a lemon wedge alongside the fish . serve each person a dish containing the fish , chips , sauce , and lemon wedge .

column1: cut the potatoes .
column2: use a knife to carefully cut the potatoes . cut them across the side of the potato . then cut again into lines .

column1: cut the potatoes .
column2: we now want to cut our potatoes into nice thin strips . think of them as if they are going to be french fry size . keep your fingers safe and out of the way of the knife .

column1: cut the potatoes .
column2: cut the potatoes into long slices that are thin . then carefully cut the potatoes into a french fry shape .

column1: remove and drain the potatoes from the fryer .
column2: remove the pot of potatoes . place the potatoes onto a plate .

column1: remove and drain the potatoes from the fryer .
column2: slowly life the fryer basket out of the fryer . shake any extra oil off the potatoes into the fryer by tapping the basket on the sides of the fryer . being careful of hot oil and potatoes , dump the potatoes onto a plate covered in 4 - 5 paper towels so any extra oil can be absorbed .

column1: remove and drain the potatoes from the fryer .
column2: use the strainer to pull out the potatoes . put the potatoes on a paper towel .

column1: mix flour baking powder salt paprika and pepper together .
column2: add the baking powder , salt , paprika , and pepper into the bowl with the flour . mix all ingredients together with a whisk .

column1: mix flour baking powder salt paprika and pepper together .
column2: in a bowl add the flour . next add the baking powder to the bowl . now add the salt . add the paprika . add the pepper and using a wire whisk , stir the dry ingredients together .

column1: mix flour baking powder salt paprika and pepper together .
column2: add salt to a bowl with flour in it . add baking powder to it . add paprika to it . add pepper to it . mix the ingredients together using a whisk to even everything out .

column1: add beer to the mixture .
column2: with your whisk go into circles . while you have your whisk into circles pour the beer into the bowl .

column1: add beer to the mixture .
column2: pour cold beer into bowl with flour . use a whisk to stir beer into flour .

column1: add beer to the mixture .
column2: have a whisker and your cold beer next to you . slowly pour the cold beer in 2 second segments . use the whisker to blend the beer with the mixture . you may see some bubbles forming as you are pouring the beer and mixing .

column1: coat some onion rings in the mixture .
column2: cut the onion into small rings . put the cut onion rings into the mixture for coating . with the help of a stick , take out the onion rings coated with the mixture to fry .

column1: coat some onion rings in the mixture .
column2: divide the onions into three piles . drop one pile into the coating mixture . stir with a skewer to coat the onions . remove the coated onions to a plate with the skewer . do the same with each pile of onion .

column1: coat some onion rings in the mixture .
column2: drop 5 or 6 pieces of onion into the batter . use a skewer to make sure the batter completely covers each onion slice .

column1: melt some butter in some preheated oil .
column2: take a piece of butter and drop it into your pan of hot oil . if the piece of butter starts to get hot and make a sizzling noise , then it means the oil is ready . take a fork and get the butter out of the oil . now you are ready to put the onion rings in .

column1: melt some butter in some preheated oil .
column2: take a large pan on the stove . pour oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add cube of butter in to the oil . melt the butter and take it off with the spoon .

column1: melt some butter in some preheated oil .
column2: pour oil into the pan . put the piece of bread carefully into the pan . very carefully with a fork or spatula grab take the bread out of the pan .

column1: fry the onion in the oil .
column2: shake off extra batter from onion . put the onion ring in the oil . do n't crowd the pan with too many onion rings . you have to turn the onion rings after a minute and a half . when cooked on both sides take out of oil and put on paper towel .

column1: fry the onion in the oil .
column2: have adult help you fry the onion rings . you want to dip the onion rings into the batter . den you want to have adult help you drop the onion ring into the oil . try not to put to many fry for only 3 mins den take them out an lay them on . on 3 dry paper towel .

column1: fry the onion in the oil .
column2: take the onion rings out of batter using a fork . shake the onion ring a bit so that it does not drip . place the onion ring into the pan with the frying oil . make sure the pan is not full of rings . place 3 sheets of paper towels on a plate . place the onion rings on top of the paper towel .

column1: add baking powder salt and sugar to a bowl of flour and mix .
column2: take the baking powder and add it into the bowl with the flour . now add the salt and the sugar into the bowl as well . take the bowl and mix all of the ingredients that are in it .

column1: add baking powder salt and sugar to a bowl of flour and mix .
column2: put flour , 1 teaspoon baking powder , half a teaspoon salt , and 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar in a bowl . stir . make hole in middle of bowl . add wet ingredients .

column1: add baking powder salt and sugar to a bowl of flour and mix .
column2: take a large bowl and a spoon . take flour in the bowl . add one teaspoon of baking powder in to the bowl . add i teaspoon of salt in to the bowl . add 1 1/2 teaspoon of sugar in to the bowl and mix them with a spoon .

column1: add milk and oil to the bowl and mix .
column2: pour milk and a little bit off oil into the bowl with the flour . use your hand to mix the dough slowly .

column1: add milk and oil to the bowl and mix .
column2: pour milk into cup . pour oil into same cup . add them both to the bowl . mix together with your hands .

column1: add milk and oil to the bowl and mix .
column2: take a measuring cup of oil . pour oil into the center of the bowl . swirl the mix with your hand slowly in the bowl around slowly . if you add too much oil do n't worry pour a bit of flower into the bowl . once done swirling tip the bowl onto the counter .

column1: knead the dough with flour .
column2: knead the bread . add flour and knead for 10 more minutes .

column1: knead the dough with flour .
column2: lightly flour the counter surface . kneed the dough on the counter and add a sprinkle of flour . kneed the dough for 10 minutes .

column1: knead the dough with flour .
column2: sprinkle flour onto a large , flat and clean surface . place dough on surface . roll the dough back and forth across your surface while squeezing it . ( like you do for play clay ! ) . add in little sprinkles of flour while you roll it , until its no longer really sticky .

column1: roll the dough with a rolling pin .
column2: put the dough on the counter . push the rolling pin to and from the dough to roll it flat .

column1: roll the dough with a rolling pin .
column2: take a rolling pan . roll it over the dough to make it flat .

column1: roll the dough with a rolling pin .
column2: place the dough on the table . get your rolling pin . put the rolling pin on top of the dough . put both hands on the side of rolling pin . gently start to roll it on the dough .

column1: add coriander leaves to the dough .
column2: sprinkle the pieces of coriander leaves on the dough . press down on them with your hands to get them to stick and stay put .

column1: add coriander leaves to the dough .
column2: put the herbs on the dough . pat the herbs on the dough to make them stick .

column1: add coriander leaves to the dough .
column2: pick up the coriander leaves . add them to the dough . press them into the dough .

column1: place the dough into an oven .
column2: put the dough in the oven . you can do it at home with the oven in your kitchen .

column1: place the dough into an oven .
column2: turn on the oven t the required temperature . wait until the oven is hot and to beep until it is ready . place the dough into the oven . wait until the required time . the naan is ready to eat .

column1: place the dough into an oven .
column2: put the flattened dough on the palm of your hand . quickly slap the dough onto a tray in the oven , so it does n't fold over on itself . close the oven door .

column1: serve it with bun and potato chips .
column2: remove the hot dogs with tongs . place the hot dogs on a plate inside the hot dog buns . put chips on the plate next to the hot dog . serve the plate .

column1: serve it with bun and potato chips .
column2: put a few hot dog buns on a plate . add potato chips to the side . use tongs to put the bratwurst to the bun . add a little bit of onions .

column1: serve it with bun and potato chips .
column2: using tongs , carefully take the meat off of the grill . place the meat on top of buns . add your condiments on top of the meat . serve alongside potato chips .

column1: place the bratwurst on the grill and cook them until brown for about 10 - 15 minutes .
column2: place the bratwurst onto the heated grill , being careful to not burn your hands . as the bratwurst cook you will notice they are browning on the sides . you need to cook them for about 10 minutes .

column1: place the bratwurst on the grill and cook them until brown for about 10 - 15 minutes .
column2: put the bratwurst onto the hot grill . close the grill lid and cook until brown for about 10 minutes .

column1: place the bratwurst on the grill and cook them until brown for about 10 - 15 minutes .
column2: use tongs to put the brats onto the grill . close the grill . cook the brats for 10 to 15 minutes .

column1: remove the foil and cook for about 15 minutes .
column2: after they have cooked for 20 minutes , you need to remove the foil . let them cook another 15 to 20 minutes with the foil off . be careful and use tongs to move around the container of food when hot .

column1: remove the foil and cook for about 15 minutes .
column2: now carefully pull off the foil . put the pan back in and let it cook without the foil covering it . cook for another 15 minutes .

column1: remove the foil and cook for about 15 minutes .
column2: cook on the grill for about 20 minutes with the foil covering the pan . open the grill and remove the foil . cook for another 15 minutes without the foil .

column1: take butter in a grill pan and add chopped onions garlic and grill it for about 15 minutes .
column2: take a grill pan on the grill . add some butter in the grill pan . cut the onions in to thin slices and add them in to the pan . add cut pieces of garlic in to the pan . grill for about 15 minutes .

column1: take butter in a grill pan and add chopped onions garlic and grill it for about 15 minutes .
column2: put some butter into a grill pan and heat on the grill . add chopped onions and garlic to the grill pan . let the onions cook for about 15 minutes , stir a couple times during cooking .

column1: take butter in a grill pan and add chopped onions garlic and grill it for about 15 minutes .
column2: put butter into a pan and put it on the grill . add chopped onions and garlic into the pan . stir it and cook for around 15 minutes because they 'll take more time than the brats to cook .

column1: transfer the bratwurst into the pan and cover it with aluminum foil and let it cook for 20 minutes .
column2: be careful on the hot grill . use metal tongs to move sausages from the grill to the metal pan with onions as they turn brown . as the sausages turn golden brown , move them into the metal pan filled with onions . once all the sausages are golden brown and moved into the metal pan , cover the metal pan with foil , being careful because the grill and the metal is still very hot . crimp the foil around the edges of the metal pan , and then shut the lid to the grill .

column1: transfer the bratwurst into the pan and cover it with aluminum foil and let it cook for 20 minutes .
column2: use tongs to take the bratwurst from the grill to the pan with the onions and the beer . you can put them in as they 're ready . push them all in the liquid . now cover the pan with foil making sure to seal the edges . now cover the grill and let it cook for about 20 minutes .

column1: pour the beer into the pan and stir it .
column2: once the vegetables on the grill are hot , open the beer . pour the entire contents of the beer bottle into the pan . stir the beer and the vegetables together on the grill .

column1: pour the beer into the pan and stir it .
column2: hold the beer over the pan . carefully pour the beer in the pan . use the tongs to stir everything up .

column1: pour the beer into the pan and stir it .
column2: take a baking tray on the grill . cook the contents in the pan . take a can of beer . add the beer in to the pan . mix the beer with the contents of the pan .

column1: dice the apples .
column2: cut the apples into small pieces . be careful with the knife ( ask an adult to help ) .

column1: dice the apples .
column2: take the fresh apple . clean the apple with cold and hot water properly . cut the apples into 2 cm cubes .

column1: dice the apples .
column2: using a knife , cut the apple into tiny pieces . put in lemon juice . then stir everything together using a spoon .

column1: add lemon juice to the apples and mix .
column2: you will need adult assistance , lemon juice , apples , bowl and spoon for the next step . have a parent or guardian with helping you to prepare the apples . wash apples under cool water and drain the water from the bowl . pour the apples into the mix . pour lemon juice into the mix and apples . mix well with spoon .

column1: add lemon juice to the apples and mix .
column2: cut your apples in half then quarters and cut the core and seeds out . cut the apple slices in to small pieces and put into a serving bowl . add one or two tablespoons of lemon juice to the apples and mix until apple pieces are coated with lemon juice .

column1: add lemon juice to the apples and mix .
column2: dice the apples into cubes ( cut the apples into small cubes ) . add lemon juice to the apples . mix the lemon juice and apples well .

column1: chop the celery .
column2: cut celery into small pieces . measure your raisins .

column1: chop the celery .
column2: cut the celery up into small pieces . " they should look like little green c " " shapes " " . " have an adult help you if you 're afraid of cutting yourself !

column1: chop the celery .
column2: chop the celery into uniform slices with a knife . set aside in a bowl for later .

column1: add raisins cranberries and nuts to the apples .
column2: measure out all of the needed ingredients : raisins , cranberries , and nuts . once you have your ingredients measured out , add them to the apples and mix well .

column1: add raisins cranberries and nuts to the apples .
column2: measure your raisins , cranberries and nuts and put them in their own small bowl . place your cut up apples in a nice serving bowl . pour the raisins , cranberries and nuts in with the apples . stir until the mixture looks pretty .

column1: add raisins cranberries and nuts to the apples .
column2: put the apples in a bowl . add the raisins to the same bowl . add the cranberries as well . finally , add the nuts and mix them together !

column1: add mayonnaise and mix everything together .
column2: combine all the fruit , add mayo . mix everything . chill in fridge .

column1: add mayonnaise and mix everything together .
column2: take the mixing contents in a bowl . take some mayonnaise . add mayonnaise in to the bowl . mix everything well . place it in fridge .

column1: add mayonnaise and mix everything together .
column2: put the mayonnaise in the bowl with the fruit . using a big spoon , mix the ingredients together . put the bowl in the refrigerator to chill before eating .

column1: chill the dish .
column2: place your bowl into the refrigerator and allow it to get cold all the way through . once it is cold it is ready to eat .

column1: chill the dish .
column2: get all the ingredients mixed up well in the bowl . put the dish into the refrigerator and chill .

column1: chill the dish .
column2: after mixing fruit cover the bowl . place in fridge until cold .

column1: mix tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together .
column2: spoon in a tablespoon of tamarind paste into a bowl . 1 1/2 tablespoons of plumb sugar . 1 tablespoon of sugar . add a pinch of salt . 1/2 tablespoon of vinegar mix well with spoon .

column1: mix tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together .
column2: put one tablespoon of tamarind into the bowl . then add 1 and a half tablespoons of palm sugar to the bowl . next , add 1 tablespoon of white sugar and a pinch of salt to the bowl . add half tablespoon of vinegar and one tablespoon of fish sauce to the bowl . use spoon to stir well .

column1: mix tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together .
column2: get a separate container to use . add the tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together slowly using a spoon .

column1: heat olive oil in a pan    add the radish and fried tofu .
column2: take a large metal spoon and add to it a tablespoon of oil . poor the oil into a wok . heat up the wok , while adding in radish and tofu .

column1: heat olive oil in a pan    add the radish and fried tofu .
column2: put oil in the pan . let oil heat up and be careful . put the radish and fried tofu in the oil . let the mixture simmer . stir the mixture .

column1: heat olive oil in a pan    add the radish and fried tofu .
column2: spread olive oil around the bottom of the pan . add radish to the pan . then put the pieces of tofu into the pan and let it cook .

column1: add the shrimps to the pan .
column2: now if you have chicken or shrimp add it in to the pan . stir the mixture .

column1: add the shrimps to the pan .
column2: add 5 - 6 shrimp to your pan . stir around and allow to cook . you can also use chicken instead of shrimp or along with the shrimp if desired .

column1: add the shrimps to the pan .
column2: pick up the shrimp with your fingers and put into the hot pan . use a large spoon to move the shrimp around in the pan .

column1: add the rice noodles and a little water to the pan .
column2: stir the contents of the pan with a metal ladle . next add the rice noodles to the pan . stir again with metal ladle . add a little bit of water to the ladle and add to pan .

column1: add the rice noodles and a little water to the pan .
column2: cook egg and shrimp in wok . add 2 cups of pre - soaked rice noodles . stir noodles , egg and shrimp . saute . add 1/2 cup water .

column1: add the rice noodles and a little water to the pan .
column2: put the rice noodles carefully into the hot pan . stir the noodles in the pan . get a half cup measuring cup . fill the half cup measuring cup with water . pour the measuring cup of water into the hot pan with the noodles .

column1: stir to mix the ingredients .
column2: put all ingredients in pan . stir them together until they are mixed . stir them together until they are mixed .

column1: stir to mix the ingredients .
column2: pour a half a spoon full of the mixture into the pan with the other ingredients . continue to stir the mixture into the rest of the ingredients .

column1: stir to mix the ingredients .
column2: get a big spoon or ladle . use the ladle to mix everything together carefully .

column1: add the mixed sauce red chili powder leeks sprouts and nuts .
column2: add the sauce and mix into the noodles , and turn up the heat . add some paprika , leeks , bean sprouts and the nuts . use a spoon to mix everything while cooking .

column1: add the mixed sauce red chili powder leeks sprouts and nuts .
column2: use your hand and grab the leeks sprouts and nuts and throw it in the pan . take a spoon and scoop the mixed sauce red chili powder in and drop it in the pan carefully .

column1: add the mixed sauce red chili powder leeks sprouts and nuts .
column2: ladle in sauce . add in red chili powder , add leeks and sprouts . toss to combine .

column1: crack eggs into the pan and stir fry .
column2: bring an oiled pan to a medium high heat . take two eggs and crack them into the pan , trowing away the shells . take a spatula or large spoon and stir the eggs .

column1: crack eggs into the pan and stir fry .

column1: crack eggs into the pan and stir fry .

column1: add onion ketchup and mustard .

column1: add onion ketchup and mustard .

column1: heat some oil in a pan and fry some chicken sausages in it .

column1: heat some oil in a pan and fry some chicken sausages in it .

column1: heat some oil in a pan and fry some chicken sausages in it .

column1: heat some hot dog buns in a pan .
column2: all you need to do now is take your hot dog bun and open it up . take the opened bun and set it on top of the pan .

column1: close the bun .

column1: close the bun .

column1: close the bun .

column1: put the lettuce and hot dogs in the buns .

column1: put the lettuce and hot dogs in the buns .

column1: put the lettuce and hot dogs in the buns .

column1: layer the bun patty sauce tomato rocket and top bun .

column1: layer the bun patty sauce tomato rocket and top bun .

column1: roll the dough out .

column1: roll the dough out .

column1: roll the dough out .

column1: grill the burgers .

column1: cut out circles from the meat .

column1: cut out circles from the meat .

column1: cut out circles from the meat .

column1: brush the circles with egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds .

column1: brush the circles with egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds .

column1: cut the dough in half .

column1: cut the dough in half .

column1: cut the dough in half .

column1: mix the flour salt egg melted butter and yeast mixture into a dough and knead .
column2: put flour , salt , eggs , melted butter and the yeast mix into a bowl . mix well and form into a ball . knew the dough on a cutting board for about ten minutes until the dough is smooth .

column1: mix the flour salt egg melted butter and yeast mixture into a dough and knead .
column2: okay , now add the salt into our flour . then add the egg in and follow that by the melted butter . the last thing to add in is the yeast and water mixture . now take your dough and knead it for about 10 minutes .

column1: mix the flour salt egg melted butter and yeast mixture into a dough and knead .
column2: add flour into a bowl . add salt . then pour an egg into the bowl . put in melted butter and the mix of yeast , sugar and water . mix the bowl together and then remove the dough and knead it for about 10 minutes .

column1: mix the yeast sugar and water .
column2: put yeast in a bowl . add sugar to the bowl . add water to the bowl . mix up with a spoon .

column1: mix the yeast sugar and water .
column2: put the yeast and sugar in the water . stir it together with a spoon .

column1: mix the yeast sugar and water .
column2: add yeast and sugar to a small bowl of warm water . stir the mixture with a spoon . put it in a warm place , like on top of the refrigerator for 30 minutes .

column1: cut out circles from the cough .
column2: lay out a cutting board and place dough on top . roll out the dough until it 's about a centimeter thick . using a melon baller cut out small little circles from the dough and place on a cookie sheet .

column1: cut out circles from the cough .

column1: cut out circles from the cough .

column1: roll the beef out .
column2: put the meat between two sheets of rolling paper on the table . use a rolling pin and roll the meat . flatten the meat until it is about 1/2 cm thick . put in the freezer for about 20 minutes .

column1: roll the beef out .

column1: roll the beef out .
column2: roll the meat between your hands to mix it well . get two pieces of baking paper and place the meat between the two pieces of paper . get a rolling pin and slowly roll the pin back and forth over top of the meat which is sandwiched between the baking paper sheets . flatten the meat as you roll back and forth , until the meat patty is about 1/2 cm thick . place the flattened patty into the freezer .

column1: sprinkle salt on the beef and mix .
column2: have ground beef in a bowl . hold the salt grinder over the beef . turn the cap about 5 times , releasing salt onto the meat . use your hands to mix the salt into the meat .

column1: sprinkle salt on the beef and mix .

column1: sprinkle salt on the beef and mix .
column2: put salt into the bowl . with your hands mix the beef and salt together .

column1: cook the buns on a grill .

column1: add oil to a heated pan .

column1: add the tofu to the pan and stir .

column1: add the tofu to the pan and stir .

column1: add the collard greens to the soup .

column1: top the soup with parsley and oil .

column1: heat a pot of chicken broth to a boil .

column1: heat a pot of chicken broth to a boil .
column2: get the chicken broth ready , it is time to start boiling . put a medium to large pot on the stove and carefully pour in the chicken broth . turn up the heat dial on the stove and wait for the chicken broth to start boiling . be careful not to touch the hot chicken broth or pot while on the stove .

column1: heat a pot of chicken broth to a boil .
column2: put a pot on the stove . add chicken broth to pot . heat chicken broth to a boil .

column1: add    soy sauce and sesame oil .
column2: pour in soy sauce . add sesame oil .

column1: add    soy sauce and sesame oil .

column1: add    soy sauce and sesame oil .

column1: add the chopped green onions chopped baby bok choy and white onion .
column2: get a cutting board and a large knife . take white onions and but off the long , green part these will be the scallions . put in a bowl . chop the scallions into small pieces and put in a separate small bowl . chop the white onions into small pieces . put in a bowl . chop the bok choy into small pieces . add the white onions an bok choy to the broth . save the scallions for a garnish .

column1: add the chopped green onions chopped baby bok choy and white onion .
column2: cut green onion into small pieces . cut the baby bok choy into small pieces . cut the white onion into small pieces . put everything into the pan .

column1: add the chopped green onions chopped baby bok choy and white onion .
column2: add the green onion . add the baby bok choy in to it . add the white onion also into it . mix all the ingredients together .

column1: add diced cooked chicken to the pot .
column2: chicken must already be cooked ; ask an adult to help . dicing means to cut up in very small pieces . use a sharp knife and carefully cut the cooked chicken first in thin slices . turn the cutting board sideways and now cut the chicken slices the other direction . when all chicken is cut up , use the knife to chop into even smaller pieces with a chopping motion . keep your hand out of the way !

column1: add diced cooked chicken to the pot .
column2: initially cook the chicken . take a pot for the chicken . add the cooked chicken to the pot .

column1: add diced cooked chicken to the pot .
column2: take your chicken and make sure it is cut up into little pieces and it is cooked all the way through . you can also tear apart the cooked chicken with your fingers if the chicken is cool enough to touch . if you touched any raw chicken , wash your hands before moving on to the next step . after adding all the ingredients the recipe asked you to put together before the chicken , check and make sure you have not missed a step . if all the steps are followed , you are ready to add the chicken . be careful not to touch the hot pot or liquid . you can add the chicken with tongs or a big spoon if you are more comfortable .

column1: add cooked wonton noodles .
column2: boil wonton noodles in a pot of boiling water . boil chicken broth in a separate pan to cook on stove . pour in soy sauce , scallions ( green onions ) and bok choy in with broth . then add in your chicken , and noodles that were cooked and put into chicken broth . put in a bowl and add in some green onions on top .

column1: add cooked wonton noodles .
column2: set a timer for 3 minutes . cook soup until timer alarms . add chicken and cooked wonton noodles to soup . set timer for another 3 minutes . let soup cook until timer alarms .

column1: add cooked wonton noodles .
column2: first you will mix the chicken with all the herbs and vegetables in the pot . next you will add the cooked wonton noodles to the pot . mix all ingredients together .

column1: heat some oil in a pan .
column2: place a pan on the stove burner , turn the burner on to medium high , or about three - quarters of the way around . pour your oil into the pan and let it sit . when the surface of the oil looks a little wavy , it 's ready .

column1: heat some oil in a pan .
column2: turn on the stove top to medium heat . place the pan onto the eye ( the heated circle ) or over the flame if you have a gas stove . watch the oil as it warms up and be sure to not let it smoke or burn .

column1: heat some oil in a pan .

column1: add in green onion baby bok choy and minced garlic .
column2: you can gently add your green onions that are chopped to small bite size pieces . add your cut up baby bok choy , this should be about the size of your finger tips . now add minced , or very finely chopped garlic .

column1: add in green onion baby bok choy and minced garlic .

column1: add in the cooked wonton noodles and mixed sauce .

column1: add in the cooked wonton noodles and mixed sauce .

column1: slice the guanciale .

column1: slice the guanciale .

column1: fry the guanciale in the frying pan .
column2: heat the frying pan . place guanciale into frying pan . cook until browned .

column1: fry the guanciale in the frying pan .
column2: take the meat and put it in the pan . mix it up while it cooks .

column2: add the guanciale in the frying pan . fry it until it is nicely browned .

column1: sprinkle some black pepper on the yolk mixture and mix well .

column1: drain the spaghetti and mix it with guanciale .

column1: drain the spaghetti and mix it with guanciale .
