column1: add red bell pepper and green peppers onto the bowl .
column2: hold the ingredients over the big bowl . pour in the bowls of pepper and green peppers .

column1: add red bell pepper and green peppers onto the bowl .
column2: add red bell peppers into the bowl . pour in chopped green peppers .

column1: add cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese and mix it well .
column2: take a large mixing bowl . add the pasta and other ingredients in the bowl . cut the cucumber in to small pieces and add them in to the bowl . add some cherry tomatoes in to the bowl . add a cup of cheese and mix everything in the bowl .

column1: add cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese and mix it well .
column2: pour in the cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese . use a wooden spoon to mix everything together all around .

column1: add cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese and mix it well .
column2: a large bowl add cucumber , dry tomatoes , and cheese . mix well .

column1: toss the pasta salad .
column2: in a large metal mixing bowl stir together the pasta and the other ingredients with a large wooden cooking spoon . put the pasta mixture on plates and serve it .

column1: toss the pasta salad .
column2: in a silver bowl , medium size stir contents with a spatula . inside the bowl is pasta . past is multi colored , green and green . also in bowl are diced tomatoes , diced cucumbers , diced olives . mix thoroughly and put on a plate .

column1: toss the pasta salad .
column2: put all ingredients in a large bowl . find a large spoon . use spoon to mix ingredients until fully mixed .

column1: add 1 cup of fusilli pasta into a bowl and add the black olive and cherry tomatoes .
column2: use one cup of fusilli pasta that should be precooked and put into a bowl . get some black olives and cherry tomatoes and add them to the bowl of pasta .

column1: add 1 cup of fusilli pasta into a bowl and add the black olive and cherry tomatoes .
column2: pick up the bowl of colorful pasta and pour it in the silver bowl . then add the black olives . then add the red tomatoes .

column1: add 1 cup of fusilli pasta into a bowl and add the black olive and cherry tomatoes .
column2: pour in 1 cup of pasta into the bowl . add black olives to the bowl . pour in the cup of cherry tomatoes to the mixture .

column1: mix the dressing and pour on the pasta .
column2: mix the dressing which is 5 tablespoons olive oil , 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar . 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder , 1/2 teaspoon oregano , 1/2 teaspoon black pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt . use a whisk to mix and then add to the pasta .

column1: mix the dressing and pour on the pasta .
column2: used a whisk to stir the dressing . pour the dressing onto the pasta . stir the pasta and spread the dressing evenly throughout .

column1: mix the dressing and pour on the pasta .
column2: get a small bowl . measure out 5 tablespoons olive oil , 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar , 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder , 1/2 teaspoon oregano , 1/2 teaspoon black pepper , and 1/2 teaspoon salt . pour all the measured ingredients into the small bowl and mix them with a small whisk . pour mixture in bowl into the bowl of pasta .

column1: add cream milk and cheese to a bowl .
column2: add some heavy cream into a large bowl . add milk to the bowl . add the cheese mixture into the bowl . stir the bowl with a stirring spoon .

column1: add cream milk and cheese to a bowl .
column2: hold the bowl of milk over the bigger bowl . pour in the milk slowly . use your hands and throw the cheese in the mix .

column1: add cream milk and cheese to a bowl .
column2: take a large glass bowl . take some cream milk in a small bowl . take some cheese in a plate . add the cream milk in to the big bowl . add the cheese in to the milk in the bowl .

column1: sprinkle cheese onto the macaroni .
column2: take a large glass bowl . add the cooked macaroni along with the sauce in the glass bowl . take some cheese in a bowl . sprinkle the cheese on to the macaroni . spread the cheese evenly on the macaroni .

column1: sprinkle cheese onto the macaroni .
column2: add cheese to the macaronis . spread the cheese evenly over the pan .

column1: sprinkle cheese onto the macaroni .
column2: now we will sprinkle on our smoked cheddar cheese . after we put a good amount of he cheddar we can go ahead and add some colby monetary jack cheese as well .

column1: add seasoning .
column2: mix the macaroni and milk in the bowl . sprinkle pepper into the mixture . sprinkle salt into the bowl . stir the mixture with a big plastic spoon .

column1: add seasoning .
column2: add in some salt and pepper to the bowl . use the stirring spoon to mix in the seasoning with the rest of the ingredients in the bowl .

column1: add seasoning .
column2: add a pinch of salt and black pepper . stir with a spoon to mix in well .

column1: cook the macaroni in boiling water .
column2: pour the macaroni into the boiling water . follow the directions on the back of the box for how long to cook it .

column1: cook the macaroni in boiling water .
column2: wait until the water is bubbling fast . pour the macaroni into the boiling water . let the macaroni cook in the water .

column1: cook the macaroni in boiling water .
column2: add water to a pot . heat the water on high until it bubbles and boils . add raw macaroni to the boiling water . let macaroni cook in the boiling water . check the box for the amount of time to boil .

column1: grease the pan with butter and fill with macaroni .
column2: use butter to grease the bottom of the pan . spread the butter all around the bottom of the pan . add the pasta to the bottom of the pan .

column1: grease the pan with butter and fill with macaroni .
column2: rub a stick of butter all over the pan . fill the pan with the cooked macaroni .

column1: grease the pan with butter and fill with macaroni .
column2: unwrap the paper off the top inch of a stick of butter . holding the stick of butter around the wrapped side , rub the unwrapped portion of butter all along the inside of the dish . make sure to spread butter covering the entire bottom and sides of the pan . take the boiling pasta and pour it into a colander in the sink to drain it . take the drained pasta and spoon it into the buttered ( greased ) pan .

column1: pour the sauce onto the pasta .
column2: mix the sauce very well with a spoon . pour the sauce all over the pasta that is in a dish . use a spoon to spread it around evenly .

column1: pour the sauce onto the pasta .
column2: pour the sauce into the pan over the pasta . use a stirring spoon to spread the sauce evenly out throughout the pan .

column1: pour the sauce onto the pasta .
column2: hold the bowl of sauce over the pasta pan . carefully pour the sauce onto the pasta .

column1: bake the macaroni in the oven .
column2: sprinkle cheese over the top of the macaroni . pick up the glass pan of macaroni . place it into an oven that is already heated to 350 degrees . let it bake for 35 - 45 minutes . it is ready when it is starting to turn a golden brown on the top .

column1: bake the macaroni in the oven .
column2: add the macaroni and cheese into the tray . switch on the oven to preheat the oven . wait until the beep sound comes . put the tray inside the oven . wait for at least 10 - 15 minutes .

column1: bake the macaroni in the oven .
column2: set the macaroni pan into the over . set the oven to 350 degrees . bake for 30 to 45 minutes .

column1: mix in the eggs .
column2: add the egg mixture into the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the eggs in with the rest of the ingredients .

column1: mix in the eggs .
column2: pour the bowl of mixed eggs into the big bowl of mixture . stir with a spoon .

column1: mix in the eggs .
column2: pour in the bowl of eggs . use a spoon to mix everything up good .

column1: add chard to pot and stir .
column2: dump in some chard into the pot . using the stirring spoon and mix in the chard and cook for 15 minutes .

column1: add chard to pot and stir .
column2: put the greens into the hot contents of the pot . stir the greens into the contents with a wooden slatted spoon . simmer for about 15 minutes .

column1: add chard to pot and stir .
column2: add chart to the pot . stir it with a spoon .

column1: dice chard and put in a bowl .
column2: be sure to thoroughly wash your swiss chard . you may use the stems as well as the leaves . chop the stems in thin slices . chop the leaves into bite - sized pieces using a sharp knife .

column1: dice chard and put in a bowl .
column2: carefully take a knife and cut across the leaves of the chard . turn them and cut the other way to make small pieces . put the chard in a bowl .

column1: dice chard and put in a bowl .
column2: take a cutting board and a knife . take the chard leaves on a board . cut the chard in to long strips vertically . cut each strip in to small pieces . take the cut pieces of chard in a bowl .

column1: add onions and diced celery .

column1: add onions and diced celery .

column1: add onions and diced celery .
column2: take a pan on the stove . cut the onions in to small pieces . add the onions in to the pan . cut the celery in to small pieces . add the celery in to the pan .

column1: add minced garlic .

column1: add minced garlic .
column2: add 4 cloves of minced garlic . stir the garlic in and cook for about 1 minute .

column1: add minced garlic .
column2: add finely chopped garlic . stir it in with your spoon . just cook it for about a minute .

column1: add chopped cabbage red pepper flakes and italian herbs .

column1: add chopped cabbage red pepper flakes and italian herbs .
column2: put chopped cabbage into the pot . stir with a spoon . put red pepper flakes into the pot . put dry italian herbs into the pot . put salt into the pot , stir with a spoon .

column1: add chopped cabbage red pepper flakes and italian herbs .
column2: add chopped cabbage to the soup . put in red pepper flakes . add italian herbs . use a spoon to stir all of the ingredients into the soup .

column1: take the beans out of the pods and put them into the pot .
column2: remove the beans from the pods . get about 1 cup of beans . pour the beans into the pot .

column1: take the beans out of the pods and put them into the pot .
column2: open each pod . remove the beans . you can run your thumbnail along the pod to remove the beans . drop the beans in the pot .

column1: take the beans out of the pods and put them into the pot .
column2: push the beans out with your thumb into a clean empty bowl . take bowlful to sink and turn faucet on so water will cover the beans . swish your clean hand around beans to rinse stuff off them before cooking . when they are clean , drain water from bean bowl and put clean beans into a really big pot of water , cover with lid and let pot of beans soak overnight so they will be soft and quicker to cook . in the morning , pour beans into a strainer then rinse them and now the beans are ready to be cooked so go - ahead and dump beans into a fresh clean pot .

column1: add pasta to pot .
column2: open up a bag of pasta . pour pasta into the pot .

column1: add pasta to pot .
column2: get out some pasta . pour the pasta into a large pan .

column1: add pasta to pot .
column2: cook the sauce in one pot . next put the ditalini , little mini tubes to another pot .

column1: add chicken broth and water and crushed tomatoes .

column1: add chicken broth and water and crushed tomatoes .
column2: after the garlic has cooked for about a minute , add chicken broth and water . add one can of plum tomatoes .

column1: add chicken broth and water and crushed tomatoes .

column1: add garbanzo beans .
column2: add garbanzo beans to the mixture . stir the mixture together .

column2: put the garbanzo beans into the pot of soup . use a wooden spoon to stir .

column1: add garbanzo beans .
column2: pour garbanzo beans into the soup . stir the beans into the soup with a spoon .

column1: saute chopped bacon in oil .
column2: cook the chopped bacon in oil . stir it around with a wooden spoon .

column1: saute chopped bacon in oil .
column2: grab a large pot and place it on the stove . turn on heat to about medium high . put about 2 tablespoons of olive oil in pot . cut up some bacon into small bits . add bacon into the pot .

column1: saute chopped bacon in oil .
column2: get a pot and put it on the oven at medium heat . cut up some italian bacon . put the italian bacon in the pot . add a few tablespoons of olive oil . when just browned add chopped onions .

column1: add water to pot .
column2: pour water into the soup . stir the water in the soup and continue to cook .

column1: add water to pot .
column2: bring the soup to a boil . while the soup is boiling , add water . you should add water when you notice the level of soup getting lower in the pot .

column1: add water to pot .
column2: once you see the soup boiling , we need to add water . just slowly pour the water into the soup , but do n't pour to fast or it may splash out .

column1: simmer the soup .
column2: turn the heat to medium low . simmer the mixture . cook for about 45 minutes .

column1: simmer the soup .
column2: cook the canned bean product on high . wait for the soup to simmer . turn heat down to a medium - low heat for 45 minutes . cranberry beans should be tender .

column1: simmer the soup .
column2: let the soup heat up on the stove . set the dial to medium low . let the soup bubble up a little bit .

column1: stretch the dough .
column2: put dough on to table covered with flour . pat it until it is flat and even . play with the dough make a rectangle shape out of it . fix any holes .

column1: stretch the dough .
column2: spread and flatten the dough out . pick it up and stretch it in the air so it gets longer and flatten it out more .

column1: stretch the dough .
column2: sprinkle flour over a clean counter . put flour on your hands and fingers so the dough does not stick to your hands . place the dough on top of the floured counter . use your hands to gently stretch and roll the dough out from the corners . shape the dough into a rectangular shape .

column1: cut the dough into squares .
column2: use your knife to cut the dough in half the long way . then , still going the long way , cut each half in half again . now cut the dough in half the other way - going across the short way . then , still going across , cut each of those halves in half again . you will end up with pieces that are like small squares . they do n't have to be exact .

column1: cut the dough into squares .
column2: cut dough in squares by first making a line down middle with knife . carefully pull knife lengthwise down middle , then down middle of both sides . cut across the width of dough until you have 16 squares .

column1: cut the dough into squares .
column2: use a knife to cut the dough in half . now cut both of those pieces in half . you should now have 4 pieces . now turn your knife where it is facing the other direction . cut across the other pieces , making small squares .

column1: lay pepperoni and cheese on the dough and roll into a ball .
column2: cut your dough into squares that are about 3 inches long . put two pieces of pepperoni on each square . put a piece of cheese on top of the pepperoni . put one last piece of pepperoni on top of the cheese . roll it up into a ball , keeping the pepperoni and cheese in the middle .

column1: lay pepperoni and cheese on the dough and roll into a ball .
column2: place two pieces of pepperoni on each piece of dough . add one piece of cheese on top . roll up the dough into a ball with the cheese and pepperoni inside .

column1: lay pepperoni and cheese on the dough and roll into a ball .
column2: roll out dough with a rolling pin and cut the dough into squares . next , place two pieces of pepperoni on each square and one piece of cheese on top of the pepperoni . if you want , you may add another piece of pepperoni on top of the cheese . then , roll the dough up with the pepperoni and cheese into a ball . make sure the ball is closed , with no cheese or pepperoni showing !

column1: put the rolls in a pan .
column2: rub in grease or butter to the bottom of a pan so the buns do n't stick to the pan . place buns in a square pan 13 by 9 inches . bake in oven as directed .

column1: put the rolls in a pan .
column2: place the rolls in a pan . set them side by side in rows .

column1: put the rolls in a pan .
column2: now place your rolls into your square pan . place them close together because you are going to fill the whole pan .

column1: brush each pizza bite with some melted butter and sprinkle some italian seasoning on top .
column2: using a brush dip it into the butter in the bowl . paint the butter over each of the bites . pinch some italian seasoning with your finger and sprinkle it over the top of each bite .

column1: brush each pizza bite with some melted butter and sprinkle some italian seasoning on top .
column2: put some melted butter into a bowl . with a brush , put some of the butter on the top of each pizza bite . take some italian seasoning , and with your fingers , sprinkle a tiny bit on top of each pizza bite .

column1: brush each pizza bite with some melted butter and sprinkle some italian seasoning on top .
column2: use the brush to put melted butter on top of eat pizza bite . use your fingers to spread a little italian seasoning on top of each .

column1: slice the roll .
column2: wet your knife . using your knife cut your roll in half . using your knife cut the roll in half again . using your knife cut the roll again .

column1: slice the roll .
column2: dip your knife into water to moisten the blade . use the knife to cut the roll into 6 equal pieces . if the rice starts to stick , wet the knife again .

column1: slice the roll .
column2: wet your knife with water . cut the roll into 6 even pieces . start by cutting the roll into half , then cut each half into three pieces . when the rice starts to stick to your knife , wet the knife with the water again . when cutting , do n't push down on your knife . cut the roll by gently pulling the knife through the roll .

column1: prepare some crab meat chop and peel an avocado into thin slices .
column2: set some crab meat on a plate . use a knife to cut around the avocado and take the peel off . take the pit out of the center of the avocado . use a knife to cut the avocado into 8 slices .

column1: prepare some crab meat chop and peel an avocado into thin slices .
column2: take some pieces of crab meat into a plate . take two avocados and clean with water . cut the avocado into two pieces . peel the avocado . cut the avocado in to thin pieces .

column1: prepare some crab meat chop and peel an avocado into thin slices .
column2: cut some crab meat in to thin strips . cut the avocado in to two halves . remove the seed from the avocado . remove the peel of the avocado . cut the avocado in to eight slices .

column1: add sesame seeds crab meat and avocado roll it up and press firmly .
column2: use your fingers to sprinkle sesame seeds onto the rice . turn the rice covered seaweed over on top of the plastic wrap . put the sticks of crab meat and avocado sideways over the seaweed . roll up the wooden mat with the sushi on it . roll it kind of firmly . when it 's all rolled up gently squeeze the sushi mat so it all holds together .

column1: add sesame seeds crab meat and avocado roll it up and press firmly .
column2: add some sesame seeds on top of sushi rice . turn the sea weed to the other side . add long strips of crab meat and avocado on the sea weed in the middle . start rolling the mat in to a circle . finish the rolling and stick the two sides of the rice .

column1: add sesame seeds crab meat and avocado roll it up and press firmly .
column2: sprinkle the sesame seeds over the sushi rice . then turn it over , so the rice is on the bottom . put crab meat and avocado on the seaweed wrap long ways . roll the bamboo mat and press firmly to shape the roll .

column1: wrap the mat with plastic .
column2: cover the bamboo sushi roll mat with plastic wrap . press the plastic wrap to smooth it out .

column1: wrap the mat with plastic .
column2: cover the sushi roll mat with plastic . wrap the plastic around the sushi roll mat .

column1: wrap the mat with plastic .
column2: place the mat down flat on a plastic wrap sheet . cover the mat with another plastic wrap and press it together .

column1: mix the sauce and pour on the rice .
column2: mix the vinegar sauce in a small bowl . using hot cooked rice , pour the sauce over the rice . mix the sauce and rice together using a rice paddle . lastly , let the rice cool down .

column1: mix the sauce and pour on the rice .
column2: microwave the vinegar mixture and then stir until everything is mixed well . your rice should now be done cooking , and very hot . drizzle the vinegar mixture over the rice , getting it on as much rice as possible . now , slice the rice with a rice paddle in order to mix the vinegar mixture into the rice . make sure to slice . stirring could create clumps . let the rice mixture cool down before moving on to the next step .

column1: mix the sauce and pour on the rice .
column2: mix the sauce and heat in the microwave for a few seconds to mix well . pour the sauce over the freshly cooked , very hot rice . use a rice paddle to slice through the rice and mix the sauce . cool down the rice .

column1: place the seaweed down and put the rice on it .
column2: place the seaweed on a bamboo sushi roll mat . wet you fingers with water . put some rice on the seaweed . gently spread out rice with fingers . make sure to spread rice all the way to each edge .

column1: place the seaweed down and put the rice on it .
column2: place nori onto the bamboo sushi mat . wet your fingers . spread the rice evenly along the nori leaving some room at the ends . cover the nori sheet almost to the edge with the rice .

column1: place the seaweed down and put the rice on it .
column2: you will need a bamboo sushi mat . nori seaweed , stick rice that is already prepared and sesame seeds . cover the bamboo mat with wax paper so that food will not stick to it . cut one sheet of nori in half and lay it on the bottom half of the sushi mat . use your fingers to put rice in an even layer on top of the nori until the nori is covered up with rice . next , sprinkle sesame seeds all over the rice .

column1: combine rice vinegar sugar and salt .
column2: hold the ingredients over the bowl . carefully pour the rice vinegar sugar and salt into the bowl . let them mix together .

column1: combine rice vinegar sugar and salt .
column2: put two tablespoons of vinegar into a bowl . add 2 teaspoons of sugar to the bowl . put in 2/3 teaspoon of salt to the mixture .

column1: combine rice vinegar sugar and salt .
column2: add two tablespoons ( tbs ) of rice vinegar . add two teaspoons ( tsp ) of sugar . teaspoons are smaller than tablespoons . add 2/3 teaspoon of salt .

column1: add water and grind the mixture .
column2: add water to the mixture . grind the mixture very finely to create a green liquid in the bowl .

column1: add water and grind the mixture .
column2: pour water into the mix bowl . grind the mixture up and mix with the water .

column1: add water and grind the mixture .
column2: finely grind mixture in a bowl . continue until curry is smooth in consistency .

column1: add coriander onions garlic green chilies coriander seeds cumin seeds pepper ginger salt lemon juice and lemon rind to a bowl .
column2: put fresh coriander , onions , garlic , green chilies , coriander seeds in a bowl . then add cumin seeds , pepper , ginger , salt , lemon juice and peel to the same bowl .

column1: add coriander onions garlic green chilies coriander seeds cumin seeds pepper ginger salt lemon juice and lemon rind to a bowl .
column2: put raw , fresh coriander in a bowl . add a few chopped onions , garlic , green chilies , coriander seeds , and cumin seeds . add black pepper , a piece of ginger . add salt to taste . to maintain the green color add lemon juice and lemon peel .

column1: add coriander onions garlic green chilies coriander seeds cumin seeds pepper ginger salt lemon juice and lemon rind to a bowl .
column2: add 1 cup of coriander to the bowl . add 1/4 cup of chopped onions and coriander seeds . add 2 teaspoons of cumin seeds , 1/2 teaspoons of pepper , 1 piece of ginger . add salt and 1/2 teaspoons of lemon juice . use a spoon to mix together all of the ingredients .

column1: add oil and then onions to the wok .
column2: add 1 teaspoon of oil to the frying pan . spread the oil around the pan evenly . add 1/4 cup of chopped onions to the pan . stir the onions around the pan .

column1: add oil and then onions to the wok .
column2: hold the oil over the wok and carefully pour it in . use a spoon to scoop onions out into the wok .

column1: add oil and then onions to the wok .
column2: place the wok on the stove . switch on the stove . add oil into the wok . once the oils is heated , add the onions into the wok .

column1: fry cumin seeds in oil in a pan .
column2: take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add some cumin seeds in to the pan . fry cumin seeds in the oil .

column1: fry cumin seeds in oil in a pan .
column2: add 2 teaspoons of oil to the pan . add 1/2 teaspoon of cumin seeds to the pan . let them cook for a while .

column1: add green chilies and curry paste .
column2: hold the chilies over the pan . pour them in the pan carefully . use a spoon to scoop curry pasta into the pan .

column1: add green chilies and curry paste .
column2: add 1 1/2 teaspoons of green chilies . add 2 tablespoons of curry paste . continue to stir the pan .

column1: add green chilies and curry paste .
column2: add a small bowl of green chili 's to the frying pan . then add two tablespoons of curry paste to the frying pan . mix with all the ingredients in the frying pan with a wooden spoon .

column1: add soy sauce .
column2: hold the soy sauce bottle over the pan . pour very little soy sauce into the pan .

column1: add soy sauce .
column2: add 1 teaspoon of soy sauce . use the stirring spoon to mix in the sauce in the pan .

column1: add soy sauce .
column2: take rice and place in skillet . then add soy sauce mixture . add heat to skillet . take large spoon and mix completely . allow mixture to become heated and then serve .

column1: pour the sauce in the center of the rice .
column2: take rice and add to pot . cook until tender . then make a hole . add sauce to center of mold . then serve .

column1: pour the sauce in the center of the rice .
column2: use the scoop to pour the sauce into the middle of the rice . add 1 tablespoon of chopped spring greens on top .

column1: pour the sauce in the center of the rice .
column2: now we want to slowly add the sauce to our center of the rice cake . just spoon it in with your serving spoon , one scoop at a time . once you have your sauce inside just sprinkle some spring onions on the inside as well .

column1: add lemon juice salt water and curry paste to the sauce .
column2: pour 1 teaspoon lemon juice into the sauce in the pan . sprinkle salt into the sauce . pour one quarter cup of water into the sauce . stir with a plastic spoon . add a half teaspoon of green curry paste .

column1: add lemon juice salt water and curry paste to the sauce .
column2: add 1 teaspoon of lemon juice to the pan . add some salt . pour in 1/4 cup of water . add 1/2 teaspoon of curry paste . use a stirring spoon and mix everything together in the pan .

column1: add lemon juice salt water and curry paste to the sauce .
column2: add the lemon juice to the sauce . add the salt water into the sauce . also add the curry paste into the sauce . mix altogether nicely to blend all the flavors together .

column1: add onion green chilies spring onion and coconut milk to the pan .
column2: add the chopped spring onion whites to the hot pan , stir . add the split green chili to the hot pan , stir . add some spring onion leaves to the pan , stir . add the coconut milk to the pan and stir .

column1: add onion green chilies spring onion and coconut milk to the pan .
column2: add onion into the pan . add the green chilies into the pan . add spring onions into the pan . also add the coconut milk into the pan . mix all the ingredients together to blend nicely .

column1: add onion green chilies spring onion and coconut milk to the pan .

column1: add the rice salt and pepper .

column1: add the rice salt and pepper .
column2: use a spoon to put the cooked rice in the pan . add salt and pepper to the rice . use a wooden spoon to mix it all together .

column1: add the rice salt and pepper .

column1: add baby corn capsicum and spring onions to the wok .

column1: add baby corn capsicum and spring onions to the wok .

column1: place bulgur wheat in a bowl and add boiling water .
column2: pour water into the bowl . leave it for 10 minutes .

column1: place bulgur wheat in a bowl and add boiling water .
column2: put the bulgur wheat in a bowl . pour in boiling water in the bowl . add enough water to cover the what . leave for 10 minutes .

column1: place bulgur wheat in a bowl and add boiling water .
column2: put the bulgur wheat in a bowl . hold the boiling water over the bowl . carefully pour in the water enough to cover the wheat .

column1: place the salad on a plate and drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over it .
column2: put the salad onto a plate . pour lemon juice over the top of the salad . pour some olive oil over it . prepare to serve .

column1: place the salad on a plate and drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over it .

column1: place the salad on a plate and drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over it .
column2: using a spoon place the salad on the plate . add lemon juice over the salad . add olive oil over the plate . mix the mixture with a spoon .

column1: cut a tomato into quarters remove the seeds chop finely and add to the bowl .
column2: use a knife to cut the tomato into four pieces . use a spoon to scoop out the seeds . slice the tomato into thin slices . put the slices into the bowl .

column1: cut a tomato into quarters remove the seeds chop finely and add to the bowl .
column2: cut the tomato into four pieces with the knife . scoop out the seeds with a spoon and throw them away . chop the tomato pieces up into small pieces with the knife .

column1: cut a tomato into quarters remove the seeds chop finely and add to the bowl .

column1: drain the bulgur wheat and add to the salad and mix .

column1: drain the bulgur wheat and add to the salad and mix .
column2: pour the bulgur wheat into a bowel . squeeze the bulgur wheat to get the moisture out . add the bulgur what to the salad bowl . use a fork to mix everything together .

column1: season the bowl with salt pepper allspice cinnamon and mix .

column1: season the bowl with salt pepper allspice cinnamon and mix .

column1: season the bowl with salt pepper allspice cinnamon and mix .
column2: put the salt into the bowl . put the pepper into the bowl . put the all spice into the bowl . put the cinnamon into the bowl . with a spoon mix it all together .

column1: remove the leaves from stalks of mint chop finely and add to the parsley .

column1: remove the leaves from stalks of mint chop finely and add to the parsley .

column1: remove the leaves from stalks of mint chop finely and add to the parsley .
column2: take some stems of mint . remove the mint leaves from the stems . take a cutting board and a knife . cut the mint leaves in to small pieces . place the mint leaves in a bowl .

column1: finely chop a bundle of parsley and add to a bowl .
column2: use a knife to carefully chop the parsley . cut it up into small pieces . add the parsley into the bowl .

column1: finely chop a bundle of parsley and add to a bowl .
column2: put the parsley on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to remove the stems from the parsley . use the knife to cut the parsley leaves into very small pieces . put the chopped parsley into a bowl .

column1: finely chop a bundle of parsley and add to a bowl .
column2: cut the stems off of the bundle of parsley . get rid of the stems . cut the parsley into very small pieces . place the parsley into a bowl .

column1: finely chop the spring onions and add to a bowl .
column2: use a knife and carefully cut the spring onions into very small slices . add the onions to the mixture bowl .

column1: finely chop the spring onions and add to a bowl .
column2: put the onions next to each other and cut slowly into small circular pieces . finally add the onions to the bowl .

column1: finely chop the spring onions and add to a bowl .

column1: chop a cucumber in half remove the seeds finely chop and add to the bowl .
column2: carefully hold the cucumber and cut it in half with a knife . turn it over and use a spoon to scoop the seeds out of it .

column1: chop a cucumber in half remove the seeds finely chop and add to the bowl .
column2: use a knife to carefully cut a cucumber in half . use a spoon to scoop out the seeds . take each half of the cucumber and slice into small sections . then cut these sections into small cubes . add the diced cucumbers to the bowl .

column1: chop a cucumber in half remove the seeds finely chop and add to the bowl .
column2: put the cucumber on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the cucumber in half . use a teaspoon to scoop the seeds out and throw the seeds away . cut the cucumber into small piece . place the cut cucumber into the bowl .

column1: blend tomatoes oil salt garlic and basil together .
column2: put the canned tomatoes in the blended . add salt , one garlic clove , basil and one tablespoon of olive oil to the tomatoes . put the lid on the blender and give it a quick blend .

column1: blend tomatoes oil salt garlic and basil together .
column2: you need to add your tomatoes into the blender , be careful not to make a mess . you then can add some oil and salt into the blender . next is a clove of garlic and about 10 leaves of basil . take your lid and make sure it is secured onto your blender . now just give your mixture a quick blend .

column1: blend tomatoes oil salt garlic and basil together .
column2: get a blender . add tomatoes or tomato sauce to the blender . add in olive oil , salt , garlic and about 10 fresh basil leaves . turn the blender on and blend until smooth .

column1: cook the sauce in a pan .
column2: the sauce will bubble up in the pot do n't let it bubble too much . stir it together carefully .

column1: cook the sauce in a pan .
column2: simmer the sauce in the pan until the juices boil about half . then left it cool completely .

column1: cook the sauce in a pan .
column2: put the sauce in the saucepan on the burner over a medium heat . heat the sauce until small bubbles appear . stir occasionally with a spoon while it continues to simmer until the sauce has half of the sauce remaining . remove from heat and let the sauce cool completely .

column1: spread tomato sauce on the dough .
column2: sprinkle some corn meal on the pizza board . place the pizza dough on the board . smear pizza sauce on the pizza dough .

column1: spread tomato sauce on the dough .
column2: use a spoon to scoop the sauce onto the middle of the dough . use the spoon to spread it by moving the spoon in circles that get bigger .

column1: spread tomato sauce on the dough .
column2: put a small amount of cornmeal onto a pizza board . put the dough on the pizza board . use a spoon to put the sauce on the dough . use the back of the spoon to spread the sauce to cover the dough .

column1: place the pizza on the stone .
column2: place aluminum foil on grill and cooking stone over foil . turn on the grill to a medium heat and wait about five to ten minutes . slide the pizza that you have prepared from a wooden board to the cooking stone . make sure you do n't touch the hot surface of the grill with your hands .

column1: place the pizza on the stone .
column2: hold your pizza board by the handle . gently shake the pizza board to slide the pizza onto the pizza stone .

column1: place the pizza on the stone .
column2: place a cooking stone in the cook stove to heat it up . take the pizza you have made from the plate and place it in the middle of the cooking stone .

column1: place the cheese on the pizza .
column2: place chunks of cheese on top of the pizza . close the top of the pizza maker .

column1: place the cheese on the pizza .
column2: put the cheese on top of the sauce . close the lid .

column1: place the cheese on the pizza .
column2: you 'll want to take your cheese and place it in different places along the top of the pizza . do n't put it all in one spot , make sure it is spread around so it will melt evenly throughout your pizza .

column1: cook the pizza .
column2: carefully and slowly close the lid of the grill . let the pizza cook in the grill until it looks a little brown .

column1: cook the pizza .
column2: carefully place pizza on grill and close the lid . once pizza is golden brown , carefully use your pizza spatula and remove pizza from grill .

column1: cook the pizza .
column2: take a barbecue oven . take a pizza that is to be baked . put the pizza in the barbecue oven . close the lid of barbecue grill . cook the pizza till it is brown .

column1: place basil leaves on top of the pizza .

column2: get some fresh basil leaves . place them around on top of the pizza , so they are evenly spaced , but do n't cover the entire pizza with them . use about 6 -10 leaves . serve the pizza .

column1: place basil leaves on top of the pizza .
column2: put the fresh basil leaves on the top of the pizza . make sure not to put too much or too little .

column1: mix flour ghee salt together .
column2: in a tray add 1 and a half cup of flour . 2 tablespoon of clarified butter ( ghee ) . add as much or as little as you like . start with a little , you can always add more . now mix it all up .

column1: mix flour ghee salt together .
column2: put 1 1/2 cup of flour to mixing tray . add in 2 tablespoons of ghee . add salt to taste . mix everything together with a spoon .

column1: mix flour ghee salt together .
column2: put one and half cup of all purpose flour into mixing tray . pour two tablespoons of clarified butter into the flour . use a spoon to mix the butter into the flour until well blended . add salt to taste and mix with spoon .

column1: add some negella seeds carom seeds and oil .

column1: add some negella seeds carom seeds and oil .
column2: add some negella seeds to the mixture . put in one teaspoon of olive oil .

column1: add some negella seeds carom seeds and oil .
column2: put some negella seeds into your pan . put oil into your pan . with your hands mix the mixture .

column1: add some water and mix it well until it is a little bit hard .
column2: add a small amount of water . use your hands to mix the water in . mix with hands for eight minutes , until it becomes a dough . roll together into ball .

column1: add some water and mix it well until it is a little bit hard .
column2: add some water to the flour . using your hand , mix the water into the water . mix for 7 to 8 minutes until it makes a firm ball .

column1: add some water and mix it well until it is a little bit hard .
column2: first we will add some water to the mixture and mix it by hand . keep mixing for about 7 - 8 minutes and while you kneed the mixture it will slowly form into ball shape as you pinch in all together .

column1: heat some oil cumin seeds and coriander seeds in a pan .
column2: melt clarified butter in preheated pan . add cumin and coriander seeds to the pan .

column1: heat some oil cumin seeds and coriander seeds in a pan .
column2: put the frying pan on the stove and add a teaspoon of butter . add the cumin seeds . then add the coriander seeds . stir the seeds around and let them cook in the butter until they start to smell spicy . now you can remove the pan from the heat .

column1: add minced ginger red onion and give a quick stir .
column2: add the cut up ginger red onion . mix it around with a wooden spoon .

column1: add minced ginger red onion and give a quick stir .
column2: add the chopped ginger , add some green chilies . after 30 seconds add the cut up red onions . mix it up .

column1: add minced ginger red onion and give a quick stir .
column2: add ginger that has been cut up into small pieces . after 20 seconds add red onion that has been cut into small pieces . use a wooden spoon to stir up the ingredients .

column1: add peas salt and boiled potatoes .
column2: add frozen peas to the pan with the onions . stir for 1 1/2 minutes to cook . add black salt to the pan next . then pour in the cut up cooked potatoes .

column1: add peas salt and boiled potatoes .
column2: mix the frozen peas to the pot . saute them , keep mixing for about 1 and a half minutes . add some black salt . now put in the boiled potatoes .

column1: add peas salt and boiled potatoes .
column2: your going to want to mix everything together nicely . now add some frozen peas into the pan . stir them around with the wooden spatula . after 1 and a half minutes have passed , you can add in some salt . then take your boiled potatoes and place them in the pan with your other ingredients .

column1: shape the dough into a cone .
column2: flatten the dough ball and put it on a hard surface . roll it with a rolling pin into about a 6 inch oval . roll it about 1/4 inch thick , so it 's not too thin . cut the oval in half and moisten the cut edge with water . pull the cut edges together into a cone shape and press the moistened edges together .

column1: shape the dough into a cone .
column2: get a rolling pin . divide the dough into 3 equal parts . " flatten the dough with your hand and roll it out until it is a 6 circle . do n't make it too thin . " " . " get a knife and cut the circle of dough in half . move 1 of the halves away for now . put a little bit of water along the straight edge of the dough . gently pick up each end of the straight edge and bring them together , forming a cone shape . press the dough gently to seal the seam of the cone .

column1: shape the dough into a cone .
column2: put ball of dough on surface and use a rolling pin to roll it into a circle . make sure you do n't roll the dough too thin . use a knife to cut the circle of dough almost in half . apply water to the edge of the bigger piece of dough . fold to form a cone and seal it where water was applied .

column1: fill the dough with the mixture .
column2: shape the dough in to a cone shaped structure . take the filling mixture in a bowl . take a medium sized spoon . add the mixture in to the cone with the spoon . add 2.5 spoons of mixture in to the bowl .

column1: fill the dough with the mixture .
column2: hold the dough cone in one hand . get a tablespoon . put about 2 1/2 tablespoons of the potato mixture into the dough one .

column1: fill the dough with the mixture .
column2: using a spoon , put the mixture into the dough . continue adding spoonfuls of the mixture until the dough is filled to the top .

column1: deep fry the samosas .
column2: use a spoon to add the samosas to the hot deep fry oil . fry them over low to medium heat . after 5 minutes turn the heat up . fry for 12 to 15 minutes until samosas have a golden brown color .

column1: deep fry the samosas .
column2: take your samosas and place them in the hot oil . only add a few into the pot at the same time . maybe 4 or 5 . cook them on medium heat for 5 minutes and then increase the heat some for about 20 minutes . this will take the samosas to a nice golden brown color .

column1: deep fry the samosas .
column2: put them into the hot oil with a spoon that has holes in it . the oil in the pot should be on low - medium . after 5 minutes increase the heat . it will take about 15 minutes to get them a golden brown color .

column1: melt butter and olive oil in a hot pan .
column2: put a pan on the stove and turn on the heat . put two tablespoons of butter and two tablespoons of olive oil into a hot pan . let the butter melt in the pan .

column1: melt butter and olive oil in a hot pan .
column2: take a pan and place it on the stove . turn on the stove . heat the pan . add 2 tablespoons of butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil in to the pan . melt the butter in the pan .

column1: melt butter and olive oil in a hot pan .
column2: put 2 tablespoons of butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large frying pan . put the pan on the stove and turn it on . allow the mixture to melt until it is sizzling and bubbling .

column1: toss the contents of the bowl together .
column2: use two spoons and mix together all of the ingredients . make sure to mix everything together evenly . prepare to serve .

column1: toss the contents of the bowl together .
column2: take your serving spoons and toss around your salad . once you are done tossing the salad , it will be ready to serve !

column1: toss the contents of the bowl together .
column2: using two salad spoons , gently toss the contents of the bowl together . you want to get all the ingredients coated and evenly mixed , but not crushed or damaged .

column1: pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a small bowl and mix .
column2: take a small mixing bowl . pour some olive oil in to the bowl . take some balsamic vinegar . add the balsamic vinegar in to the bowl . whisk everything in the bowl .

column1: pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a small bowl and mix .
column2: get the bottle labeled olive oil and pour a little amount into the bowl . find the balsamic vinegar bottle ( has a strong smell ) and pour a small amount into bowl . stir the bowl with spoon so that everything gets covered in olive oil / vinegar mix .

column1: pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a small bowl and mix .
column2: pour the olive oil into a small bowl . pour the balsamic vinegar into a small bowl . use a small whip to mix it together .

column1: cut pieces of pita breads open and cut into small triangles .
column2: put the pita bread flat on the cutting board . get a serrated knife from the cutting block ( ask an adult if you are not allowed to use knives yet ) . lay the knife flat , parallel to the cutting board , with the sharp blade facing away from you , onto the pita bread , and slice them open . one half at a time , angle the knife and cut diagonally into 3/4 inch wide strips . take your pita bread strips and turn them ninety - degrees and cut 3/4 inch wide triangles .

column1: cut pieces of pita breads open and cut into small triangles .
column2: use a knife to cut the pita bread open in the center . cut the pita bread into 3 1/4 inch triangles .

column1: cut pieces of pita breads open and cut into small triangles .
column2: use a sharp knife to cut open the pita bread . cut pita bread into three quarter triangles .

column1: remove the bread from the pan and add the remaining pita bread to the pan .
column2: take a spoon with holes in it and scoop the bread pieces out onto a plate . carefully add the uncooked pieces of bread in the pan now .

column1: remove the bread from the pan and add the remaining pita bread to the pan .
column2: let the bread cook until it 's golden brown . use a big spoon with holes on the bottom to take the bread out of the pan . put the bread on a plate covered with paper towels to drain the oil . add the rest of the bread to the pan . repeat steps 2 through 4 .

column1: remove the bread from the pan and add the remaining pita bread to the pan .
column2: fry the bread pieces in the oil . when the bread pieces are brown remove them from the pan . take the fried bread in a plate . now add the remaining pieces of pita bread in the pan . fry them till they are golden brown .

column1: add half of the pita bread triangles to the pan and fry until golden brown .
column2: pour in half of the pita bread into the pan . cook the bread for a couple of minutes . stir the bread until both sides are golden brown .

column1: add half of the pita bread triangles to the pan and fry until golden brown .
column2: take a pan and heat it on the stove . add some butter in to the pan and melt the butter . cut the pita bread in to triangle shaped pieces . add the bread pieces in to the butter in the pan . fry the bread on both the sides .

column1: add half of the pita bread triangles to the pan and fry until golden brown .
column2: add pita bread to the pan . using a wooden spoon spread the bread around the pan . flip the bread so it cooks on both sides . with a spoon scoop out the pita bread and put it on a plate .

column1: add the pita bread lettuce cucumber tomatoes radishes lemon juice olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a bowl .
column2: now we are going to put our pita bread into the salad bowl . go ahead and add the lettuce in as well . put the cucumbers , radishes , and tomatoes in as well . now take the lemon juice , garlic and salt , along with the olive oil and balsamic vinegar . now just toss the ingredients and mix them well with a spoon .

column1: add the pita bread lettuce cucumber tomatoes radishes lemon juice olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a bowl .
column2: take a medium sized bowl and add pita bread pieces in to the bowl . add cut pieces of lettuce and cucumber in to the bowl . add cut pieces of tomatoes and radishes in to the bowl . add some lemon juice and olive oil in to the bowl . add little balsamic vinegar in to the bowl and mix .

column1: add the pita bread lettuce cucumber tomatoes radishes lemon juice olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a bowl .
column2: put the pita bread into the bottom of a large bowl . then add lettuce on top . add cucumbers , tomatoes , and radishes . then pour a cup of lemon juice and olive oil . finally add some balsamic vinegar and use your stirring spoons to mix it all together .

column1: add a chopped red onion sumac allspice and black pepper to a bowl and rub together .
column2: put the red onions into the larger bowl . put the spices into the larger bowl . if onions are stuck together , break them apart with your fingers . mix the onions and spice together . make sure onions are coated with spice .

column1: add a chopped red onion sumac allspice and black pepper to a bowl and rub together .
column2: pour the red onion into a bowl . pour the spices over the onion . rub the spices over the slices of onion until the onions are evenly coated .

column1: add a chopped red onion sumac allspice and black pepper to a bowl and rub together .
column2: put chopped onion in clean bowl . add sumac . add allspice . finally add black pepper . mix onions and spices together .

column1: add lemon juice garlic and salt to a small bowl and mix .
column2: get a bowl and add the lemon juice garlic and salt . take a whisk and mix it all together .

column1: add lemon juice garlic and salt to a small bowl and mix .
column2: pour your lemon juice into a small bowl . add the garlic clove and salt to the lemon juice . using a small whisk mix the lemon juice , garlic , and salt together .

column1: add lemon juice garlic and salt to a small bowl and mix .
column2: put the lemon juice , garlic clove and salt together in a small bowl . mix the ingredients together with a small whisk .

column1: cut some yukon gold potatoes add them to water in a pan and cook .
column2: cut 1 - 2 yukon gold potatoes into small pieces . add all the cut potatoes into water . cover the potatoes in the pan . allow the potatoes to cook .

column1: cut some yukon gold potatoes add them to water in a pan and cook .
column2: clean and cut some yukon gold potatoes into halves . place them in a saucepan and pour water until the potatoes are completely covered . cook the potatoes until they are cooked through .

column1: cut some yukon gold potatoes add them to water in a pan and cook .
column2: get a large pot . do not turn the heat on yet . you 'll need to cut at least 5 yukon gold potatoes in half . cut them in the middle to make them shorter , not long and skinny . put the potatoes in the pot and fill the pot up with cold water just until it covers the potatoes with about an inch of water . put the pot on the stove and turn the heat on . wait for the water to boil and turn the heat down just enough so the water is still boiling but not to where the bubbles are coming up hard and fast . cook the potatoes until tender . you can test the tenderness with a fork or an object that can poke through the potatoes . if the fork pokes all the way through the potato , they are ready .

column1: melt some butter in another pan and chop some leeks put them in water and keep ready .
column2: put some butter into the pan and let it melt . cut some leeks , get help from an adult to handle a knife . put the leeks in a bowl filled with water .

column1: melt some butter in another pan and chop some leeks put them in water and keep ready .
column2: chop some leeks and put them in water . get another pan and put it on the stove . put some butter in the pan . turn the stove on . stir the butter gently until it melts .

column1: melt some butter in another pan and chop some leeks put them in water and keep ready .
column2: put some butter into a pot and melt it . next put some leeks into a bowl of water and keep for later .

column1: brown some sausages in a separate pan take them out and keep aside .
column2: heat a pan on the stove . add the sausages to the pan and brown then . once brown , set them aside for later .

column1: brown some sausages in a separate pan take them out and keep aside .
column2: video has been disabled . video has been disabled .

column1: brown some sausages in a separate pan take them out and keep aside .
column2: cook the sausage until they turn brown in a different pan . when they are brown , take them out . put them on the side in a bowl .

column1: add some onion pieces to the pan and stir add chopped leeks some salt and freshly ground pepper to it .
column2: after the sausages are browned , remove the sausages and put them on a plate for later . keep the heat on because it is time to cook the onions and leeks . slowly add the onion pieces and stir around in the pan to get the flavor of the sausages mixed with the onions . slowly add the chopped leeks and stir again . add salt and pepper . stir together until mixed .

column1: add some onion pieces to the pan and stir add chopped leeks some salt and freshly ground pepper to it .
column2: chop a medium white onion into pieces about 1 - 2 inches long . chop 3 - 4 leek stalks into 1 - 2 inch long pieces . add the onions to the pan and stir them into the butter mix . add the leeks to the pan and stir them into the onions . shake a small amount of salt into the pan ; turn the pepper grinder 2 + times over pan .

column1: add some onion pieces to the pan and stir add chopped leeks some salt and freshly ground pepper to it .
column2: cut the onion in half and very carefully cut it into half circles , as thick as your pinkie . cut the leaks into circles of similar thickness as the onions and add them to the pan . put the onions in the pan . add the leaks to the pan . add a pinch of salt and a pinch of pepper .

column1: once the onions are brown add some butter and stir .
column2: wait until the onions are cooked . also check whether the onions are golden brown . add some portion of butter into the pan . mix altogether and stir it with the help of a spatula .

column1: once the onions are brown add some butter and stir .
column2: continue cooking the onions until they start to turn brown . when they are brown add your butter to the pan it stir it really well .

column1: once the onions are brown add some butter and stir .
column2: check and stir the onions over 2 - 3 minutes on medium heat . use the ruler - guide on a wrapped stick of butter to cut 2 tablespoons off the stick . if the onions have turned golden to brown in color , put the cut butter into the pan . stir the butter and onions until the butter begins to melt down .

column1: now add 2 tbsp of flour little oil and stir .
column2: measure 2 tablespoons of flour and add into pan . " add 1 tablespoon or a splash " " of oil and stir " " . "

column1: now add 2 tbsp of flour little oil and stir .
column2: add 2 tablespoons of flour to hot pan . add 1 tablespoon of oil . stir until evenly mixed .

column1: now add 2 tbsp of flour little oil and stir .
column2: add butter to the pan with the cooked onions . then add two tablespoons of flour . next add some olive oil to the pan . stir ingredients together .

column1: add some guinness beer and a can of beef broth and stir .
column2: add a bottle of guinness beer to the pan with the onions . next , pour in a can of beef broth . stir to mix the beer and broth with the other ingredients .

column1: add some guinness beer and a can of beef broth and stir .
column2: put in some beer . add a whole can of beef broth . mix it up .

column1: add some guinness beer and a can of beef broth and stir .
column2: after adding the flour , make sure to mix it until you can no longer see the flour . it will make a thick paste coating on the vegetables . if you are a child , you 'll want an adult 's help . slowly pour the guinness beer and the can of beef broth into the pot . make sure you know where your arms and face are at all times so you do n't burn yourself . stir the mixture in the pot over the heat carefully until all the way mixed together . do n't worry about beer being in the pot . it will only leave flavor in the gravy . all the alcohol will boil out but it is still wise to have an adult helping you with this recipe .

column1: now add the fried sausages to it and cook .
column2: cut the onion in two and then cut it into half circles . cut the leaks into half circles as well . add the onions and the leaks into a pan . add a pinch of salt and a pinch of pepper .

column1: now add the fried sausages to it and cook .
column2: brown the sausages in a skillet till the skin is cooked and brown . use a pair of tongs to turn them several times so they do n't burn . add those fried sausages to the other mixture . turn the heat down to low and cover the skillet with a lid . cook ( simmer ) for about 20 minutes .

column1: now add the fried sausages to it and cook .
column2: there is fried sausage on the side . the fried sausage needs to be cooked . put the fried sausage in the pan . watch it cook . turn stove off when it is done .

column1: put the lid on simmer for about 20 minutes .
column2: cover the pot with the lid . let it cook for 20 minutes .

column1: put the lid on simmer for about 20 minutes .
column2: after the sausages are browned , set them on a plate . put your gravy ingredients in the sausage pan and turn the heat on medium . stir while scraping the bottom of the pan so nothing sticks . place the sausages back into the pan . place the pan lid on the pan and allow the gravy to slowly boil for 20 minutes .

column1: put the lid on simmer for about 20 minutes .
column2: once the food is bubbling on the heat , turn down the heat on the burner to low . once the burner is on the low setting , put the lid onto the pan . set an oven timer for 20 minutes . occasionally lift the lid and stir the food to make sure it is not sticking to the pan . if the food is sticking , stir lightly , turn heat lower and recover with the lid .

column1: remove the lid and check if the sausages are done .
column2: carefully remove the lid of the pan . use tongs to lift the sausages and see if they have cooked all the way through . there should n't be any pink left .

column1: remove the lid and check if the sausages are done .
column2: after the sausages have been cooking for the time given in the recipe , carefully remove the lid of the pan . make sure to lift the side of the lid that is away from your face . the steam from the food can be very hot and burn your face . safety first ! use a fork or tongs to see if they are done . if the sausages are done , turn off the stove and carefully remove the pan from the heat . if the sausages are not done yet , put the lid back on the pan and cook the sausages for a few more minutes . keep checking the sausages until they are cooked all the way . once again , use safety in the kitchen over the hot stove . put the sausages on a plate and enjoy once they have cooled down to a safe eating temperature .

column1: remove the lid and check if the sausages are done .
column2: wait for some time . now remove the lid . check if the sausages have become soft . then it is cooked and ready to eat .

column1: add finely chopped fresh rosemary and stir put the lid on and cook in low heat for 8 - 10 minutes .
column2: add finely cut up fresh rosemary . to pan . stir into the other ingredients . cover pan with a lid . cook on low heat for 8 to 10 minutes .

column1: add finely chopped fresh rosemary and stir put the lid on and cook in low heat for 8 - 10 minutes .
column2: get a chopping board and a chopping knife . finely chop 1 teaspoon of fresh rosemary . put it in the pan with the sausages and stir . put the lid on the pan . turn the heat on low and cook for 8 to 10 minutes .

column1: add finely chopped fresh rosemary and stir put the lid on and cook in low heat for 8 - 10 minutes .

column1: plate some mash potatoes add canned peas over it and top with the banger gravy on top and serve .

column1: plate some mash potatoes add canned peas over it and top with the banger gravy on top and serve .
column2: put the potato on the plate . put some of the peas on top of the mashed potatoes . now , put the sausage on top and cover it in gravy . serve it up while it 's nice and hot !

column1: plate some mash potatoes add canned peas over it and top with the banger gravy on top and serve .
column2: take a spoonful of mashed potatoes from the pot and put it in the middle of the plate . take a spoonful of peas and put them around the mashed potatoes . pick up a sausage from the pan and put it on top of the mashed potatoes on the plate . take a spoonful of gravy from the pot and pour it on top of the potatoes and sausage . give the plate to someone to eat .

column1: add potatoes to the pot .
column2: wait until the food is boiling . add cut up potatoes to the pot .

column1: add potatoes to the pot .
