column1: add potatoes to the pot .
column2: grab the cut potatoes with your hand . place them into the pot with everything .

column1: add chili to the pot .
column2: take lamb and add it a pot . allow the mixture to come to a simmer ( bubbles ) . the add green chilies to the mixture . mix all together with a spoon . allow to simmer and then serve .

column1: add chili to the pot .
column2: add fresh green chili 's to the pot . you may add as much or as little as you wish . be careful : the pot is very hot .

column1: add chili to the pot .
column2: add the fresh chili to the mixture . it is up to you , and how much you like fresh chili in your food .

column1: add the tomatoes to the pot .
column2: add chopped tomatoes to the pot . spread the tomatoes across the top of the pot .

column1: add the tomatoes to the pot .
column2: slowly add some tomatoes to the pot . spread them out on the top and make sure they are chopped before adding them .

column1: add the tomatoes to the pot .
column2: add tomatoes to the pot using your hand . spread the tomatoes until it covers the food with your hand .

column1: add garam masala seeds and a bay leaf to the oil .
column2: add garam to the pan . add masala seeds to the pan . add bay leaf to the pan .

column1: add garam masala seeds and a bay leaf to the oil .
column2: pour in garam masala seeds into the hot oil in the pan . add a bay leaf into the pan .

column1: add garam masala seeds and a bay leaf to the oil .
column2: take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . take the garam masala seeds in a bowl . add the masala seeds in to the pan . add the bay leaf in to the oil .

column1: add water to the pot .
column2: pour in water around the pot . stir the mixture as it cooks .

column1: add water to the pot .
column2: take lamb and add to a skillet . add water to the pot . allow lamb to simmer with vegetables . bring to low boil . mix with a spoon and serve when heated .

column1: add water to the pot .
column2: take a pot on the stove . cook the ingredients in the pot . take some water in a glass . add some water in to the pot . mix the contents in the pot .

column1: add chili turmeric coriander cumin and salt .
column2: add chili to the pot . put in turmeric . add coriander and cumin . add some salt to the dish .

column1: add chili turmeric coriander cumin and salt .
column2: on a small plate measure out the chili powder , turmeric , ground coriander , and ground cumin . add the spices into the hot pan . next , add salt to taste . this will probably be about 1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon .

column1: add chili turmeric coriander cumin and salt .
column2: add chili to the bowl . add turmeric to the bowl . add coriander to the bowl . add cumin to the bowl . add salt to the bowl .

column1: add the lamb to the pot .
column2: use your hand to pick up the lamb pieces one by one . carefully put the lamb into the pot .

column1: add the lamb to the pot .
column2: place the lamb into the pot . stir the lamb so both sides are heated by the oil .

column1: add the lamb to the pot .
column2: take a pot on the stove . add some tempering in to the pot . cut the lamb in to small pieces . add the lamb in to the pan . cook the lamb pieces in the pan .

column1: add garlic ginger paste and chopped onions to the pot .
column2: add about three teaspoons of garlic ginger paste to the pan . put in some chopped onion - can be red or white onion .

column1: add garlic ginger paste and chopped onions to the pot .
column2: dump the bowl of ginger paste in the pan . use a spoon to scoop the onions into the pan .

column1: add garlic ginger paste and chopped onions to the pot .
column2: add garlic to the pan . put in some ginger paste . pour in some chopped onions . mix all the ingredients into the frying pan .

column1: cook garlic and ginger in butter in a pressure cooker .
column2: get out the pressure cooker . add the butter to the pressure cooker . add the garlic and ginger to the pressure cooker . turn on the pressure cooker to cook .

column1: cook garlic and ginger in butter in a pressure cooker .
column2: add 3 to 4 cloves of garlic in butter of pressure cooker . add 1 centimeter piece of garlic in butter of pressure cooker .

column1: cook garlic and ginger in butter in a pressure cooker .
column2: cut 3 garlic cloves into small cubes . cut a small piece of garlic into small cubes as well . put 2 tablespoons of butter in the pressure cooker , using measuring spoons . add the garlic and the ginger to the butter .

column1: add the lentils to the pressure cooker .
column2: first we will pour in our lentils , that also have ginger and garlic mixed in . do this by slowly pouring the mixture into the pan , making sure not to spill it outside the cooking pot . we want to keep it on high heat until our first timer goes off and then we will decrease the heat .

column1: add the lentils to the pressure cooker .
column2: carefully pour the water and the lentils ( beans ) into the pressure cooker . after the onions cook for a minute , pour the beans and water into the pot .

column1: add the lentils to the pressure cooker .
column2: in a pressure cooker saute ( cook ) diced ( chopped ) onions . add lentils and chopped ginger and chopped garlic mix to the cooked onions . cook everything on high heat . when you hear one whistle . lower the temperature .

column1: add water salt turmeric and chili powder to the pressure cooker .
column2: pour two cups of water into a pressure cooker . add 3 teaspoons of salt . add 1 teaspoon turmeric . add red chili powder to taste .

column1: add water salt turmeric and chili powder to the pressure cooker .
column2: add 2 cups of water in to the cooker . add two teaspoons of salt in to the pressure cooker . add a teaspoon of turmeric powder in to the cooker . add a teaspoon of chili powder in to the cooker . mix everything and simmer and cook .

column1: add water salt turmeric and chili powder to the pressure cooker .
column2: add two more cups of water to the pressure cooker . add three teaspoons of salt , a teaspoon of turmeric , a teaspoon of chili powder . cook for half and hour ( 30 minutes ) until the lentils are tender if you are cooking in a pot .

column1: melt ghee in a pan .
column2: put the ghee in the pan . make sure that it becomes a liquid .

column1: melt ghee in a pan .
column2: put 2 tablespoons of butter or ghee in the skillet . heat the skillet . when the butter melts add coriander and cumin spice .

column1: melt ghee in a pan .
column2: turn on the burner under the pan . use a measuring spoon to put 2 tablespoons of ghee into the pan . after the ghee is melted , measure 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds and add them to the pan .

column1: add the coriander seeds cumin seeds onions and green chili to a pan .
column2: when the oil is hot , put the coriander seeds in the pan - careful ! sometimes oil spits  " which can be very hot ! " " . " add the cumin seeds as well . now add the onions . now add the green chili peppers too .

column1: add the coriander seeds cumin seeds onions and green chili to a pan .
column2: add one teaspoon of crushed coriander seeds to the pan using a spoon . add one teaspoon of cumin seeds to the pan . chop one large onion into small cubes , add the onion to the pan . chop one green chili into small pieces , about the size of a black bean , and add them to the pan .

column1: add salt to the pan .
column2: measure 1 teaspoon of salt . add to pan .

column1: add salt to the pan .
column2: use a spoon to mix the lentils . add half a tea spoon of salt .

column1: add salt to the pan .
column2: in the pan , mix everything with the lentils . with a spoon , add the amount of salt instructed in the recipe .

column1: add tomato paste to the pan .
column2: get out your measuring spoons and find the tablespoon . scoop out two tablespoons of tomato paste into the pan . if the paste is having a hard time coming off the spoon use a clean finger or butter knife to help guide the paste into the pan .

column1: add tomato paste to the pan .
column2: once the onions are cooked and turned into golden brown . add 2 tablespoons of tomato paste . mix together in order to blend the paste accordingly .

column1: add tomato paste to the pan .
column2: put two tablespoons of tomato paste in the pan . use a spoon to stir .

column1: add the turka pan to the dal .
column2: get a spoon and put the turka into the dal . stir the turka and dal until mixed together . cook it on low heat for another 15 to 20 minutes .

column1: add the turka pan to the dal .
column2: add the turka to the dal by using the spoon to scoop the turka into the dal . let the dal simmer for another 15 to 20 minutes .

column1: add the turka pan to the dal .
column2: in a pan add oil mustard , onion and tomato . saute this for 2 - 4 minutes . pour this turka into the dal . simmer the dal for another 15 - 20 minutes . the dal is ready .

column1: add cream to the dal .
column2: pour the carton of cream into the pan . mix the cream into the pan .

column1: add cream to the dal .
column2: put the cream into the pot . you may use yogurt instead of cream . once cream is added , stir with spoon to mix .

column1: add cream to the dal .
column2: slowly pour the cream into the dal . stir the dal with a spoon until the cream is mixed in .

column1: add garam masala and cilantro to the dal .
column2: add half a teaspoon garam masala to pot . slice a handful of cilantro leaves into small strips and ad to pot .

column1: add garam masala and cilantro to the dal .
column2: add garam masala ( a mix of indian spices ) . add fresh cilantro leaves which have been torn into small pieces .

column1: add garam masala and cilantro to the dal .
column2: put a half of teaspoon of garam masala to the pot . add some chopped green cilantro leaves .

column1: arrange the tuna slices along with the seaweed and sprinkle some sesame seeds over it .
column2: take some sesame seeds in a bowl . cut the tuna in to thin slices . arrange the tuna slices in a plate . add the seaweed along side of the plate . sprinkle some seeds on to the tuna slices .

column1: arrange the tuna slices along with the seaweed and sprinkle some sesame seeds over it .
column2: place the tuna slices on the plate next to the seaweed . use a spoon to scoop up some sesame seeds . sprinkle the sesame seeds over the plate .

column1: arrange the tuna slices along with the seaweed and sprinkle some sesame seeds over it .
column2: take the sliced tuna pieces and arrange nicely on a plate . sprinkle the tuna slices with sesame seeds .

column1: chop some yellow onions and arrange the slices on the tuna .
column2: thinly slice some yellow onions carefully with a knife . set the onion slices on top of the tuna .

column1: chop some yellow onions and arrange the slices on the tuna .
column2: put yellow onions on the cutting board . chop the yellow onions carefully with a knife in straight lines . place the slices on the tuna .

column1: chop some yellow onions and arrange the slices on the tuna .
column2: chop yellow onions up into thin slices with a knife . arrange the onions on top of the tuna .

column1: tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces and put them on a plate .
column2: take the dry seaweed and tear it into smaller pieces . take the smaller pieces of seaweed and set them on a plate .

column1: tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces and put them on a plate .
column2: take a piece of seaweed and fold it in half to make it easier to tear . tear the seaweed down the fold and keep doing this until you tear it all into smaller pieces , about 2 inches wide . set the small seaweed pieces to the side on a plate .

column1: tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces and put them on a plate .
column2: use your hands to tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces . put the seaweed pieces on a plate .

column1: cut tuna meat into thin slices .
column2: take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take the tuna meat on the cutting board . cut the tuna in to long thin slices . cut the tuna entirely . take the tuna slices on a plate .

column1: cut tuna meat into thin slices .
column2: hold the tuna carefully . cut the tuna into thin strips with a knife .

column1: cut tuna meat into thin slices .
column2: place the tuna onto a cutting board . hold one end of the tuna and use a sharp knife to slowly cut off thin pieces .

column1: put some seaweed salad on top place some bean sprouts and lettuce on the side .
column2: add some seaweed salad on the plate . put some bean sprouts on the side of the plate . next to the bean sprouts add some lettuce to the plate .

column1: put some seaweed salad on top place some bean sprouts and lettuce on the side .
column2: we can put our seaweed salad on top of the fish . a nice helping of beansprouts and lettuce can also be added to the plate as well .

column1: put some seaweed salad on top place some bean sprouts and lettuce on the side .
column2: place 1 - 2 spoon fulls of seaweed salad on top . then place about a 1/4 cup of beans sprouts and a few pieces of lettuce on the side .

column1: wrap everything in the seaweed dip in soy sauce and relish .
column2: use your seaweed papers to gently place your food items into . roll the seaweed around the food items to make a hotdog shaped roll with the food items inside . use your hands to dip your seaweed roll into the soy sauce .

column1: wrap everything in the seaweed dip in soy sauce and relish .
column2: pick up each topping and put them on the seaweed . roll it up . dip the roll in soy sauce and relish .

column1: wrap everything in the seaweed dip in soy sauce and relish .
column2: grab seaweed wrap with hand . using chopsticks , grab contents that you want on wrap . using both hands , roll contents into seaweed wrap . then use spoon to drizzle soy sauce onto wrap to desired taste .

column1: add refried beans to a preheated pan .
column2: put a pan on the stove and turn on the burner . when the pan is warm add the refried beans to the pan .

column1: add refried beans to a preheated pan .
column2: heat the pan up until it 's hot . add the refried beans to the pan . you can find the beans at any grocery store .

column1: add refried beans to a preheated pan .
column2: open a can of refried beans . place a no - stick frying pan on the stove and turn the burner onto low - medium . using a rubber spatula , scoop the refried beans out of the can into the warmed up pan .

column1: add chili powder and stir to cook under medium heat .
column2: add several pinches of chili powder over top of mixture . stir mixture non - stop with a wooden spoon over medium heat . we will stir the mixture for about 3 to 4 minutes , just until it gets hot .

column1: add chili powder and stir to cook under medium heat .
column2: add a little bit of chili powder and stir the mixture . continue keeping the pan on the stove over medium heat . keep stirring for about 3 minutes until it gets hot .

column1: add chili powder and stir to cook under medium heat .
column2: put some chili powder into the meat . with your spoon mix around your chili powder into your meat .

column1: on a new preheated pan add the flour tortilla and heat on both sides .
column2: take the tortilla bread and put it on your hot pan . warm the first side for one minute . flip over your tortilla bread and heat the other side for one minute as well .

column1: on a new preheated pan add the flour tortilla and heat on both sides .
column2: set the flower tortilla in the heated pan . after a minute , use tongs to turn the tortilla over . after another minute , remove the tortilla from the pan .

column1: on a new preheated pan add the flour tortilla and heat on both sides .
column2: put a frying pan on the stove and turn on the heat to medium . let the pan get hot for about a minute . put the flour tortilla in the pan and let it heat for one minute . take tongs and turn the tortilla to the other side in the pan . heat the tortilla for one minute and then remove it with the tongs .

column1: place the beans on the tortilla and spread out .
column2: use a spoon to put the beans in the middle of the tortilla . then spread the beans left and right using the spoon . next , put a piece of lettuce on top of the beans .

column1: place the beans on the tortilla and spread out .
column2: lay the tortilla flat on a large plate . use a spoon to scoop some refried beans on to the center of the tortilla . spread the refried beans on the open tortilla . make sure to leave some room around the edge of the tortilla .

column1: place the beans on the tortilla and spread out .
column2: get a tortilla , refried beans , a plate , and a spoon . take the tortilla out of the package and lay it on the plate . get a scoop of refried beans and spread it onto the middle of your tortilla . spread the beans on the tortilla almost to the edge . imagine spreading frosting only down the middle of a cake .

column1: add lettuce diced tomatoes onions olive pepper salsa sour cream and cheddar cheese .
column2: add on top of the re - fried beans on the tortilla chopped up lettuce evenly . now add about 10 pieces of cubed tomatoes , 5 cubed pieces of onion and about 4 pieces of sliced jalapeno peppers and black olives . now add a spoonful evenly across the burrito of mild salsa and sour cream . now add a layer of of shredded cheddar cheese . make sure that all ingredients are spread out evenly and do n't add to much .

column1: add lettuce diced tomatoes onions olive pepper salsa sour cream and cheddar cheese .
column2: on top of the re fried beans place lettuce , diced tomatoes , onions , black olives , and jalapeno peppers . next add the salsa and sour cream . top it off with shredded cheddar cheese .

column1: add lettuce diced tomatoes onions olive pepper salsa sour cream and cheddar cheese .
column2: put lettuce and tomato on top . then put onions , black olives and jalapeno peppers . then places the salsa and sour cream . finally , top with shredded cheddar cheese .

column1: roll the burrito up and use sour cream to seal it up .
column2: pick up one edge of the burrito and tuck it in the side . then roll the burrito until it 's almost all the way rolled up . then on the last piece you did n't roll up spread a little bit of sour cream . to make the burrito look nice you can press the edges in .

column1: roll the burrito up and use sour cream to seal it up .
column2: lift one edge of the burrito over the topping and roll . tuck the edge under the toppings and keep rolling . spread some sour cream on the bottom edge to seal . tuck in each end of burrito to finish .

column1: roll the burrito up and use sour cream to seal it up .
column2: pull one edge of the tortilla over the toppings . tuck the edge under the toppings and roll it until a half inch of tortilla remains . use a spoon to spread a small spot of sour cream near the open edge of the tortilla . roll the tortilla over the sour cream to seal the toppings . fold the ends of the tortilla to seal the burrito .

column1: cut the tuna into smaller sections .
column2: cut the big fish into bi pieces . use a big knife . keep the pieces on ice .

column1: cut the tuna into smaller sections .
column2: place the fish on flat surface . cut the fish 's fin . now starting in the middle make a cross cut horizontally and then vertically . now you will make a cut parallel to the table . this will allow us to pull 4 chunks of fish .

column1: cut the tuna into smaller sections .
column2: using a big knife chop away the fins . use the knife 's edge to slice the top of the fish down form it 's head to it 's tail . use the knife to cut all the way down the fish . use the knife and cut the fish into squares . with your knife carefully take the fish meat out .

column1: cut the skin off the section .
column2: use the big knife to cut a hunk of skin from the middle . make sure the hunk of skin is a long hunk of skin . place the hunk of skin aside .

column1: cut the skin off the section .
column2: steel yourself to touch a cold dead fish . carefully , holding the knife , slice into the cold dead fish as close to the skin as possible , carefully slide the knife a bit at at time into the fish , slicing into the flesh until the skin is fully free from the meat of the fish . you may need to slice along the skin many times until it 's completely separated . discard the skin .

column1: cut the skin off the section .
column2: using a sharp knife cut the skin off of the fish . as you are cutting keep pulling the skin back until it is removed .

column1: cut the dark part off .
column2: first take the skin off the fish . next remove any thing on the fish that is still dark .

column1: cut the dark part off .
column2: use a knife to cut off the dark part of the fish . set the dark part of the fish aside .

column1: cut the dark part off .
column2: using a sharp knife , cut the dark part of the fish off . as you are cutting the dark pieces off keep rolling back until all of it is removed .

column1: cut the tuna into slices .
column2: with a sharp knife , carefully cut the tuna into slices . place the tuna slices onto a plate .

column1: cut the tuna into slices .
column2: sliced the fish into pieces . the pieces should be the size and thickness of a small pancake .

column1: cut the tuna into slices .
column2: hold the tuna with one hand . cut the tuna into slices with a knife in your other hand . be careful to not cut too close to where you are holding the tuna . try to make the slices about as think as a slice of bread .

column1: place wasabi next to the tuna .
column2: use the knife to pick up a tiny piece of the wasabi . you do n't need a whole lot so be careful . using your knife put the wasabi next to the tuna on the plate .

column1: place wasabi next to the tuna .
column2: place tuna on plate . add a nice size scoop of wasabi next to the tuna .

column1: place wasabi next to the tuna .
column2: place the bowl with the wasabi on the counter . place the plate with the tuna next to the wasabi bowl . get a table knife or spoon . cut off a piece of wasabi in the shape of a 1 inch square . place the wasabi square you just cut next to the tuna .

column1: take the cooked mashed potatoes and flour in a bowl .
column2: take a big mixing bowl . cook the mashed potatoes in a pot . remove the water from the mashed potatoes . add the mashed potatoes in to the bowl . add some flour in to the bowl .

column1: take the cooked mashed potatoes and flour in a bowl .
column2: pour the cooked mashed potatoes into a bowl . carefully pour flour on top of the potatoes in the bowl .

column1: into a cloth add the mashed potatoes and squeeze out all the water .
column2: put the mashed potatoes into a cloth . wrap the potatoes tightly in the cloth . squeeze tightly . drain all the water out of it .

column1: into a cloth add the mashed potatoes and squeeze out all the water .
column2: put the potatoes into the cloth . with your hand twist the top of the cloth . twist the cloth until all the access juices come out .

column1: into a cloth add the mashed potatoes and squeeze out all the water .
column2: take our potatoes and put them into a clean cloth . now wrench the cloth as it starts to smash the potatoes . keep doing so to drain the starch and moisture out of the potatoes . just go until you have as much as you can get into your bowl .

column1: pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around .
column2: scoop up some batter with a ladle . pour the batter into a pan . spread the batter around the bottom of the pan .

column1: pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around .
column2: dip the ladle in the batter and fill the ladle to the top with batter . pour all the batter that 's in the ladle into the center of the skillet . drag the bottom of the ladle around in the batter to spread it out into a big circle in the skillet .

column1: pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around .
column2: use your ladle to scoop a full ladle of the batter out of the bowl . place your ladle full of batter into the center of the heated pan , as you use your ladle to smooth the mix around to make it all even and spread .

column1: melt little butter and olive oil in a pan .
column2: add a pad of butter and olive oil in the pan . spread the butter and oil so it spreads around the pan evenly .

column1: melt little butter and olive oil in a pan .
column2: take a pan and heat the pan . add little butter in the pan . melt the butter in the pan . add some olive oil in the pan . heat the oil in the pan .

column1: melt little butter and olive oil in a pan .
column2: add both butter and olive oil into the heated pan . swirl the butter and olive oil around in the pan until the butter is melted and it is mixed in with the olive oil .

column1: let it cook for 2 - 3 minutes on both side until golden and serve .
column2: let it cook for 2 to 3 minutes . when one side is golden brown flip it over and cook the other side . let the second side cook for 2 to 3 minutes , remove it with a spatula . set on to a plate .

column1: let it cook for 2 - 3 minutes on both side until golden and serve .
column2: let the dough cook for 2 to 3 minutes . flip the thing by jerking the pan up . make sure both sides are a nice golden brown color .

column1: let it cook for 2 - 3 minutes on both side until golden and serve .
column2: move it around so it does not burn . once one side is done flip it by moving the pan forward in a fast motion . after both sides are done serve it .

column1: add a little salt white pepper stir and add milk in batches to form a batter .
column2: add a pinch of white salt to the bowl . add white pepper to the bowl . add milk to the bowl slowly . stir the mixture .

column1: add a little salt white pepper stir and add milk in batches to form a batter .
column2: add some salt to the bowl . put in some white pepper . add about half of your milk . use a whisk and stir together . let it sit for 20 minutes .

column1: add a little salt white pepper stir and add milk in batches to form a batter .
column2: put some salt and white pepper into the bowl . slowly pour about half of the milk into the bowl and stir with a whisk . let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .

column1: add the starch into the batter and let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .
column2: add starch into the batter . allow the batter to sit undisturbed for 20 minutes .

column1: add the starch into the batter and let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .
column2: with your fingers get the starch out of the bowl and put it in the other bowl . let your batter sit for about 20 mins .

column1: add the starch into the batter and let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .

column1: form the meat into a patty .

column1: when the bottom turns brown flip the burger .
column2: use a heavy skillet and place four raw hamburgers in a hot skillet . use a flat metal spatula to flatten the burger as the meat starts to cook , and as the fat comes out , using your spatula , turn the burgers so the other side can also get brown . as the meat cooks , you will see crevices in the meat where the fat is coming out of the meat , and the top will become super crunchy while the inside of the burger stays juicy .

column1: when the bottom turns brown flip the burger .

column1: slice the tomatoes onions and pickles .

column1: finely chop the tuna and salmon .

column1: mix some chopped celery potatoes onions and clam juice .
column2: get 2 pots , 2 cans of clams in juice , a strainer , and 2 cups of chopped celery , 2 cups of chopped potatoes , and 1/2 a small onion that an adult chopped for you . use a can opener or ask a helper to open your cans of clams . hold a strainer over the pot and pour the clams and juice through it . clams stay in the strainer and your juice is the only thing in the pot now . put the chopped onion , celery , and potatoes in the same pot .

column1: mix some chopped celery potatoes onions and clam juice .

column1: heat some butter in a pot and add half - half and corn starch .

column2: get out a baking dish . spread oil on bottom and sides of baking dish .

column1: add dijon mustard milk and salt to eggs and whisk it .
column2: take a large measuring jar . add 8 eggs in to the jar and add a tablespoon of dijon mustard . add 2 cups of 2 % milk in to the jar . add teaspoon of salt in to the jar . mix everything with a hand mixer .

column1: add dijon mustard milk and salt to eggs and whisk it .
column2: take 3 - 4 eggs and add in to a bowl . add dijon mustard in to bowl . add 2 cups of milk into it . add a teaspoon of salt also in to the bowl . after adding all , whisk altogether properly .

column1: add dijon mustard milk and salt to eggs and whisk it .
column2: put in 2 tablespoons of dijon mustard into the bowl with the eggs . then add in 2 cups of 2 percent milk . next add in a teaspoon of salt . whisk all ingredients together .

column1: place the toast in the pan .
column2: lay the pieces of toast next to each other into the glass baking dish in a single layer . you can squish the toast if you have to .

column1: place the toast in the pan .
column2: get the glass baking dish . take 6 pieces of slice bread . cover the bottom of the dish with the slices of bread . press and squeeze them down onto the baking dish .

column1: place the toast in the pan .
column2: place the bread in a pan side by side . try to fit as many in the pan as you can .

column1: pour some of the egg mixture on top .
column2: hold the measuring cup with the egg mixture by the handle . face the spout of the measuring cup towards the bread and start pouring . pour for one- two seconds in the middle of each slice until there is a large circle of egg mixture on each slice . do not pour all the mixture in at once , instead pour it slowly .

column1: pour some of the egg mixture on top .
column2: toast the bread for 20 min . 8 crack egg 2 cup 2 % milk . layer with cheese , ham , pour remaining egg . bake the dish .

column1: pour some of the egg mixture on top .
column2: grab your measuring cup that is full of the egg mix . pour some of the egg mix over each piece of bread .

column1: add a layer of cheese and ham .
column2: put a slice of cheese on each piece of bread . put sliced ham on each piece of cheese .

column1: add a layer of cheese and ham .
column2: arrange the bread pieces in a layer . place one sheet of cheese on all the bread pieces and make it a layer . cut the ham into thin slices . place the slices of ham as a layer on top of cheese .

column1: add a layer of cheese and ham .
column2: put a cheese slice on each piece of bread . get a cutting board . cut 8 pieces of thin ham into 3 strips . put the ham on top of the cheese . make sure you cover all the cheese with the ham .

column1: add a layer of cheese and top with bread .
column2: sprinkle cheese over the ham . make sure it 's pretty uniform over the ham . place the bread over top of the cheese .

column1: add a layer of cheese and top with bread .
column2: sprinkle grated cheese on top of lunch meat . put 6 slices of bread to cover cheese .

column1: add a layer of cheese and top with bread .
column2: sprinkle cheese across the top of the ham to cover all the meat . place slices of bread on top of the cheese covering all the cheese .

column1: pour the egg mixture on top .
column2: after you place the bread in the pan dump mixture over the bread . spread egg mixture over bread .

column1: pour the egg mixture on top .
column2: grab the bowl containing the egg mixture . pour the egg mixture evenly over the top of all of the slices of bread .

column1: pour the egg mixture on top .
column2: after keeping the breads ready . break the eggs and beat into the bowl . pour the egg mixture on top of the bread . pour it slowly .

column1: sprinkle with cheese .
column2: put a cup of grated cheese on a plate . use your hand to pick it up off the plate . sprinkle the cheese over top of all the bread until the cheese is gone .

column1: sprinkle with cheese .
column2: get shredded cheese . sprinkle the cheese on top of the food .

column1: sprinkle with cheese .
column2: with your hands , sprinkle your grated cheese on top of the bread . make sure there is an even amount of cheese on each piece of bread .

column1: bake in the oven .
column2: take the dish . put the dish into the oven on the rack .

column1: bake in the oven .
column2: turn the oven on to the temperature the instructions say ( 350 , 375 , or 400 ) . wait for the oven to beep . put the pan in the oven and set a timer for the amount of time the instructions say ( probably 25 minutes ) . wait until the oven beeps again . turn the oven off and carefully pull the dish out .

column1: bake in the oven .
column2: place the pan in the oven . once the bread is toasted and the cheese is melted to a golden brown , you may take it out .

column1: put the mixture in a jar and press firm to the bottom .
column2: clean hands . get jar . place cut up cabbage in jar . cover cabbage in the liquid known as brine . press down to pack down cabbage in jar .

column1: put the mixture in a jar and press firm to the bottom .
column2: wash your hands . chop cabbage . use your hands to put cabbage in jar . pack cabbage down . add brine to jar while packing cabbage down .

column1: put the mixture in a jar and press firm to the bottom .
column2: grab the mixture with your hand and place it in a jar . when you put on handful press it hard hard squishing it to the bottom . keep doing this with more handfuls .

column1: add 20 g salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill .
column2: put in 20 grams of salt . add 1 teaspoon of caraways seeds . put in 1 teaspoon of juniper berries . add 1/2 teaspoon of dill to the bowl .

column1: add 20 g salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill .
column2: hold the salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill over the bowl . pour everything in the bowl .

column1: add 20 g salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill .
column2: use a kitchen scale to measure out 20 grams of caraway seeds . sprinkle seeds on cabbage . use a one teaspoon measuring spoon to measure 1 teaspoon of juniper berries . use a 1/2 teaspoon measuring spoon to measure out 1/2 teaspoon of dill tips . sprinkle juniper berries and dill on cabbage .

column1: massage the cabbage with the seasoning .
column2: take your hands and smush the cabbage to make sure the sea salt gets into the cabbage really well . squeeze the cabbage with your fingers for about 10 minutes .

column1: massage the cabbage with the seasoning .
column2: toss cabbage in a bowl with brining liquid . kneed in that bowl for approximately 10 minutes .

column1: massage the cabbage with the seasoning .
column2: use your hands to mix the salt into the cabbage . use your hands to really squeeze the cabbage for about 10 minutes .

column1: finely chop a cabbage to small pieces .
column2: cut the cabbage into half . then cut the cabbage in half again . cut the middle parts off first to remove the core . slowly slice the cabbage from one end to another in small pieces . then turn the cabbage around to cut it in the other direction .

column1: finely chop a cabbage to small pieces .
column2: first we want to finely chop the cabbage . using the knife be very careful , not to cut yourself . first cut the cabbage in half and then into quarters . this will help you get the core out . now chop the cabbage into fine strips .

column1: finely chop a cabbage to small pieces .
column2: carefully hold the cabbage . cut the cabbage in half carefully and slowly avoiding your hand . take a chunk of cabbage and cut it into thin lines carefully .

column1: seal the jar and put in dark place for 4 weeks .
column2: put the lid on top of the jar . place a rubber band around the top . put it into a dark place for 4 weeks .

column1: seal the jar and put in dark place for 4 weeks .
column2: put the lid on the jar . make sure the rubber band is fitted correctly on the jar . put bracket on top of jar to seal the jar .

column1: seal the jar and put in dark place for 4 weeks .
column2: place the lid onto your fermenting jar . make sure the rubber band is fitted correctly around the outside . use the tool to seal the jar by pushing it on both sides so no oxygen enters your jar .

column1: fry the corn dogs until golden brown .
column2: heat oil in a large pot with a thermometer . carefully place the corn dogs in the heated oil with the sticks resting on the edge of the pot . the sticks should be hanging outside over the edge of the pot and not laying all the way in the hot pot of oil . fry them in the oil until the batter turns a darker , golden brown color . once they are cooked and golden brown , carefully remove them from the oil by slowly grabbing the stick ends that are on the edge of the pot . place them onto a serving dish and serve with a side of mustard .

column1: fry the corn dogs until golden brown .
column2: put the corn dogs into the boiling oil . boil for 3 to 5 minutes . remove when the corn dogs are golden brown .

column1: fry the corn dogs until golden brown .
column2: watch the corn dogs as they fry . fry them for 3 - 5 minutes until you see them turning golden brown .

column1: mix an egg creamed corn and salt in a food processor .
column2: crack and egg into the food processor bowl . add creamed corn and salt to the food processor bowl . put the lid on the processor and lock into place . turn on the processor and mix well .

column1: mix an egg creamed corn and salt in a food processor .
column2: break an egg into the processor . spoon in the creamed corn and salt into the processor .

column1: mix an egg creamed corn and salt in a food processor .
column2: add an egg to the food processor . add 4 tablespoons of creamed corn . put in 1/4 teaspoon of salt . put the lid on the food processor . mix everything in the food processor .

column1: coat the hot dogs in the batter .
column2: dip the hot dog into the batter . turn the hot dog so it gets batter on all sides and is completely covered .

column1: coat the hot dogs in the batter .
column2: dip the hot dog into the batter several times to cover it . hold the batter bowl over the oil with the hot dog .

column1: coat the hot dogs in the batter .
column2: holding the stick dunk the hot dog into the batter . twist the stick so the hot dog turns and gets covered with batter on all sides . lift the hot dog out of the bowl and let any extra batter drip off back into the bowl .

column1: add milk sugar flour baking powder and corn meal and mix .
column2: add milk and sugar to the food processor . add flour and baking powder to the food processor . add corn meal to the food processor . press the button to mix the ingredients .

column1: add milk sugar flour baking powder and corn meal and mix .
column2: pour in milk to the processor . add 1/4 cup of sugar . add 1 cup of flour . add 2 teaspoons of baking powder . put in 1 cup of corn meal and then put the lid on and blend everything together .

column1: add milk sugar flour baking powder and corn meal and mix .
column2: pour a cup of milk into the processor bowl . add in a 1/4 cup of sugar to the bowl . then add i cup of all purpose flour and 2 teaspoons of baking powder . next add one cup of corn meal to the processing bowl . put the lid on the processor and turn it on to mix ingredients together .

column1: hold the hot dog in the oil .
column2: hold the hot dog by the stick . dip it in the oil and hold it there .

column1: hold the hot dog in the oil .
column2: dip the hot dog in batter . hold the hot dog in the hot oil while it cooks .

column1: hold the hot dog in the oil .
column2: hold the corndog by the wooden stick . lower the corndog into the hot oil and keep hold of the wooden stick .

column1: add tomato chili garlic chili powder coriander powder masala powder turmeric powder and salt to the chicken and mix .
column2: add the diced tomatoes we just cut into the bowl of chicken . now add in the strips of green chili peppers . add in the ginger garlic paste we made earlier . now add in all of the spices we measured at the beginning - you should have red chili powder , coriander powder , vera masala powder , turmeric powder , and salt . use your hands to mix the chicken , tomatoes , chilies , and spices together until everything is mixed well and the chicken is coated in spices . leave the chicken in the bowl for ten minutes before you move on to the next step .

column1: add tomato chili garlic chili powder coriander powder masala powder turmeric powder and salt to the chicken and mix .
column2: add your bowl of tomatoes to your bowl . add your bowl of green chilies to the bowl . add ginger garlic paste to your bowl . add chili powder to your bowl . add coriander powder to your bowl .

column1: add tomato chili garlic chili powder coriander powder masala powder turmeric powder and salt to the chicken and mix .
column2: add the chopped tomatoes , green chili , ginger garlic paste , red chili powder , coriander power , masala powder , turmeric powder and salt . mix it well . put it to the side for 10 minutes .

column1: grind the shallots into a paste .
column2: grind the shallots until it turns into a paste . when it turns creamy , it 's ready .

column1: grind the shallots into a paste .
column2: take some shallots in a bowl . remove the peel of the shallots . take a blender jar and add the shallots . turn on the blender and grind the shallots in to paste . take the paste in a bowl .

column1: grind the shallots into a paste .
column2: mush the shallots into a paste in a bowl . make sure there are no big pieces .

column1: cook the chicken in a pan with oil .
column2: use a spoon to put the chicken into an oiled pan . turn the stove to medium heat . stir the chicken and cook until it is soft .

column1: cook the chicken in a pan with oil .
column2: heat the oil in the pan . put chicken in the pan . let the chicken cook on medium heat with the lid on .

column1: cook the chicken in a pan with oil .
column2: hold the bowl of chicken over the pan . take a wooden spoon and scoop the chicken in slowly without splashing it around .

column1: cook the onion paste in a pan with oil until the color changes .
column2: in a pan that 's heat d up put onion paste in it . let cook until it changes color like a light brown . remember to stir .

column1: cook the onion paste in a pan with oil until the color changes .
column2: pour the onion paste into your heated pan with oil . use a spatula to mix the onion paste around in the pan . it is done until you notice the onion paste change from white to a dark brown .

column1: cook the onion paste in a pan with oil until the color changes .
column2: add the onion paste to the pan with hot oil . cook in the pan until the color changes .

column1: when the chicken is soft add onion paste and mix .
column2: take a wooden spoon . poke the chicken and it will seem software . use the spoon to slowly scoop in the onion mix . use the spoon to mix everything up .

column1: when the chicken is soft add onion paste and mix .
column2: while the chicken is still cooking , remove the lid . once the chicken has become soft , add the onion paste . stir the onion paste together with the chicken until it is well - mixed .

column1: when the chicken is soft add onion paste and mix .
column2: when the chicken is soft add onion paste . mix it up real well . do n't forget to add a little water .

column1: add water and cook more .
column2: add a half cup of water to the pan . cook for two minutes more .

column1: add water and cook more .
column2: now all you need to do is add water into your pan . once you have the water in , slowly turn your mixture around in the pan using a spoon . keep doing this for 2 minutes as your dish cooks .

column1: add water and cook more .
column2: add some water to the mixture . cook for two more minutes .

column1: add coriander leaves and stir .
column2: add coriander leaves . mix well with your mixing utensil - usually a wooden spoon works best for this , but you can also use a plastic spoon or a spatula . serve .

column1: add coriander leaves and stir .
column2: take a cooking dish in the pan . cut the coriander leaves in to small pieces . add the coriander leaves in to the curry . take a big wooden spoon . mix the coriander leaves with the curry in the pan .

column1: add coriander leaves and stir .
column2: now all you need to do is add in the coriander leaves to your pan . add the leaves in and take a wooden spoon , or whatever cooking utensil you have , and mix the leaves about the entire dish . be careful though , the pan is still quite hot .

column1: add the onion bell pepper and bean sprout to the wok .
column2: add oil to wok . heat oil in wok . add onion , bell pepper and bean sprout . mix . saute .

column1: add the onion bell pepper and bean sprout to the wok .
column2: cut the onions and bell pepper on a cutting board . heat up oil in the wok . carefully pour vegetables into the wok . stir the vegetables with a spoon . let it simmer until cooked .

column1: add the onion bell pepper and bean sprout to the wok .
column2: put onions , bell pepper and bean sprouts into the hot wok . use a wooden spoon to stir while cooking .

column1: add the chicken and shrimp to the wok .
column2: add your cooked chicken to the vegetables in the wok . next add the shrimp to the wok . stir all the meats and vegetables together while they are frying .

column1: add the chicken and shrimp to the wok .
column2: put the cooked chicken and shrimp into the hot wok . use a wooden spatula to stir the shrimp and chicken .

column1: add the chicken and shrimp to the wok .
column2: take the plate of cooked chicken and put the chicken into the wok . take the plate of shrimp and put the shrimp into the wok . take a spatula and stir all the ingredients in the wok .

column1: cook the egg in the wok .
column2: put the egg into the pan . stir the egg around mixing it with the oil .

column1: cook the egg in the wok .
column2: put oil in the wok and heat on the stove top . crack an egg in a bowl . pour egg into hot wok . use a wooden spatula to break the egg up in the wok while cooking .

column1: cook the egg in the wok .
column2: add oil to your wok and place it on stove . crack your egg into a bowl . add the egg to your wok once the oil is hot . use your wooden spoon to mix the egg , giving the woke a few shakes as well . cook the egg until it is scrambled and cooked through .

column1: add the curry powder oyster sauce soy sauce and chili to the wok .
column2: put the curry powder into the wok with everything else . pour the oyster sauce into the wok and use a spoon to get it all if you need to . pour the soy sauce into the wok . add the chopped red chili to the wok . use a wooden spoon to stir everything while it cooks .

column1: add the curry powder oyster sauce soy sauce and chili to the wok .
column2: first add the pre - measured curry powder to your pot . then add the oyster sauce and soy sauce . add your red chopped chili . now use a wooden spoon to mix it .

column1: add the curry powder oyster sauce soy sauce and chili to the wok .
column2: in a heated pan add curry powder . add in soy sauce and oyster sauce . add chili . mix all ingredients well .

column1: add the noodles to the wok .
column2: put noodles into the frying pan . take a pair of scissors to cut up the noodles into smaller sections .

column1: add the noodles to the wok .
column2: take the cooked noodles out of the strainer and add to the wok . use a pair of scissors to cut the noodles into shorter pieces .

column1: add the noodles to the wok .
column2: now we want to put our noodles in the dish . take the noodles and drop them into into the wok . one of the best things to do is take some kitchen scissors and cut the noodles up so they are not to long . be careful not to burn yourself .

column1: add the spring onion and salt to the wok .
column2: put the chopped spring onion into the frying pan . add some salt . stir the ingredients together with a spoon .

column1: add the spring onion and salt to the wok .
column2: hold the onions and salt bowls over the wok . pour them into the wok .

column1: add the spring onion and salt to the wok .
column2: add spring onion , salt and ground black pepper to the pan . use a wooden spatula to stir .

column1: add the bok choy to the wok .
column2: chop the bok choy up into large pieces . add the pieces to the wok . stir it in with the other vegetables .

column1: add the bok choy to the wok .
column2: put the bok choy into the mixture in the frying pan . use the spatula to stir the ingredients together as they cook .

column1: add the bok choy to the wok .
column2: hold the plate of bok choy over the pan . push the bok choy in the pan with a wooden spoon .

column1: cook beef cube steak chopped yellow onion red enchilada sauce cheese beans in a pot .
column2: cook ground beef on the stove at medium setting until the meet turns brown . you could also use chopped steak ( check with your parents on if you have this ) . when it is done you will add the following . 1 can of refried beans and just half a can of the enchilada sauce . stir together .

column1: cook beef cube steak chopped yellow onion red enchilada sauce cheese beans in a pot .
column2: cook the beef until it becomes brown . it should thicken up once you add red enchilada sauce , cheese , and beans to the pot . lower the heat and stir .

column1: cook beef cube steak chopped yellow onion red enchilada sauce cheese beans in a pot .
column2: cook some cubed steak in a pot . add chopped yellow onion to the pot . stir the mixture and cook until well done and drain the oil . add half a can of red enchilada sauce to the meat mixture . add cheese beans to the pot .

column1: put the tortilla on the sauce .
column2: place sauce in crock pot . lay tortilla on top . make sure enchilada sauce covers bottom of tortilla .

column1: put the tortilla on the sauce .
column2: put the tortilla on top of the sauce . spread it around !

column1: put the tortilla on the sauce .
column2: take one whole tortilla shell and place it flat on the bottom of the pot on top of the sauce . using your fingers , swirl the tortilla shell around on the bottom of the pot so that the entire bottom of the tortilla is covered with sauce . make sure you leave the tortilla flat on the bottom afterwards .

column1: pour the mixture on it and top with shredded cheese .
column2: take the snack into a pan . pour the mixture of meat on top of the snack . spread the mixture evenly over the snack . add or spread cheese on top of the snack .

column1: pour the mixture on it and top with shredded cheese .
column2: take the beef mixture in a pan aside . spread the meat mixture on top of taco stack . take some shredded cheese . add shredded cheese on the meat mixture . place another taco stack .

column1: pour the mixture on it and top with shredded cheese .
column2: spread meat mixture to tortilla . next add shredded cheese on top of the mixture .

column1: cover it with another piece of tortilla .
column2: get a piece of tortilla . put it on top of the food in the pan .

column1: cover it with another piece of tortilla .
column2: on top of the mixture in the crock pot , add one more tortilla on top . make sure it is flat and press it down gently .

column1: cover it with another piece of tortilla .
column2: put cheese on top of the sauce first . then cover the cheese with another tortilla . you will repeat the steps again .

column1: layer the mixture cheese and tortillas .
column2: place a tortilla in the crock - pot . use a spoon to scoop mixture and spread on tortilla in crock - pot . sprinkle shredded cheese on top of mixture and tortilla . repeat steps 1 to 3 until the ingredients are all gone .

column1: layer the mixture cheese and tortillas .
column2: put in a layer of meat on the bottom . add a layer of cheese over the meat . place a tortilla to cover the cheese . add another layer of meat and then cheese and then tortillas . keep adding layers of each until the pot is full .

column1: layer the mixture cheese and tortillas .
column2: now you will put in the mixture , cheese , and tortillas in one layer at a time . first , scoop up some of the mixture and spread it onto the bottom of the crock pot . next , sprinkle a layer of cheese over the mixture . then , put a tortilla on top of the cheese . repeat this until you use up all your mixture .

column1: pour cheese sauce on top .
column2: open the cheese packet . use your hand to squeeze the cheese onto the top of the taco . cover the whole taco with cheese sauce . you might need to use two packages of cheese sauce .

column1: pour cheese sauce on top .
column2: open the pouch . squeeze 1 or 2 on top . cover the entire top of the taco .

column1: pour cheese sauce on top .
column2: open 2 packets of cheese sauce . squeeze the cheese sauce into the pot with the soft taco .

column1: boil some potatoes in salted water .
column2: place a pot of water . add salt to the water . add potatoes to the pot . add a little bit of salt to the pot .

column1: boil some potatoes in salted water .
column2: put peeled potatoes and water to cover the potatoes . add a big pinch of salt to the pot .

column1: boil some potatoes in salted water .
column2: add cold water to large pot of potatoes . add a large pinch of salt .

column1: shred the potatoes    mash it and add some salt and parsley .
column2: carefully cut the potatoes into small strips with a shredder . place into a bowl . add a handful of thyme leaves . add just a pinch of salt . add 2 table spoons of corn flour .

column1: shred the potatoes    mash it and add some salt and parsley .
column2: shred the potatoes on a box shredder over some parchment paper . once shredded place in bowl and mash it with a masher . add a dash of salt and chopped parsley .

column1: shred the potatoes    mash it and add some salt and parsley .
column2: take a large bowl . take a grater and cut the potatoes with grater . add the potatoes in to the bowl . add some cut pieces of parsley . sprinkle some salt on top of potatoes .

column1: put the mixture on a flat baking sheet and press firmly .
column2: put the potatoes in the tray using a spoon . press the potatoes down in the tray .

column1: put the mixture on a flat baking sheet and press firmly .
column2: cover a flat baking sheet with parchment paper . spoon the potato mixture onto the baking sheet . press the potato mixture down with your hands to spread it out .

column1: put the mixture on a flat baking sheet and press firmly .
column2: scoop the potato mixture with a large spoon . put all the potatoes onto the tray on top of the wax paper . use your hands to mush the potatoes down flat . leave the potatoes as thick as you like your hash browns to be .

column1: cut the mixture into pieces .
column2: using a long knife cut the dough into long strips . turn the strips sideways by pulling on the parchment paper . use the knife to cut the strips into squares .

column1: cut the mixture into pieces .
column2: keep mixture on parchment paper to move easier . cut mixture in two inch long strips then cut again into two by two inch squares . cut squares into two triangles .

column1: cut the mixture into pieces .
column2: mix all of the ingredients together in a large bowl . get out a cutting board , knife , and wax paper . rip a piece of wax paper the size of a cutting board . spread mixture out onto the wax paper so it is flat and is the same height / thickness all over . carefully use the knife to cut the mixture into squares .

column1: add oil to the pan and fry the hash browns .
column2: take your oil and pour it into the hot pan . use the handle of the pan to move the oil around so it goes to all parts of the pan . then put butter in the pan and move it around so it gives it a better taste . then take your hash browns and put them into the pan on top of the melted butter and oil . make sure to turn them over when one side is finished and cook the other side .

column1: add oil to the pan and fry the hash browns .
column2: add some oil to your pan . turn on the stove . put the hash browns in the pan . cook the hash browns .

column1: add oil to the pan and fry the hash browns .
column2: pour oil into pan . put hash brown into pan . let hash browns sizzle . flip hash browns .

column1: stir to cook it until it is soft .
column2: use a wooden spoon to stir the ingredients in the pot . cook for about five minutes , just until it is soft .

column1: stir to cook it until it is soft .
column2: stir the vegetables with a spoon and cook everything for about 5 minutes . you 'll know that the vegetables are done cooking when they become soft .

column1: stir to cook it until it is soft .
column2: take a large pot on the stove . add the cooking contents in to the pot . mix the contents with a wooden spoon . cook the contents till they become soft . stir the contents in between .

column1: add beans and italian pasta .
column2: to your boiling ingredients , add your beans and the ditali pasta . any small - sized pasta may be used .

column1: add beans and italian pasta .
column2: add the beans and ditali pasta to the pot . you can use any small pasta will work , but the tubes work best .

column1: add beans and italian pasta .
column2: add the can of beans to the pan . add the italian pasta to the pan .

column1: add chopped carrot celery oregano and red pepper flakes .
column2: reduce the heat and add the carrots using your scraper . then you can use a scraper to add the celery , garlic , onions , and celery . now use your measuring spoons to add the oregano . finally , use the measuring spoon to add the red pepper flakes .

column1: add chopped carrot celery oregano and red pepper flakes .
column2: after reducing the heat , add all the ingredients you have chopped into small pieces , into the pot . this includes the carrots , celery , onion , garlic . also add your seasonings , the oregano and hot pepper flakes .

column1: add chopped carrot celery oregano and red pepper flakes .
column2: add the carrots into the bowl using the chopper . add celery into the bowl using the chopper . add oregano into the bowl using a spoon . add red pepper flakes into the bowl using a spoon .

column1: add salt and pepper to the pot .
column2: turn the stove on and place the pot on the stove . add the vegetable mixture to the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the mixture . add a pinch of salt to the mixture . take the pepper grinder and add pepper and then stir all together .

column1: add salt and pepper to the pot .
column2: put a little salt into the cooking pot . then add a small amount of pepper to the mixture .

column1: add salt and pepper to the pot .
column2: take a large pot . add the cooking ingredients in the pan . add some salt in to the pot . add some pepper powder in to the pot . mix them well with a spoon .

column1: cook some sliced bacon with oil .
column2: put some oil in a large pot and heat on the stove top . use a spoon to put the chopped bacon in the oil . use a wooden spoon to stir the bacon while cooking .

column1: cook some sliced bacon with oil .
column2: place the bacon into the pan using a spoon . mix the bacon and the oil together using a spoon .

column1: cook some sliced bacon with oil .
column2: pick up the plate of chopped bacon . slide the bacon into the pot with oil in it . stir until bacon is brown .

column1: add spinach to the soup .
column2: wait until pot is boiling . add a few handfuls of the spinach from your bowl to your pot . use your wooden spoon to give it quick stir . cook for about 3 minutes . you want the spinach wilted and bright green .

column1: add spinach to the soup .
column2: grab handfuls of spinach . carefully drop the spinach in the soup .

column1: add spinach to the soup .
column2: take a large pot and place it on the stove . cook the contents of the soup in the pot . take some fresh spinach in a bowl . add some spinach in to the soup . mix the spinach with other contents of the soup .

column1: add the stock and tomato and bring it to a boil .
column2: add broth and tomatoes to the pot . bring the pot to a boil .

column1: add the stock and tomato and bring it to a boil .
column2: open a can of broth and slowly place in a bowl . open a can of diced tomato , which is chopped up tomato , and place that in a bowl . slowly add the broth to the pot . slowly add the tomato to the pot . cook until bubbles come up that is called boiling .

column1: add the stock and tomato and bring it to a boil .
column2: now take your broth to the tomatoes and place them into your pot . now increase the heat of the stove , and bring the mixture to a boil .

column1: add some basil and parsley .
column2: take a cutting board and a knife . take some basil and parsley on the cutting board . cut the basil and parsley in to small pieces . take the cooking pot on the stove . add the basil and parsley in to the pot .

column1: add some basil and parsley .
column2: carefully cut a small handful of basil into long thin strips . chop about the same amount of fresh parsley . add both the basil and parsley to your cooking pot .

column1: add some basil and parsley .
column2: put basil and parsley on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to chop the basil and parsley . add the basil and parsley to the pot .

column1: mix mayonnaise dijon mustard vinegar cayenne black pepper and salt .
column2: put mayonnaise in a bowl . next put dijon mustard in the bowl . then put vinegar into the bowl . sprinkle some cayenne pepper , ground pepper and salt . now mix everything in the bowl with a fork or spoon .

column1: mix mayonnaise dijon mustard vinegar cayenne black pepper and salt .
column2: take out the ingredients needed . put each ingredient into a big bowl . stir all the ingredients .

column1: mix mayonnaise dijon mustard vinegar cayenne black pepper and salt .
column2: add 3 tablespoons of mayonnaise in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of dijon mustard in to the bowl . add some distilled white vinegar in to the bowl .. . add red pepper and black pepper powder in to the bowl . add salt and mix everything properly .

column1: add sugar and whisk .
column2: add a few tablespoons of sugar . stir with a whisk .

column1: add sugar and whisk .
column2: add 1 or 2 tablespoons of sugar . take the whisk and mix it all together .

column1: add sugar and whisk .
column2: measure out 1 tablespoon of sugar and add it to the dressing . use a kitchen whisk to mix the sugar into the dressing . taste your dressing , if you would like it a little sweeter add 1 more tablespoon of sugar and whisk again .

column1: add diced celery grated carrot onion red bell pepper and green pepper .
column2: cut the celery and red and green bell pepper in to small pieces . grate the carrot and cut the onion in to small pieces . add the grated carrot and celery in to the bowl . add the onion and red bell pepper and green bell pepper in to the bowl . mix everything with a spatula .

column1: add diced celery grated carrot onion red bell pepper and green pepper .
column2: add small cut pieces of celery to the bowl . add small cut pieces of carrots to the bowl . add small cut pieces of onions to the bowl . add small cut pieces of red bell pepper to the bowl . add small cut pieces of green pepper to the bowl .

column1: add diced celery grated carrot onion red bell pepper and green pepper .
column2: first add some finally diced celery and grated carrots to bowl . then add some finely chopped onion or scallions to the bowl . next add some red pepper to mixture , then add some green poblano and jalapenos . mix the mixture up with a spatula .

column1: mix the ingredients together and refrigerate .
column2: with a spatula stir the vegetables into the sauce until they are mixed together completely . put the bowl with the mixture into the refrigerator .

column1: mix the ingredients together and refrigerate .
column2: use a spatula to mix dressing into the vegetables . leave the spatula in the bowl . put the bowl in the refrigerator .

column1: mix the ingredients together and refrigerate .
column2: mix all the ingredients together . put into the refrigerator to keep cool while making the macaroni .

column1: cook the elbow macaroni in salted water .
column2: get a pot and fill it halfway with water . put pot on stove burner . turn the stove top on high setting . when the water starts to bubble , turn the heat down to halfway . put a pinch of salt in the water and then add the noodles to the pot . start a timer for 7 minutes . drain the noodles and you are done !

column1: cook the elbow macaroni in salted water .
column2: take a large pot out and set on stove . add water to pot about 1/2 way full . turn stove on high and cook till boiling , then add a large dash of salt . add pasta and cook until it is tender but not over cooked . use a strainer to drain your pasta once it reaches desired doneness .

column1: cook the elbow macaroni in salted water .
column2: fill a large pot halfway with water . place the pot on the stove . turn the stove on underneath the pot . allow the water to boil . when the water has started boiling add salt to the pot of boiling water . add elbow macaroni to the pot of water and salt . cook until it is tender . stir the pot every two or three minutes . when the macaroni is tender , turn off the stove and drain the water out of the pot .

column1: drain the macaroni .
column2: carefully pour the macaroni and hot water into a strainer in the sink . shake the strainer with your hand to drain any extra water .

column1: drain the macaroni .
column2: when the macaroni is cooked , pour into the colander that is in the sink . drain the water from the macaroni . do not put water onto the macaroni to rinse it . let the macaroni sit in the colander to drain for 5 minutes . every few minutes shake the colander to help drain more water . after the macaroni is drained , pour it into a large mixing bowl .

column1: drain the macaroni .
column2: make sure an adult helps you with this step . pour the pasta into the colander over the sink . do not rinse the pasta !

column1: pour the dressing on the macaroni and mix everything .
column2: put cooked macaroni into a bowl . pour the dressing on top of the macaroni in the bowl . stir it all together very well .

column1: pour the dressing on the macaroni and mix everything .
column2: add the dressing to the macaroni that is in the bowl . it is ok if it seems like there is too much . do n't worry . it will absorb it all . mix the dressing and the macaroni together . by the time it is ready to eat it will be fully absorbed . now it not the time to taste it .

column1: pour the dressing on the macaroni and mix everything .
column2: pour the dressing to the macaroni . mix the macaroni with the dressing carefully , using a large mixing spoon . do n't worry that it 's too much dressing , the macaroni will soak some of it up . do n't taste it yet !

column1: seal it with plastic wrapper and refrigerate .
column2: once it has fully absorbed the dressing , it will be the temperature we want to serve it at . we will then place plastic wrap over top , and place it in the refrigerator for at least four hours .

column1: seal it with plastic wrapper and refrigerate .
column2: mix the macaroni salad together . cover with a plastic wrapper . put into fridge for at least 4 hours but 24 hours is best .

column1: seal it with plastic wrapper and refrigerate .
column2: cover your pasta with 2 pieces of plastic wrap . make sure all of the pasta is covered with plastic . place the bowl with pasta in the refrigerator . leave it in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours . if you have time , it would be better to leave the pasta in the refrigerator all night .

column1: add sesame seeds salt pepper lemon juice and garlic to a blender .
column2: put 1 - 2 tablespoons of sesame seeds into a blender . blend them into a paste . you might need to add a little oil . add salt , pepper , lime juice and garlic to the blender .

column1: add sesame seeds salt pepper lemon juice and garlic to a blender .
column2: take 2 tablespoons of sesame seeds and make in to a paste . add sesame seeds paste in to the blender . add pepper powder , salt in to the blender . add some garlic in to the blender . now add lemon juice in to the blender .

column1: add 1 cup of chickpeas and some water as well .
column2: add a cup of the chickpeas . add a bit of water too .

column1: add 1 cup of chickpeas and some water as well .
column2: cook the chickpeas on the stove in boiling water for 5 - 6 minutes or until they feel soft . take them off the stove and turn the stove off . drain the water off of the chickpeas with a strainer . it is a big bowl with holes in it . turn off the stove . and add drained chickpeas to a blender . clean outer shell off of a handful of garlic and add garlic to blender . add a little bit of water .

column1: add 1 cup of chickpeas and some water as well .
column2: add one cup of chickpeas to the food processor with your hand . pour some water over the chickpeas .

column1: blend everything in the blender .
column2: place the chickpeas into a blender . make sure the top is on tightly . blend the mixture in the blender .

column1: blend everything in the blender .
column2: put the beans into a food processor and close the lid . press the button to cut up the beans .

column1: blend everything in the blender .
column2: add all the ingredients into a blender . plug on the blender . turn the knob of the blender to blend everything . and switch the blender off once it becomes paste .

column1: add some olive oil to the mixture .
column2: remove the lid of the food processor . pour 1/4 cup of olive oil into the food processor .

column1: add some olive oil to the mixture .
column2: take off the lid . pour in olive oil . then pour in some water .

column1: add some olive oil to the mixture .
column2: grab your olive oil to add to the mixture . add a small amount , about a tablespoon to the mixture .

column1: blend the mixture .
column2: add all the ingredients to the mixer . place the lid on the mixer . press and hold the on button down .

column1: blend the mixture .
column2: press the button on the side of the electric mixer . hold it down only for a few seconds . check if the mixture is smooth . hold down the button on the side of the mixer again for a few seconds . optional : add a little water to the mixture .

column1: blend the mixture .
column2: put the mixture into the blender . press the button to blend it .

column1: season the chicken with pepper and salt .
column2: first wash the chicken in cold running water . then pat the chicken dry with paper towels . next you want to place the chicken in a bowl . after the chicken is in the bowl you want to season both sides with salt and pepper .

column1: season the chicken with pepper and salt .
column2: wash chicken with water . dry the chicken with paper towels . put the chicken into a bowl . cover the chicken with salt and pepper on both sides to you taste .

column1: season the chicken with pepper and salt .
column2: shake salt evenly over the chicken . shake pepper evenly over the chicken . make sure all the pieces are covered with both .

column1: pour buttermilk and hot sauce on the chicken .
column2: place the chicken in a bowl and season with spices . pour the buttermilk in the bowl , enough to cover the seasoned chicken . pour the hot sauce into the bowl with the buttermilk and chicken . stir the buttermilk , hot sauce and chicken until it is mixed . place in the fridge and marinate for 3 hours .

column1: pour buttermilk and hot sauce on the chicken .
column2: hold the buttermilk over the bowl of chicken . slowly pour in the buttermilk so it does n't splash . slowly add the hot sauce .

column1: pour buttermilk and hot sauce on the chicken .
column2: pour the buttermilk over the chicken until the chicken is covered . take hot sauce and squeeze some onto the buttermilk and chicken .

column1: mix flour salt pepper and garlic powder .
column2: scoop flour into a large container . add salt , pepper and garlic powder . stir and mix it all together with a fork .

column1: mix flour salt pepper and garlic powder .
column2: take 2 cups of flour into a tray . sprinkle some salt into the flour . add some quantity of garlic powder into the flour . mix everything altogether .

column1: mix flour salt pepper and garlic powder .
column2: pour 3 cups of flower into your bowl . now pour 1 tablespoon of salt on top of the flower . then add another tablespoon of freshly ground pepper into the bowl as well . last , add a tablespoon of garlic powder into the mixing bowl . now , using a spoon or fork stir the mixture together . go slow , so you do n't make a mess , but be sure to mix it very well !

column1: coat the chicken with the flour mixture .
column2: remove chicken from fridge . put one piece of chicken into the bowl with the flour mixture . use tongs to put the flour all over the chicken , getting it completely covered until no buttermilk is left showing . shake off the excess flour by holding the chicken with your to be and gently shaking . set piece aside . repeat with each piece of chicken .

column1: coat the chicken with the flour mixture .
column2: take your pieces of chicken out of the fridge , and drop a piece into your flour . do n't let all the butter milk fall off the chicken though , as this helps your flower mixture stick . after that piece is covered in your mixture , set it to the side . now grab another piece and drop it in the flower . make sure you brush the mixture all over the chicken to get all the edges and sides of the chicken .

column1: coat the chicken with the flour mixture .
column2: take your pieces of chicken out of the fridge and place one into the flour . be careful not to let the buttermilk come off of the chicken . use the tongs to move the chicken around and cover the chicken completely with the flour mix . set that piece to the side and do the same with all the other pieces until they are all covered in the flour . make sure you get plenty of flour mix in all the creases and wet spots on the chicken .

column1: add oil to a wok .
column2: put the wok on the stove and turn on the heat . pour some peanut oil into the pan . be careful to not overfill the pan with oil .

column1: add oil to a wok .
column2: add peanut oil to the wok . let sit until the wok is hot . be careful not to splash it .

column1: add oil to a wok .
column2: take a large pan . place the pan on the stove and heat the pan . take some oil in a can . pour some oil in to the pan . add oil till three fourth of the pan .

column1: drop the chicken into the oil .
column2: take your tongs and pick up your chicken . very carefully drop each piece of chicken into the hot grease .

column1: drop the chicken into the oil .
column2: heat up the grease . using tongs , place the pieces of chicken in very carefully . you can put all the chicken in .

column1: drop the chicken into the oil .
column2: gently grab the chicken with tongs . gently place the breaded chicken into the hot oil . be sure to ease it in so that none of the oil splatters . only place two or three pieces of chicken in the pan at a time .

column1: mix the tuna pieces and some fish eggs in a bowl .
column2: cut the tuna in to small pieces . take a small bowl and add tuna in to the bowl . take a bowl of fish eggs . add 4 tablespoons of fish eggs in to the bowl . mix them with a spoon .

column1: mix the tuna pieces and some fish eggs in a bowl .
column2: take the pink colored fish and cut it into dice sized cubes on the cutting board . take the fish and put it into the bowl . take the bowl of orange fish eggs that look like little pellets . add in 3 big spoons of the fish eggs into the bowl with the fish .

column1: mix the tuna pieces and some fish eggs in a bowl .
column2: scrape your chopped tuna off your cutting board into a bowl . just use your hands . now put several scoops of fish eggs on top of the tuna .

column1: cut the roll into small rolls .
column2: use the knife to carefully cut the sushi roll . put the knife into water . slice the sushi into 8 equal sized pieces .

column1: cut the roll into small rolls .
column2: before you cut the sushi dip the knife into water . make sure the tap the knife on it 's handle to make sure the water coats the whole blade . cut the sushi into half . then cut sushi pieces in half again , and once more to make them bite size . then you can place them nicely on a sushi dish or any dish you have .

column1: cut the roll into small rolls .
column2: using a knife cut the roll in half . place your knife into hot water . using your knife cut the roll in half again . once more cut your roll in half again . using your fingers place your sushi onto your plate .

column1: spread some cooked rice on seaweed sushi wrapper .
column2: set a seaweed sushi wrapper on top of the cutting board . place cooked rice on top of the wrapper . spread the rice around evenly on the wrapper .

column1: spread some cooked rice on seaweed sushi wrapper .
column2: now we want to take a big handful of sushi rice . make sure your hands stay moist as you flatten the rice out across all of the sea weed . try and have rice cover the majority of the seaweed .

column1: spread some cooked rice on seaweed sushi wrapper .
column2: dip your hands in some water . make sure that the seaweed is on the mat . take a big handful of rice and put it on the green seaweed . carefully spread the rice in a thin layer but do n't smush the rice .

column1: chop some tuna meat into small pieces .
column2: use your knife to carefully cut the tuna meat . first cut the tuna meat the long way . then turn the tuna and cut it the other way into small squares .

column1: chop some tuna meat into small pieces .
column2: put a piece of tuna on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to chop the tuna into small pieces .

column1: chop some tuna meat into small pieces .
column2: it is easier to chop tuna when it is frozen and left to sit until it 's partially thawed . find the direction that the tuna meat is facing , and use your knife to cut thin strips , about as wide as your pinkie finger . take your strips of tuna , turn them ninety - degrees and then cut again so that you have small cubes . they should all be pretty close to the same sizes .

column1: roll it up and press firmly .
column2: make sure the seaweed is lined up with the edge of the bamboo sheet . start rolling the seaweed , and make sure you do n't roll up the bamboo . put some water on your finger and swipe it across the seaweed .

column1: roll it up and press firmly .
column2: take the edge of your seaweed . place it int the middle and use the bamboo to tighten the roll making sure the bamboo does n't go into your mixture . roll it nice and tight by pulling it back as you roll . use water and with your finger spread it over the inside of the edge of the seaweed to make sure it stick .

column1: roll it up and press firmly .
column2: use your hands fold the bamboo sheet over . pull it tight and roll the bamboo sheet . if it does n't stick , use a little bit of water to make seal it .

column1: add hot sauce and mayo and then mix them together .
column2: put some hot sauce into the bowl ( be careful not to add to much ) . put mayo into the bowl with the hot sauce . use a spoon to mix it together .

column1: add hot sauce and mayo and then mix them together .
column2: add hot sauce hot to the bowl of mix . add mayo to the bowl . using a spoon mix together all of the ingredients .
