column1: add hot sauce and mayo and then mix them together .
column2: squirt in some hot sauce in the bowl . add a squirt of mayo in the bowl too . take a spoon and stir it all up .

column1: add the tuna mix on top and season with some sesame seeds .
column2: take a spoon and scoop the tuna mix on top of the cooked rice . be sure to put the tuna mix on the center of the rice in a line . then add some sesame seeds on top of everything .

column1: add the tuna mix on top and season with some sesame seeds .
column2: using a spoon , take small scoops of tuna and place them 1 scoop at a time in a line in the middle of the rice . next , sprinkle sesame seeds evenly over both the tuna and the rice .

column1: add the tuna mix on top and season with some sesame seeds .
column2: use a spoon to put some tuna on top center of the rice . sprinkle some sesame seems on top of the tuna and rice .

column1: add water and white miso to a blender .
column2: add water to your blender using your measuring cup . now add one tablespoon of the white miso into the blender . you can use your fingers to get all the miso in there .

column1: add water and white miso to a blender .
column2: pour water to the blender . add one tablespoon of white miso to the blender .

column1: add water and white miso to a blender .
column2: take a blender jar . take a measuring cup and take a cup of water . add the cup of water in to the blender jar . add a teaspoon of white miso in to the blender . close the lid and run the blender .

column1: add matini to the blender .
column2: get a small spoon to use . pour the spoon of matini into the blender .

column1: add matini to the blender .
column2: take a blender jar . take matini in a small jar . take a tablespoon of matini from the jar . add the matini in to the blender . place the matini jar down .

column1: add matini to the blender .
column2: you can get tahini in a gallon bucket to save money . put tahini in blender .

column1: add some chopped ginger to it .
column2: add the chopped ginger to the blender .

column1: add some chopped ginger to it .
column2: place a bit of chopped ginger into the blender . let all the chopped ginger fall into the blender . after the ginger falls , take the skin out .

column1: add some chopped ginger to it .
column2: carefully use a knife to chop the ginger . drop the chopped ginger into the blender .

column1: blend everything together and take the mixture out .
column2: close the lid of the blender . hold the lid down and turn the blended on for a couple seconds .

column1: blend everything together and take the mixture out .
column2: use the blender to mix everything together . pour the contents into of the mixer into a bowl .

column1: blend everything together and take the mixture out .
column2: place the top on your blender . press the button to turn it on . allow the ingredients to mix until they are creamy and turn blender off . remove lid . pour mixture carefully into bowl .

column1: add some extra ginger and cilantro .
column2: add some shredded carrot , ginger , and some cilantro . you can also add green onion or cayenne if you 'd like .

column1: add some extra ginger and cilantro .
column2: you first should add in some extra ginger to the mixture if you want it to be a little spicier . now put in your shredded carrot to the mixing bowl . also feel free to add some cilantro or green onion into the bowl also if that is what you like .

column1: add some extra ginger and cilantro .
column2: cut the cilantro in to very small pieces . cut the ginger in to small pieces . take a small bowl . add a handful of cilantro on to the bowl . add some extra ginger in to the bowl .

column1: top with some seaweed flakes .
column2: rip a large piece of seaweed into small pieces over a bowl . you can rip it in half over and over again . spread the small pieces gently over your soup . this will add many vitamins and minerals to your soup .

column1: top with some seaweed flakes .
column2: rip up flakes into small pieces . scatter on top of soup .

column1: top with some seaweed flakes .
column2: rip the seaweed until its in small pieces . sprinkle it onto your soup . it gives it some salt and minerals .

column1: chop up a block of cream cheese .
column2: take the block of cream cheese and cut it into strips using a knife . cut the cream cheese into smaller , bite size pieces using the knife .

column1: chop up a block of cream cheese .
column2: put cream cheese on a cutting board . cut 8 ounces of cream cheese into small cubes .

column1: chop up a block of cream cheese .
column2: take 8 ounces of cream cheese . use a knife and carefully cut the cheese into small pieces .

column1: mix the cheese with pepperoni .
column2: take your bowl filled with cheese . add pepperoni to the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the pepperoni and cheese together .

column1: mix the cheese with pepperoni .
column2: mix in mini pepperoni with cream cheese . grab french loaf .

column1: mix the cheese with pepperoni .
column2: get a medium size bowl . cut cheese into small pieces . put the cheese pieces in a bowl . pour mini pepperoni slices into the bowl . use a spatula to mix the pepperoni and cheese together .

column1: cut the top off of a french loaf .
column2: carefully using a knife cut around the edges of the bread . remove the top of the bread .

column1: cut the top off of a french loaf .
column2: get a bread knife and a loaf of french bread . starting at one end of the loaf cut into the top of the bread along the side . cut all the way around the loaf until you 're back where you started . use your fingers to pull the piece you have cut out of the loaf .

column1: cut the top off of a french loaf .
column2: hold the bread carefully with one hand . with your other hand cut out the top and middle of the bread carefully and away from your hand .

column1: put the cream cheese and pepperonis into the loaf .
column2: use your hands and slowly sprinkle the cheese into the opening of the loaf . do it slowly and fill each end .

column1: put the cream cheese and pepperonis into the loaf .
column2: add mozzarella cheese to the top of the loaf . spread the cheese evenly across the top .

column1: put the cream cheese and pepperonis into the loaf .
column2: line baking pan with parchment paper . scoop out the center of the bread and place bread in lined baking pan . top the bread with shredded mozzarella cheese .

column1: add mozzarella cheese to the top .
column2: put shredded mozzarella cheese on top of the bread . put it evenly all over the top .

column1: add mozzarella cheese to the top .
column2: pick up your bowl of mozzarella cheese . using your fingers spread the cheese over the top . make sure to spread it even over the top .

column1: add mozzarella cheese to the top .
column2: sprinkle a good amount of mozzarella cheese over the top of each of your pizza sandwiches . put the top piece of the bread over the mozzarella cheese .

column1: replace the top of the french loaf .
column2: put the top piece of your bread on top of the cheese that you just sprinkled . sprinkle even more cheese over the top of the bread .

column1: replace the top of the french loaf .
column2: take the bread that was cut off before . place it back on top of the french loaf . add cheese to the top of the bread .

column1: replace the top of the french loaf .
column2: put the part of the bread you cut out earlier back on top of the cheese to cover the inside . then sprinkle some more cheese on top of the cover .

column1: add more mozzarella to the top of the loaf .
column2: use a cheese grater to grind a fresh piece of mozzarella cheese into small pieces over a bowl . you may also use mozzarella cheese that is already grated . after the bread is on the baking tray , sprinkle the cheese on top of the closed loaf of bread .

column1: add more mozzarella to the top of the loaf .
column2: take a small handful of shredded mozzarella . add all along the top of the bread .

column1: add more mozzarella to the top of the loaf .
column2: take two small loaf of bread . take a small quantity of mozzarella cheese . add more quantity of mozzarella on top of the loaf of bread .

column1: bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes .
column2: turn the over to 350 degrees . wait til the oven beeps . put in the food and let it bake for 20 minutes .

column1: bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes .
column2: line pan with parchment paper , top bread with cheese . put in 350 degree oven . bake for 20 minutes .

column1: bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes .
column2: set oven temp for 350 . wait for oven to preheat . place what your baking into oven and close door . set timer for 20 minutes . take out of oven once the timer goes off .

column1: mix egg cornmeal flour salt pepper and milk .
column2: put egg , cornmeal , flour , milk , and salt and pepper into a bowl . use a spoon to mix everything together .

column1: mix egg cornmeal flour salt pepper and milk .
column2: crack your eggs into the bowl , and throw away the shells . add your cornmeal to the bowl with the eggs in it . add in your flour , salt and pepper . add the milk to the bowl . mix the ingredients in your bowl with a mixer . be careful not to turn it on a high speed at first .

column1: mix egg cornmeal flour salt pepper and milk .
column2: in a bowl mix together 1/2 cup of cornmeal , 1/2 cup of all purpose flower , 1 teaspoon of salt , and 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper . use a hand mixer to carefully mix it all together .

column1: mix melted butter with the batter .
column2: heat the pan on a stove . add about 2 tablespoons of salted butter in to the pan . melt the butter in the pan . take the batter in a mixing bowl and add the melted butter . mix the butter with the batter .

column1: mix melted butter with the batter .
column2: put pan on the stove . turn on medium heat . put butter in pan . stir until melted . pour into the batter . stir with spoon .

column1: mix melted butter with the batter .
column2: put two tablespoons of salted butter in a saucepan . heat the saucepan on low on the stove to melt the butter . once the butter is melted , pour the butter into the bowl with the batter . stir the batter and the melted butter together .

column1: coat the sausage with the batter .
column2: dip the sausage pieces in the batter . take it out .

column1: coat the sausage with the batter .
column2: use tongs to pick up each little sausage . put the sausage into the batter and wiggle it around to get it totally covered .

column1: coat the sausage with the batter .
column2: get your tongs . tongs look like a big pincher . pick up a sausage with your tongs . dip the sausage in the batter . get batter all over the sausage . do this with every sausage .

column1: place the corn dogs in the oil .
column2: pick up a corn dog with the tongs . slowly drop a corn dog into the oil . the corn dog will float to the top . add more corn dogs into the oil .

column1: place the corn dogs in the oil .
column2: get a steel tongue . using the tongue , grab the corn dogs and place it in the frying pan with the oil . put them all together so that they are all done at the same time . cook until hey are golden brown .

column1: place the corn dogs in the oil .
column2: use the tongs to pick up the corn dog . drop the corn dog into the oil .

column1: cook the corn dogs until brown .
column2: cook the corn dogs in the oil until they turn brown . " be really careful - hot oil can spit " " little drops out which can burn ! " " . " take the corn dogs out and put them on paper towels to drain some of the oil .

column1: cook the corn dogs until brown .
column2: in hot boiling oil fry corn dogs . cook till browned .

column1: cook the corn dogs until brown .
column2: use a slotted spoon to slowly pick up the corn dogs . check the corn dogs to see what color they are . when the corn dogs are medium brown , they are ready . removed them with the slotted spoon .

column1: place the blended vegetables in a bowl .
column2: use a spatula , which is usually much bigger than a normal spoon , to get the stuff out of mixing bowl into the other bowl . and then stir .

column1: place the blended vegetables in a bowl .
column2: use a rubber spatula to pour the vegetables into a bowl . try to get as much as you can by scraping the sides clear of the vegetables .

column1: place the blended vegetables in a bowl .
column2: take your vegetables and add them to your bowl . mix them together . use your spatula .

column1: place a block of tofu in the bowl and mash .
column2: put a block of tofu into the bowl . use a masher to mash the tofu into the mixture .

column1: place a block of tofu in the bowl and mash .
column2: add one square of tofu . smash the tofu into the other ingredients .

column1: place a block of tofu in the bowl and mash .
column2: get one block of firm ( hard , not too squishy ) tofu . put it in the bowl . get a potato masher and use it to smash up the tofu in the bowl .

column1: add salt black pepper garlic sesame oil and ginger to the bowl and mix .
column2: add salt , black pepper , garlic , sesame oil , and ginger to the bowl . mix everything up with a spoon .

column1: add salt black pepper garlic sesame oil and ginger to the bowl and mix .
column2: first find the salt and add about 1 shake to the bowl . next find the black pepper container and add about 1 shake to the bowl . next find the container with garlic and add about 1 shake to the bowl . next take a table spoon and scoop 1 tablespoon full into the bowl . lastly , take that same spoon and scoop 1 tablespoon full of ginger into the bowl and stir for about 2 minutes allowing the flavors to be mix well together in the bowl .

column1: add salt black pepper garlic sesame oil and ginger to the bowl and mix .
column2: add salt to the mixture . add black pepper to the mixture . add sesame oil to the mixture . add ginger garlic to the bowl to get the different taste . mix all the ingredients together to blend it well .

column1: place the filling in the middle of the wonton wrapper and fold shut with egg .
column2: place the filling into the middle of the wanton . fold wanton in half . put egg on the ends and roll it to seal it shut .

column1: place the filling in the middle of the wonton wrapper and fold shut with egg .
column2: put the filling in the middle of the square wonton . fold the square into a triangle so the wonton is covering the filling . paint the edges with some egg .

column1: place the filling in the middle of the wonton wrapper and fold shut with egg .
column2: add some of the filling into the middle of the wonton . fold it in half and slowly add egg to the outside edges of the wonton . then gently press the wonton in half and set it to the side .

column1: add soy sauce and sesame oil to a pot of boiling water and add the wontons .
column2: pour soy sauce into the boiling water . pour sesame oil into the boiling water . once it looks like it boiling , add the wontons one at a time . they 'll float but eventually they 'll start to sink .

column1: add soy sauce and sesame oil to a pot of boiling water and add the wontons .
column2: wait for the water to boil . add soy sauce and sesame oil to the pot . put wontons in the pot .

column1: add wheat chips to the mixture .
column2: if you have store - bought pita chips , put them into the bowl . if you do not have store bought pita chips , simply preheat your oven and cut 3 to 5 pitas into squares . place the pita chips on a baking sheet and bake them until they are golden brown . be careful to take them out of the oven before the corners turn dark brown . allow your pita chips to cool , then place them into the bowl . now you are ready for the next ingredient .

column1: add wheat chips to the mixture .
column2: use whole wheat pita chips that have been toasted in the oven . toss the chips into the mixture .

column1: add wheat chips to the mixture .
column2: take some pita chips . throw in the pita chips into the mix .

column1: toss everything well and serve .
column2: take a big bowl . add all the vegetables into the bowl . mix all the ingredients together and toss it well . serve the tossed salad .

column1: toss everything well and serve .
column2: using your hands mix everything together . place the mixture onto a plate using your hands .

column1: toss everything well and serve .
column2: use your hands to mix the salad and the dressing in the bowl . put the salad on serving plate to serve .

column1: chop some fresh mint leaves and add it to the mixture .
column2: take the mint and carefully use your knife and chop it . chop it a few times going back and forth . add the mint leaves to your mixture .

column1: chop some fresh mint leaves and add it to the mixture .
column2: put the parsley and mint on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to chop the herbs into small pieces . put the chopped herbs into the bowl .

column1: chop some fresh mint leaves and add it to the mixture .
column2: take some fresh mint and parsley leaves and place them on the cutting board . chop the herbs coarsely , turning them to get them thoroughly chopped . perform the sundial technique of chopping , which is : . holding the point of the knife in one position with one hand , allow the handle of the knife to rotate in a semi - circle , cutting all the herbs in smaller pieces as it moves . move the knife back and forth until the herbs are the size you want .

column1: add chopped parsley to the mixture too .
column2: take a cutting board and a knife . take some fresh parsley on the cutting board . cut the parsley in to small pieces . now add the parsley in to the mixture . mix them with the spoon .

column1: add chopped parsley to the mixture too .
column2: grab some cut up parsley with your hands . sprinkle it in the mix .

column1: add chopped parsley to the mixture too .
column2: put a half of a cup of finely chopped parsley in bowl . to the same bowl add one quarter cup of finely chopped mint ( no stems ) .

column1: mix lemon juice olive oil garlic salt pepper and sumac .
column2: take a small mixing bowl and then measure and pour a half a cup of lemon juice in it . then measure and pour a quarter of a cup of olive oil into the bowl . add three cloves of fresh garlic that 's already been chopped into the bowl . add a teaspoon of salt and a pinch of pepper to the bowl . add half of a teaspoon of fresh ground sumac to the bowl , then stir it with a whisk .

column1: mix lemon juice olive oil garlic salt pepper and sumac .
column2: add 1/2 cup of lemon juice into a bowl . put in 1/4 cup of olive oil . add 3 chopped garlic cloves . then put in 1 teaspoon of salt and some pepper . finally add some sumac and use a spoon to mix them together .

column1: mix lemon juice olive oil garlic salt pepper and sumac .
column2: put the lemon juice in a bowl . put the olive oil in the bowl . put the garlic salt in a bowl . put the pepper in the bowl . put the sumac in the bowl .

column1: pour the remaining of the dressing to the mixture .
column2: you will need to save whatever dressing is left . use the left over dressing by adding it to the salad slowly .

column1: pour the remaining of the dressing to the mixture .
column2: place the pita chips into the bowl . take the dressing and pour the rest of it into the mix in the bowl .

column1: pour the remaining of the dressing to the mixture .
column2: take the dressing in a bowl . take the mixing bowl . pour the dressing in to the mixing bowl . mix the contents of the bowl . add remaining dressing in to the bowl .

column1: pour half of the liquid to the mixed vegetable .
column2: with your liquid in a small bowl , pour half of it over the salad . mix it up with your bare hands ( make sure your hands are washed ) .

column1: pour half of the liquid to the mixed vegetable .
column2: pick up the little bowl . pour half of the liquid into the salad . wash your hands . use your two hands to mix the salad .

column1: pour half of the liquid to the mixed vegetable .
column2: pour half of the liquid into the mixed vegetables . play with the vegetables with your hands . it 's fun to play with your food ! massage it without breaking any the vegetables . note the smell . it 's great - is n't it ? .

column1: mix diced cucumber yellow pepper chopped tomato green onion and lettuce .
column2: put in one cucumber that has been diced and put it in a bowl . add 1 diced yellow pepper . put in 2 chopped tomatoes . add 4 sliced green onions . finally put in two cups of lettuce .

column1: mix diced cucumber yellow pepper chopped tomato green onion and lettuce .
column2: place chopped cucumber , yellow pepper , tomatoes and green onions in bowl . next add the herbs ( parsley and mint ) to the bowl .

column1: mix diced cucumber yellow pepper chopped tomato green onion and lettuce .
column2: take a diced cucumber and place it in your bowl . next add a diced pepper of whatever color you like . add the chopped tomatoes ( whatever color you like ) , and the green or red onions . add the chopped herbs . you always have to use mint to make this type of salad , but you can use other herbs as well .

column1: chop fresh tofu into small cubes .
column2: use the knife to carefully cut the tofu . start by cutting the tofu into long section across . then cut the opposite way so the tofu is in small squares .

column1: chop fresh tofu into small cubes .
column2: place tofu onto cutting board . cut into small little squares .

column1: chop fresh tofu into small cubes .
column2: you will need to open a pack of fresh tofu . it can either be soft or firm tofu . either works fine . you will need to gently press the water out of the block of tofu by placing a rag over the tofu and putting a plate with something slightly heavy on it to push out the moisture . take a knife and slowly dice the tofu into very small cubes . if you do not wish to use tofu you can substitute it with vegetables , sea food or meat .

column1: boil some water and add bonito flakes .
column2: put water into a pan and bring it to a boil . pour in bonito flakes into the boiling water .

column1: boil some water and add bonito flakes .
column2: fill a pot with water and heat it up . when it 's boiling it will be bubbling up fast . throw in the bonito flakes .

column1: boil some water and add bonito flakes .
column2: take some water in a saucepan . boil the water for 10 minutes . add some quantity of bonito flakes . wait until the flakes gets cooked .

column1: season with chopped green onions .
column2: add the green onions that have been chopped into small pieces . remove the pan from the heat .

column1: season with chopped green onions .
column2: pour green onions into the pan . take the pan off the heat .

column1: season with chopped green onions .
column2: take the cooking pot on the stove . cook the soup in the pot . cut some green onions in to small pieces . add the green onions in to the pot . mix them properly with the spoon .

column1: remove the bonito flakes .
column2: boil the bonito flakes in the water . take another big sized pot . place the strainer on top of pot . now pour the flakes in to the pot through the strainer . separate the flakes from the water .

column1: remove the bonito flakes .
column2: using a colander pour the juices from the bonito flakes into the pan . make sure all of the access water / juices are in the pan .

column1: remove the bonito flakes .
column2: place a strainer over an empty pot . take the smaller pot full of bonito flakes and water and pour it into the strainer .

column1: add the tofu chunks and dissolve miso paste in the soup .
column2: add tofu chunks to water over medium high heat . do not boil . dissolve in miso paste .

column1: add the tofu chunks and dissolve miso paste in the soup .
column2: pour the tofu into the hot water . use a strainer to dissolve the miso paste into the pot .

column1: add the tofu chunks and dissolve miso paste in the soup .
column2: add small square tofu pieces to water . heat the pot with water and tofu until it gets warm . add miso paste to a strainer . with chopsticks mix the paste until it dissolves in the pot . be careful the water might be hot ! ! !

column1: add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously .
column2: cook the blond roux in a pan . take some tomato puree in a bowl . add the tomato puree in to the blonde roux . take a mixing spatula . mix the contents in the pan .

column1: add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously .
column2: add tomato puree . with a spoon mix the mixture together .

column1: add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously .
column2: pour the strained tomato puree to the mixture . add little by little . stir continuously as you add the puree with a spatula .

column1: add flour to the butter in a pan .
column2: when the butter in the pan is hot and bubbly . get a teaspoon measuring spoon . measure about 1 teaspoon of flour . add the flour to the butter and stir the pan with a heatproof spatula .

column1: add flour to the butter in a pan .
column2: we will be making blond roux . roux is melted butter and flour mixed together and is used for thickening things like soup , stew or gravy . blond roux is golden or light brown in color . once the butter is melted , scatter flour around the pan and mix it with the butter right away .

column1: add flour to the butter in a pan .
column2: take a pan on the stove . add some butter in the pan . melt the butter in the pan . add flour to the butter in pan . mix the flour and butter in the pan .

column1: heat some butter in a pan and add some cumin seeds chopped garlic and chopped onions .
column2: put pan on the stove , turn stove on , put butter into the pan . put cumin seeds into pan with butter , use a spatula to stir cumin seeds . put chopped garlic into pan , stir with a spatula . put chopped onions into pan , stir with a spatula .

column1: heat some butter in a pan and add some cumin seeds chopped garlic and chopped onions .
column2: put some butter in a frying pan and heat it . add some cumin seeds . add chopped garlic . add a bit of chopped onions . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together as it cooks .

column1: add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan .
column2: pour in chopped celery into the pan . use a spatula to mix in the ingredients while it cooks .

column1: add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan .
column2: hold the vegetables over the pan . carefully pour in the cut up celery chopped bell pepper mix into the pan .

column1: add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan .
column2: take a pot on the stove . cut the celery in to small pieces . add the celery in to the pan . cut the bell pepper in to small pieces and add it to the pan . mix the contents in the pan .

column1: blend the mixture using a blender .
column2: carefully hold the pan over the blender . slowly pour the pan into the blender . close the blender top and press blend .

column1: blend the mixture using a blender .
column2: use a mitt or cloth to hold the hot pot to pout it into your blender . take care and pour slowly and carefully as not to burn yourself . after it 's in the blender you can go ahead and blend it for a few seconds until it 's completely blended .

column1: blend the mixture using a blender .
column2: pour the mixture into a blender . turn the blender on and blend until it is mixed together .

column1: cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color .
column2: add one tablespoon of all - purpose flour to the butter in the pan . cook flour and butter in a pan on low heat until light brown .

column1: cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color .
column2: heat up pan and melt butter . put stove on low heat . add one tablespoon of all - purpose flour . use a spatula to mix the butter and flour .

column1: cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color .
column2: take a pan on the stove . add the mixture in the pan . take the wooden spatula . mix the mixture in the pan . cook the mixture till it turns light brown .

column1: add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture .
column2: pour in chopped tomatoes to the pan . add some salt . put in a basil leaf . add some pepper . use a spatula to stir the mixture .

column1: add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture .
column2: as you notice the pan sizzling , add your cut up tomatoes to the pan and allow them to cook . add a pinch of salt , dried basil leaves , and pepper to the pan as it cooks . use your spatula to mix the vegetables .

column1: add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture .
column2: cut vegetables into small pieces with a knife . then chop tomatoes into small chunks with a knife . add to a skillet with broth . add heat and salt and pepper . then add basil and saute for a bit .

column1: add some sugar and cream .
column2: use a spoon to add some sugar to the soup and stir . add cream to the soup and stir .

column1: add some sugar and cream .
column2: use a small spoon to scoop . scoop some sugar into the pot . slowly pour in the cream into the pot .

column1: add some sugar and cream .
column2: add a tablespoon of sugar to the pan . pour cream into the pan .

column1: add some chopped onion and ginger while stirring .
column2: pour chopped onion and ginger into the pan . use the spatula to stir the ingredients together evenly .

column1: add some chopped onion and ginger while stirring .
column2: put the onions and ginger in the hot pan . stir the onions and ginger while cooking .

column1: add some chopped onion and ginger while stirring .
column2: take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . cut the onions and gingers in to small pieces . add the onions and ginger in to the pan . stir the contents of the pan .

column1: remove the lid add some extra water and stir .
column2: now using a glove , remove the lid and add in a bottle of water . you may not need the entire bottle . then take your spatula or spoon and start stirring the entire mixture .

column1: remove the lid add some extra water and stir .
column2: take the lid off of the pan . open the bottle of water and pour water into the pan . use a spoon to stir the food in the pan while cooking .

column1: remove the lid add some extra water and stir .
column2: cook the food in the pressure cooker . remove the lid of the pressure cooker . add some water in the cooker . mix the water with the food . cook the food .

column1: add some chopped tomatoes and mix it .
column2: hold the cut up tomatoes over the pan . use a spatula to push the tomatoes off the dish and into the pan . mix everything with the spatula .

column1: add some chopped tomatoes and mix it .
column2: now we want to use our spatula slide the diced tomatoes into our pan . slowly add them in and then cover the pan with the lid . after a few minutes , uncover the pan and begin mixing your dish together .

column1: add some chopped tomatoes and mix it .
column2: add chopped onions to the pan . mix up the food with a spoon .

column1: add some water and cover with a lid .
column2: add some water to the pot . stir in the water with a spatula . cover the pot with a lid .

column1: add some water and cover with a lid .
column2: pour water into the pan . get a lid that fits tight and cover the pan .

column1: add some water and cover with a lid .
column2: add about 1/2 a cup of water to the mixture in the pan . stir everything together with your spatula . let this cook for about a minute and then put the lid on top of the pan .

column1: add some chopped chicken breast and coat it with the mixture .
column2: take a pan and cook the mixture in the pan . cut the chicken in to small pieces . add the chicken in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan . coat the chicken with the mixture .

column1: add some chopped chicken breast and coat it with the mixture .
column2: throw in the cut up some chopped chicken breast in the pan . use a spatula to mix the chicken in with the mixture in the pan .

column1: add some chopped chicken breast and coat it with the mixture .
column2: pour the chopped chicken breast into the pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the chicken in . evenly mix everything in the pan as it cooks .

column1: season the dish with some chopped green onion .
column2: wait until the chicken is cooked and becomes tender . cut the cleaned green onions into small pieces . add the cut green onions into the dish and mix well .

column1: season the dish with some chopped green onion .
column2: add finely chopped green onion to the sizzling mixture . stir the onion throughout .

column1: season the dish with some chopped green onion .
column2: take a pan on the stove . cook the dish in the pan . take some green onions on the cutting board . cut the green onions in to small pieces . add the green onions in to the pan .

column1: heat some oil add some combined spice and stir .
column2: heat the oil in a pan . add the spices to the pan and stir with a spatula or spoon .

column1: heat some oil add some combined spice and stir .
column2: add oil to a pan . turn the heat up on the stove . add the spices in the pan and oil . stir everything with a spatula .

column1: heat some oil add some combined spice and stir .
column2: heat oil in a pan on the stove top . add the spices to the hot oil . use a wooden spatula to stir the spices in the oil .

column1: add cumin powder red chili powder and garlic powder and mix it well .
column2: take 2 table spoons of cumin powder and red chili powder in a small bowl . add the cumin powder and chili powder in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan . add little garlic powder in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan with a wooden spoon .

column1: add cumin powder red chili powder and garlic powder and mix it well .
column2: pour the plate of spices into the hot pan . use a wooden spatula to mix the spices in the pan .

column1: add cumin powder red chili powder and garlic powder and mix it well .
column2: add cumin powder to the pan . put in some red chili powder . add some garlic powder . use a stirring spoon to mix it together in the pan .

column1: combine the flour butter and water .
column2: pour the flour into the bowl . add butter to the mixture . use hands to mix the ingredients together . add water to the bowl .

column1: combine the flour butter and water .
column2: take a large bowl . add some flour in to the bowl . add some butter in to the bowl . add some water in to the bowl . mix everything properly in to a dough .

column1: combine the flour butter and water .
column2: place flour in a sifter and shake over a bowl . add butter to flour in large bowl . mix well with hands . pour water into flour and butter mixture a little bit at a time , while you continue to mix with your hands . flour , butter and water mixture should be a ball of dough when enough water has been added .

column1: place the filling and spinach on the dough .
column2: use a spoon to scoop up some filling . put the filling on the dough . pinch some spinach and put some on the dough .

column1: place the filling and spinach on the dough .
column2: use a fork and put the filling onto the dough . take a spinach leaf and set it on top of the filling . press the spinach down into the filling .

column1: place the filling and spinach on the dough .
column2: use a spoon to put the filling in the center of the dough . put a spinach leaf on top of the filling .

column1: cut out circles from the sheet of dough .
column2: get a cup to use . place the cup upside down on the dough . get a knife and cut a circle by tracing it around the cup . repeat the circle cutting step .

column1: cut out circles from the sheet of dough .
column2: put some flour on the counter top and spread it out . use a rolling pin to roll out the dough . use a glass and knife to cut out circles of dough .

column1: cut out circles from the sheet of dough .
column2: put some flour on a flat surface and roll out your dough . after rolling out the dough , find a 3 diameter cookie cutter or drinking glass .  " . " place the cutter or glass on the edge of the dough and cut around it with a knife . lift the circle off the surface .

column1: roll the ball of dough out .
column2: put the ball of dough on a floured surface . use the rolling pin to roll the dough out . roll the dough to one - eighth of an inch in thickness and 10 to 11 inches wide .

column1: roll the ball of dough out .
column2: place the ball of dough on to a flat surface . using a rolling pin , press it down on the dough and begin rolling back and forth . continue to flatten the dough until it is very thin , about 1/8 inch , and about 10 to 11 inches wide .

column1: roll the ball of dough out .
column2: add some flour on the board . take a ball of dough on the board . take a rolling pin . roll the dough in to thin round . the dough roll should be uniform .

column1: divide the dough into smaller balls .
column2: divide the dough in half first using your hands . now take one half of the dough and divide it into three equal parts . add flour to your working surface . place one of the small balls of dough to your surface .

column1: divide the dough into smaller balls .
column2: after the dough has been kneaded enough tear it into two pieces . take each piece and make them into smaller balls of dough .

column1: divide the dough into smaller balls .
column2: hold the block of dough . tear the dough in the middle . roll the pieces into smaller balls .

column1: knead the dough until soft .
column2: place the dough on a counter surface on top of flour . use hands to knead the dough until it becomes soft .

column1: knead the dough until soft .
column2: put some flour on the counter top and spread it out . place the dough on top of the flour . put some flour on your hands . knead the dough buy pushing and folding with your hands .

column1: knead the dough until soft .
column2: dust the surface with the flour . take the ball of dough on to the surface . knead the dough with the hands . mix the dough and the flour . knead until the dough becomes soft .

column1: boil the potatoes in water .
column2: put water and potatoes in a pot . place the pot on the stove and turn on the heat . bring the water to a boil and continue cooking .

column1: boil the potatoes in water .
column2: put water into a medium pot and add the 1-inch square , chopped potatoes . turn the heat onto 8 ( near the highest setting ) . boil the potatoes for about 20 minutes .

column1: boil the potatoes in water .
column2: put the cut up potatoes into a pot that is big enough to hold the potatoes and water . add enough water to cover the potatoes by about three finger widths . put the pot onto the stove and turn the burner onto a medium - high setting . allow the water and potatoes to boil until the potatoes become soft .

column1: layer marinara sauce and pierogies .
column2: use a scoop or ladle to scoop sauce into the bottom of the pan . lay the pierogies on the sauce . put more sauce on top of the pierogies .

column1: layer marinara sauce and pierogies .
column2: place a layer of marinara sauce on the bottom of the dish . add in a layer of the pierogies on top of the sauce . add another layer of marinara , to cover the first level of pierogies . put sauce on top of the second layer of pierogies so they are covered .

column1: layer marinara sauce and pierogies .
column2: heat oven to proper temperature . layer marinara sauce and meat . cover meat with marinara . cook until internal temperature is 160 inside .

column1: boil the pierogies in a pot of water .
column2: take a pot on the stove . add some water in to the pot . boil the water in the pot . add the pierogies in to the pot . boil the pierogies in the water .

column1: boil the pierogies in a pot of water .
column2: set the pierogies in a pot of water . stir the pierogies in the hot water . when they begin to float , they are finished .

column1: boil the pierogies in a pot of water .
column2: get pot . fill with water . bring water in pot to a boil . place pierogies in water . wait for them to float .

column1: fold the dough over and press the edges together .
column2: using your hands fold to dough over . with a fork press down the edges .

column1: fold the dough over and press the edges together .
column2: fold the dough over . press the edges together all around . using a fork , press the tines along the edges around the half - circle , making fork prints all along the dough , to help keep it closed .

column1: fold the dough over and press the edges together .
column2: make a dough . tear the one hand size of dough from the dough . put the ingredients in the dough . wrap the ingredients with the dough . use the fork to finish the wrapped dough .

column1: mash the potatoes with butter and cheese .
column2: get a fork or other mashing tool . mash the potatoes until most of the lumps are gone . be sure to mix in the cheese and butter while you are mashing ,

column1: mash the potatoes with butter and cheese .
column2: put the cooked potatoes , butter , and cheese together in a bowl . get a fork and use the underside to smash the food in the bowl . keep smashing until the potatoes , butter , and cheese have no more lumps . mix the mashed potatoes so that the butter and cheese is spread all through the potatoes . eat the potatoes !

column1: mash the potatoes with butter and cheese .
column2: put butter and cheese on the potatoes in the bowl . use a fork to squish everything together until it looks creamy .

column1: cut the fish at an angle in thin slices .
column2: cut the fish in a slant . try to cut into skinny pieces .

column1: cut the fish at an angle in thin slices .
column2: do n't use the first piece due to it will be oddly shaped and not uniform to the other slices . be careful not the cut yourself and be sure to use a sharp knife to properly cut the meat . slice the fish thinly at a 45 degree angle .

column1: cut the fish at an angle in thin slices .
column2: put fish on a cutting board . hold knife on an angle and cut fish in thin slices .

column1: cut the salmon into thin slices .
column2: we will cut the salmon at a diagonal angle . slices should be cut thin .

column1: cut the salmon into thin slices .
column2: using a sharp knife and being very careful , cut the salmon into thin slices . if you 're nervous about cutting yourself ask an adult to help . if you cut it at an angle you 'll have nice wide pieces !

column1: cut the salmon into thin slices .
column2: put salmon on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut very thin slices of fish .

column1: form the rice into a ball and drape the fish over it .
column2: you want to form the sticky sushi rice into a small football shape . do not crush the rice . then you will place the sliced salmon over the sushi rice that was molded .

column1: form the rice into a ball and drape the fish over it .
column2: do n't break the rice , and lay fish over it . form it , nicely . do n't get it too wet . be gentle . do n't let rice , stick to hands .

column1: form the rice into a ball and drape the fish over it .
column2: get your hand a little wet with water . next , take a small amount of rice and form it into a small log . then put the fish on top of the little log .

column1: take sushi rice form a little ball and drape it with tuna slice .
column2: on your cutting board you should have your sliced tuna and bowl of cooked and cooled sushi rice . with your right hand , take enough rice from the bowl to fit in the palm of your hand . roll the rice into a ball . with your left hand , pick up a tuna slice and place it over the rice ball . shape the tuna around the rice ball and place on a plate .

column1: take sushi rice form a little ball and drape it with tuna slice .
column2: take the sticky sushi rice in your hand . form it into a ball by using your hand to squeeze it together . take a slice of tuna and place it over the top of the ball of rice . push it into the rice so it sticks and forms a nice cover to the rice .

column1: take sushi rice form a little ball and drape it with tuna slice .
column2: shape the sushi rice in to a little ball . take a tuna slice . now place the sushi rice in to the tuna . close the tuna slice around the sushi rice . place it on the plate .

column1: remove the cooked foie gras from the oven .
column2: now we want to remove our foie gras from the oven . be careful , as the oven is quite hot . remember the pan is heavy and you want to use oven mitts .

column1: remove the cooked foie gras from the oven .
column2: use oven mitts to remove the pan carefully from the oven . shut the oven door and use the oven mitts to remove the lid . check the foie gras to see how it looks .

column1: remove the cooked foie gras from the oven .
column2: put oven mitts on hand . open the oven door . carefully pull the baking dish out . place on counter . open the lid of the dish .

column1: sprinkle the marinade powder on a plate .
column2: take the marinade powder and carefully pour the pan onto a plate . be careful to spread the powder evenly on the plate so it gets to all parts of it .

column1: sprinkle the marinade powder on a plate .
column2: hold the powder over the plate . slowly shake the powder onto the plate while moving back so it spreads evenly .

column1: sprinkle the marinade powder on a plate .
column2: sprinkle the 21 grams of salt , pepper and the other seasoning on a plate evenly . this will be used to marinate the meat .

column1: cut the foie gras lobes .
column2: using a knife , cute the two lobes apart at the middle . using your fingers , pull out any of the red pieces . if you are having trouble , try using a knife to help you pull the pieces out .

column1: cut the foie gras lobes .
column2: take a cutting board and a knife . take the foie gras lobes on the cutting board . cut the foie gras lobes in to halves . open the lobes and remove the veins . cut it in to small pieces .

column1: cut the foie gras lobes .
column2: using a long fillet knife cut along the midline . expose veins in each lobe . remove one by one .

column1: pour some warm water in a baking tray .
column2: take a baking tray . boil some water till they become warm . take the warm water in a jar . add the warm water in the baking tray . fill up to half of baking tray .

column1: pour some warm water in a baking tray .
column2: fill a container with warm water . carefully pour the water in the baking tray .

column1: pour some warm water in a baking tray .
column2: there are bubbles in the bowl . warm the water in a plastic pitcher . pour warm water into the bowl .

column1: cook in a bain marie .
column2: take your oven mitts and slide out your hot water bowl . place your bain marie on top of the hot water . with your oven mitts slide it back into the oven .

column1: cook in a bain marie .
column2: get a cookie sheet and a large oven proof bowl . fill the bowl about half way with hot water . open the oven door and move the oven rack to the lowest place it can go . place the cookie sheet on the oven rack . now put the bowl of hot water on the cookie sheet . place the covered casserole dish into the hot water . the hot water needs to be have way up the side of the covered casserole dish . close the oven and cook it for 1 1/2 hours .

column1: cook in a bain marie .
column2: fill a glass cooking dish half full with water . place it in the oven . heat the water up . place the pot in the water , with the water half way up the pot . cook for an hour and a half .

column1: wipe the foie gras .
column2: take a paper towel . wipe all the red off the foil gras with the towel . make sure it is clean .

column1: wipe the foie gras .
column2: take a paper towel and wipe the foie gras . clean it and get all the red of it .

column1: wipe the foie gras .
column2: use a paper towel . gently blot all the red of the foie gras .

column1: place the tray in the oven .
column2: take a baking tray . add some boiling water in to the tray . heat the oven . take the tray and place it in the oven . close the oven door .

column1: place the tray in the oven .
column2: pick the tray up off the table . put it back down close to the oven . open the oven door . carefully set the tray onto the pan in the oven . close the oven door .

column1: place the tray in the oven .
column2: carefully lift up the tray being careful not to spill . open the over door . place the tray into the oven .

column1: dip the foie gras in the powder and place them in a deep pan .
column2: take the powder in the plate . take the foie gras and dip it in powder . take the deep pan . place the foie gras in the pan . repeat the same with other piece of foie gras .

column1: dip the foie gras in the powder and place them in a deep pan .
column2: put the seasoning on a plate . dip the foie gras into the seasoning on the plate and season well . once the foie gras is seasoned put into a pot .

column1: dip the foie gras in the powder and place them in a deep pan .
column2: place seasonings on plate . roll meat in seasonings until covered evenly . put meat into glass bowl .

column1: mix sea salt pepper and spices .
column2: get a shallow pan . in the pan put the sea salt , pepper and the 4-spice powder ( quatre spice ) . mix the spices together .

column1: mix sea salt pepper and spices .
column2: put all the spices on a pan or dish . mix them all together .

column1: mix sea salt pepper and spices .
column2: take sea salt and pour it on the pan . add salt and pepper . mix the spices together on the pan .

column1: drizzle cognac on the marinated foie gras .
column2: fill a large metal spoon with cognac and pour around the edges of the foie gras in the pot . fill the large spoon again with cognac and drizzle it on top of the foie gras . allow the foie gras to marinate .

column1: drizzle cognac on the marinated foie gras .
column2: pour 2 tablespoons of cognac . add the cognac across the top of the foie gras .

column1: drizzle cognac on the marinated foie gras .
column2: get a spoon and poor the cognac into the spoon slowly . slowly pour out the cognac in circles on the foie gras .

column1: place basil leaves in the soup .
column2: pull a few basil leaves off the stem . tear the leaves into several pieces each and drop them into the soup .

column1: place basil leaves in the soup .
column2: take a pot on the stove . cook some soup in the pot . take some basil leaves . add some basil leaves in to the soup . mix the contents of the pot .

column1: place basil leaves in the soup .
column2: tear up the basil leaves into small pieces . put the basil leaves into the soup .

column1: pour the tomato puree into the pot .
column2: pour the tomato pure or tomato paste into the heated broth . stir to combine with a wooden spoon .

column1: pour the tomato puree into the pot .
column2: add in the tomato puree to the pot . use the stirring spoon to mix it in to the pot .

column1: pour the tomato puree into the pot .
column2: pour the tomato puree into the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the puree into the broth .

column1: add the garlic and beans to the pot .
column2: add two whole cloves of garlic to the pot and stir with a wooden spoon . then add the beans to the pot and toss with a wooden spoon .

column1: add the garlic and beans to the pot .
column2: put the garlic into the pot and stir it in . pour in the beans to the bot . use the stirring spoon to continue to stir everything together .

column1: add the garlic and beans to the pot .
column2: pick up the garlic and beans with your hands . drop them in the pot .

column1: pour water into the pot .
column2: hold the water over the pot . carefully pour the cup of water in the pot .

column1: pour water into the pot .
column2: add some water into the pot . continue to cook the mixture on the stove top stirring with a spoon .

column1: pour water into the pot .
column2: add water slowly to the pot about two thirds of a pot . make sure to add slowly .

column1: cook the celery and onions in a pot with oil .
column2: pour the celery into a pot with oil . add the onions to the pot . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together as it cooks .

column1: cook the celery and onions in a pot with oil .
column2: add 3 tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil to a hot pan . then add your cut up onions and celery . let it it saute for a few minutes , you do n't want them caramelized just cook till tender .

column1: cook the celery and onions in a pot with oil .
column2: put the celery and onions in a pot . put oil in the pot . stir with a spoon .

column1: add the pasta to the pot .
column2: slowly add the pasta to the boiling pot so no water splashes out . use hand to guide the pasta into the bowl .

column1: add the pasta to the pot .
column2: hold the pasta over the pot . use you hand and scoop the pasta down so it falls in the pot .

column1: add the pasta to the pot .
column2: now we can add in the short pasta . just slowly pour it into the pan , making sure not to spill it .

column1: add black pepper and salt to the soup .
column2: add black pepper to the pan . add salt to the pan . with a wooden spoon mix the mixture .

column1: add black pepper and salt to the soup .
column2: add black pepper into the pot . stir the pepper into the soup . add some salt and mix .

column1: add black pepper and salt to the soup .
column2: turn off the heat under the soup . take a pepper grinder and turn it 3 or 4 times to add pepper . add salt ( not too much and not too little ) . mix the soup with the salt and pepper using a wooden spoon .

column1: add carrots radishes sugar salt to a vinegar to a bowl .
column2: get out a big glass bowl . put the carrots , radishes , sugar , salt and vinegar in the bowl .

column1: add carrots radishes sugar salt to a vinegar to a bowl .
column2: make sure you have all of your ingredients measured ahead of time . combine carrots , radishes , sugar , salt , and vinegar to your main mixing bowl .

column1: mix fish sauce oil and soy sauce in a bowl .
column2: take a small clean bowl . add one tablespoon of fish sauce in to the bowl . add oil in to the bowl . add one table spoon of soy sauce in to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

column1: mix fish sauce oil and soy sauce in a bowl .
column2: add the fish sauce into bowl . add oil into the bowl . also add soy sauce in to the bowl . mix together all the ingredients .

column1: pour the sauce over the bread .
column2: cut the bread loaf in half first . next using a spoon , spoon the dressing and put on the bread .

column1: pour the sauce over the bread .
column2: pick up the sauce with a spoon . pour the sauce on the bread .

column1: pour the sauce over the bread .
column2: cut the bread in to two halves . place the bread on a cutting board . take the sauce in a small bowl . add the sauce with a spoon on the bread . place the sauce bowl aside .

column1: spread mayonnaise on the bread .
column2: take a butter knife and put it in the mayonnaise . put the mayonnaise on the bread from the knife .

column1: spread mayonnaise on the bread .
column2: use a butter knife to scoop out a blob of mayonnaise . put this blob on the inside one of the bread slices ( the soft side ) . now use the knife to spread the mayo in an even layer on the bread .

column1: spread mayonnaise on the bread .
column2: take your knife and dip it into the bowl of mayonnaise . slide the knife over the whole piece of bread .

column1: place lettuce onions chicken jalapenos basil on top of the bread .
column2: take a bread on a board . keep 2 - 3 leaves of lettuce on bread . place onion cut in to rounds on top of lettuce . add chicken on to top of onion . place jalapenos and basil on the bread .

column1: place lettuce onions chicken jalapenos basil on top of the bread .
column2: spread three big slices of lettuce on the bread , make sure to cover the bread . lay three circle slices of onions on top of the lettuce right next to each other . lay the chicken piece on top of the onions and spread it out a little bit . put six slices of dark green spicy jalapenos spread out on top of the chicken . pick up a little bit of the little basil leafs and sprinkle them across the jalapenos .

column1: place lettuce onions chicken jalapenos basil on top of the bread .
column2: take the green lettuce and place them nicely on the bread . grab a piece of onion and push the little ones out till you have two onion rings . place the onions on top of lettuce . next take the sliced chicken and place it on top of onions . put a couple jalapenos on top of chicken .

column1: add vegetable mixture on top of the sandwich .
column2: take a large glass bowl . cut vegetables like carrot and lettuce in to small pieces . mix the vegetables with a tongs . take the vegetable mixture . add the mixture on top of sandwich .

column1: add vegetable mixture on top of the sandwich .
column2: cut carrot into thin slices . cut lettuce into small pieces . cut onion into round pieces . add all the cut vegetable mixture on top of the mixture . the sandwich is ready to eat .

column1: add vegetable mixture on top of the sandwich .
column2: scoop the vegetables onto the sandwich . spread the vegetables around on the sandwich .

column1: put oil on the pan and stir fry the tofu and onion .
column2: keep a pan on the stove and heat the pan . add some oil in to the pan . cut the tofu in to square shaped pieces . add the tofu in to the pan . cut the onion in to small slices and add it to the pan and fry .

column1: put oil on the pan and stir fry the tofu and onion .
column2: drizzle oil into a preheated pan . place the tofu into the pan . remove the outside of the shrimp by pinching at the head and tail . remove the intestine of the shrimp by slicing open the shrimp from its back and pulling out the small intestine . add the red onion and shrimp to the pan and stir .

column1: put oil on the pan and stir fry the tofu and onion .
column2: put some oil into the hot pan until it coats the bottom . add in some tofu that has been cut into cubes . slice half of a red onion into strips . add the onion strips into the pan and stir with spatula .

column1: add prawns to the pan and cook the prawns .
column2: take a large pan on a stove . add some oil in to the pan . add the prawns in to the pan . stir the prawns . cook them till they are brown in color .

column1: add prawns to the pan and cook the prawns .
column2: put the shrimp ( prawns ) in the hot pan . stir them around and let them cook until they change color . they will cook fast ! it may only take about one minute .

column1: add prawns to the pan and cook the prawns .
column2: add prawns into the pan . mix them in the pan . add onions to the pan .

column1: add dry noodles to the pan and fish sauce .
column2: add the rice noodles to the pan and allow them to cook for 1 to 2 minutes . add two tablespoons of fish sauce to the pan . ( work quickly as rice noodles tend to cook very quickly ) . add three tablespoons of sugar to your pan .

column1: add dry noodles to the pan and fish sauce .
column2: take the dry white noodles and put them into the pan you are using . then pour two tablespoons of fish sauce into your tablespoon . then pour your tablespoon of fish sauce into the pan .

column1: add dry noodles to the pan and fish sauce .
column2: take a pan on the stove . take dry noodles in a plate . add dry noodles in to the pan . add 3 table spoons of fish sauce in to the pan . mix noodles and fish sauce .

column1: add sugar diced radish and water .
column2: add 3 tablespoons of sugar to the hot pan . add 1 tablespoon of chopped sweet radish to the pan . add a splash of reserved cooking water to the pan .

column1: add sugar diced radish and water .
column2: add sugar to your preference , 1 tablespoon diced sweet radish , and a little bit of water . stir well .

column1: add sugar diced radish and water .
column2: add 3tbsp of sugar into the wok . then add 1 tbsp of small cut cubes of sweet radish . then add a bit of water and stir .

column1: crack eggs into the pan .
column2: hit the egg lightly against the edge of the frying pan . crack the egg open and empty it into the pan . throw the egg shells away .

column1: crack eggs into the pan .
column2: take two eggs . crack each egg , one by one in the fry pan .

column1: crack eggs into the pan .
column2: take 2 eggs . crack the eggs gently on the counter top and pull apart above the pan so the yolks and whites land in the pan .

column1: mix the ingredients in the pan together .
column2: pick up spatula . mix in a circle motion to combine .

column1: mix the ingredients in the pan together .
column2: mash the eggs around , using the spatula . mix everything in the pan together with the spatula . cut the scallions ( carefully ) with a knife into short sections .

column1: mix the ingredients in the pan together .
column2: once the eggs are in the pan be sure to keep stirring them and break the yolks ( yellow part ) so it scrambles . make sure the eggs are completely cooked . once the eggs are cooked you can mix all of the food in the pan together .

column1: add sliced spring onion and handful of beansprout and mix all ingredients together .
column2: find your spring onions . they will be long and green and look kind of like green beans . carefully cut your spring onions with a cooking knife . put the spring onions into your cooking pan . find your beansprouts . they are white and look kind of like white tentacles . take a big handful of beansprouts and put them together with the spring onions into the cooking pan . mix everything together with your spatula .

column1: add sliced spring onion and handful of beansprout and mix all ingredients together .
column2: put 3 sliced spring onions into the pan . put a big handful of bean sprouts into the pan . cook for just a little while if you want the beans to stay harder . cook for longer if you want the beans to be softer .

column1: add sliced spring onion and handful of beansprout and mix all ingredients together .
column2: add sliced spring onions to the skillet . add a handful of bean sprouts to the skillet . take a big spoon and stir the ingredients in the skillet .

column1: add oil to a wok .
column2: grab mustard oil . add 5 tablespoons of mustard oil to pan .

column1: add oil to a wok .
column2: get a spoon . pour oil into the spoon slowly . add 4 spoons of oil like this .

column1: add oil to a wok .
column2: get a pan . add 5 table spoon . mustard oil . get a parent before add anything . add the rest of recipe & enjoy .

column1: mix curd onion paste salt sugar chili powder turmeric garlic paste and chili paste together .

column1: mix curd onion paste salt sugar chili powder turmeric garlic paste and chili paste together .
column2: place a bowl on the table . add in each of the ingredients . mix them together .

column1: mix curd onion paste salt sugar chili powder turmeric garlic paste and chili paste together .

column1: fry onion in a pan .
column2: put the onions into the pan with oil . fry them for 1 minute .

column1: fry onion in a pan .

column1: add the mixture and the chicken to the pan .
column2: put the mixed ingredients in the pan . then add the chicken piece to the pan .

column1: add the mixture and the chicken to the pan .
column2: add the mixture and the chicken to the hot pan . stir them with your spoon .

column1: add the mixture and the chicken to the pan .
column2: pour the mix into the pan . use a spoon to get all of it out of the bowl . add the chicken carefully to the pan . wash your hands .

column1: add water to the pan .
column2: add one cup of water to the pan . use your spoon to continue to stir the mixture in the pan .

column1: add water to the pan .
column2: wait until the food is hot and steaming . go to the sink and fill up a measuring cup with one cup of water . slowly pour the water into the pan . wait for the water to start bubbling .

column1: add water to the pan .

column1: mix the chicken in .

column1: mix the chicken in .

column1: add the spices to the pan and mix .

column1: add the spices to the pan and mix .

column1: add the pan ingredients and coriander to the curry .

column1: mix tomatoes in .

column1: add salt to the pan .
column2: hold the salt over the pan . slowly pour some salt in the pan in circles .

column1: add salt to the pan .

column1: add salt to the pan .
column2: add salt into the pan . with a spoon mix it all together .

column1: add mustard to the pan and then the onion .
column2: be careful , the oil will spit at you . take a pinch of mustard and put it in the pan . the oil will bubble up . get your onions ready in a bowl . use a spoon to dump them into the pan with the mustard .

column1: add mustard to the pan and then the onion .
column2: first , you need to put the burner on medium heat and place a pan on top . second , you need to add a small amount of vegetable oil to pan . third , you will need to add a large pinch of the spice mustard to the oil . fourth , you need to chop up an onion into small pieces . fifth , gently add the chopped up onion to the pan .

column1: add mustard to the pan and then the onion .

column1: add the onion ginger and garlic to the pan .
column2: carefully , hold the plate over the pot and pour the onion , ginger , and garlic into the pot . you will hear the onion , ginger and garlic will start sizzling right away , so quickly start stirring . keep stirring until the onion , ginger and garlic start to turn a little brown .

column1: add the onion ginger and garlic to the pan .
column2: heat a pan on the stove with a little oil in it . add the sliced onion , ginger and garlic into the hot oil . stir until the vegetables become slightly brown .

column1: add the onion ginger and garlic to the pan .
column2: make sure your pan is hot . carefully add the onions , ginger and garlic to the pan . be sure that it 's all in the pan . get a spoon . slowly stir and cook until the ingredients are slightly brown .

column1: add water to the curry .
column2: your pan ( metal ) with the ingredients will be on the stove , and using a wooden spoon , pour water into the curry mix . you will put about a half a cup of water into the pan . after the water is added , while you begin to mix the water into the ingredients , also turn the stove to hi to start heating the pan . start to mix the ingredients by taking your wooden spoon along the edge of the pan and pull the ingredients towards the middle .

column1: add water to the curry .
column2: take a medium sized pot . cook the curry in the pot . take some water in a jar . add some water in to the pot of curry . mix the curry with a spoon .

column1: add water to the curry .
