column1: boil some water in a pot .
column2: add 1 quart of vegetable oil to a large pot . have a thermometer in the liquid . heat the oil up .

column1: boil some water in a pot .
column2: get a large container of vegetable oil . pour 1 quart of vegetable oil ( 4 cups ) into a deep pot .

column1: boil some water in a pot .
column2: get a large pot and place it on the stove . do not turn on heat just yet . pour 1 quart of vegetable oil in the pot . turn on the stove and heat the oil to the correct temperature . be very careful when cooking with hot oil . it can be very dangerous if not used safely !

column1: mix cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .
column2: hold the small bowls over the big bowl while pouring . pour in the bowls of cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .

column1: mix cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .
column2: mix the 1 c cornmeal , 1 c flour , 1/4 tsp salt , 1/8 tsp pepper , 1/4 c sugar , and 4 tsp 0f baking powder in the bowl . mix them up with a spoon .

column1: mix cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .
column2: add 1 cup of yellow corn meal to a bowl . then add 1 cup of flour . add 1/4 teaspoon of salt . add 1/8 of black pepper , add 1/4 cup of sugar . add four teaspoons of baking powder .

column1: stir in eggs and milk .
column2: add 1 egg and 1 cup of milk . mix it all up . put the batter into the refrigerator for a little while before dipping the frankfurters .

column1: stir in eggs and milk .
column2: stir in one egg . add one cup of milk and stir in . refrigerate the batter .

column1: stir in eggs and milk .
column2: get one bowl of flour , 1 wooden spoon , 1 egg , and 1 cup of milk . break your egg and remove broken shells if you see any . put the egg and the milk into the bowl with the flour . stir for 2 minutes with a wooden spoon . put the bowl of batter in the refrigerator and wait for an hour .

column1: insert wooden skewers into frankfurters .
column2: hold the frankfurters in your hand . carefully push the wooden stick pointy end first through the middle of the frankfurters so the meat is right on the stick .

column1: insert wooden skewers into frankfurters .
column2: while your batter is cooling down , slowly insert the wooden skewers into the frankfurters . just hold the beef frankfurter by the middle and slowly push your wooden skewer into them , but not to fast or you may stab your hand .

column1: insert wooden skewers into frankfurters .
column2: take hotdogs out of the package and put on a cutting board . pick up one hot dog and push wooded stick into one end of the hotdog . repeat until all of the hotdogs are on a stick .

column1: roll frankfurters in batter until well coated .
column2: put the finished batter into a tall jar . roll the hot dogs into the batter covering them all around .

column1: roll frankfurters in batter until well coated .
column2: hold the frankfurters by a stick . one by one put them in the jar and spin them around with the stick getting the batter all over it . do this with each frankfurter .

column1: roll frankfurters in batter until well coated .
column2: fill a tall mason jar with the batter . holding the skewer , dip the frankfurter into the batter . roll the frankfurter until it is completely coated with batter .

column1: fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time until they are ready .
column2: lower the corn dogs into the hot oil . cook until light brown , about 3 or 4 minutes . take the corn dogs out of the oil and lay on paper towel .

column1: fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time until they are ready .
column2: check oil is at correct heated degree . slowly lower coated corn dogs into oil . let cook two or three min . until lightly brown for a soft crust . darker crust for crusty crust .

column1: fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time until they are ready .
column2: while holding the stick end of the corn dog , dip the corn dog into the oil until all the corn dog is covered with oil . set the timer for 4 minutes . hold the corn dog in the oil until the timer dings . should be lightly brown . remove the corn dog from the oil and place on a paper towel so the oil is soaked in the towel . do the same thing for the next corn dog .

column1: cut the chicken .
column2: get two thawed boneless , skinless chicken breast . carefully use a knife to trim off the excess skin and fat from the edges . cut the chicken breast in half . put them aside . proceed to the next chicken breast and repeat the same steps .

column1: cut the chicken .
column2: use a sharp knife to cut off any gristly or fatty parts ( anything white instead of pink ) . lay the breast out longways . cut it into half along the short part , not longways .

column1: cut the chicken .
column2: cut off pieces of fat from chicken using a sharp knife . cut chicken breasts in half width wise .

column1: pound the chicken .
column2: take 2 feet of baking paper and fold it in half . place your chicken portions in the middle of the paper , in between the folded paper . there should be baking paper at the top and bottom of the chicken . using a bowl or rolling pin , smash the chicken , until it become 1/2 inch thin .

column1: pound the chicken .
column2: cover chicken with paper . use cup to hit chicken and flatten it .

column1: pound the chicken .
column2: cover the chicken with wax paper . hit the chicken several times with anything heavy .

column1: whisk the eggs .
column2: get a small bowl . get two small eggs . crack the eggs into the bowl . if you get shells in the bowl make sure you take them out . get a fork and stir the eggs together in the bowl .

column1: whisk the eggs .
column2: crack to large eggs into a bowl . whisk the eggs together with a fork .

column1: whisk the eggs .
column2: take two eggs and crack them against the side of the bowl . pour the insides into the bowl . make sure that none of the hard egg outside shell gets in the bowl . take a fork and mix them around until they are all mixed together and the same yellow color .

column1: mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese together .
column2: use a fork to mix eggs in the bowl . put 1 and a half cups of bread crumbs in another bowl . add one quarter cup of grated parmesan cheese to bread crumbs .

column1: mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese together .
column2: in a medium bowl add 1.5 cups of italian breadcrumbs . add a quarter cup of grated parmesan cheese . gently mix together with your hand .

column1: mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese together .
column2: put 1 and 1/2 cups of italian style bread crumbs . next add a 1/4 cup of parmesan cheese . mix the bread crumb and parmesan together .

column1: mix flour salt and pepper together .
column2: add a half cup of white flour to a medium sized bowl . add a teaspoon of salt . add a half a teaspoon of black pepper from your pepper grinder . mix together . use with the other ingredients to bread the chicken .

column1: mix flour salt and pepper together .
column2: you will need three bowls , a small spoon frying pan and a long spoon for frying . ingredients : 1 tea spoon of salt , 1/2 cup flour , 1 tea spoon black pepper , 2 large eggs half a cup bread crumbs , three pieces of chicken breast cooking oil , spaghetti water and cheese . procedure : beat eggs in a separate bowl , put bread crumbs in a separate bowl . in a larger bowl mix flour , salt and black pepper together . take your chicken breast and deep into the into the mixture of flour pepper and salt and into the bread crumbs , and finally into the beaten eggs . after this deep your chicken breast into a preheated oil in the pan . for two minutes before putting it into the oven . boil your spaghetti in a separate pan . serve while hot with cheese .

column1: mix flour salt and pepper together .
column2: take a small bowl . take half a cup of flour . add half teaspoon of pepper powder in to the bowl . add teaspoon of salt in to the bowl . mix everything with the spoon .

column1: coat the chicken in the flour mixture the egg mixture and then the bread crumbs .
column2: take one piece of chicken and press it in the front then turn chicken over and press the back in the bowl with white flour . take chicken out of flour and dip it good in eggs so it covers it all good and gooey . take chicken outta eggs and drop it into smashed bread crumbs so it 's covered all over . take smothered chicken piece and put it on a clean plate then do the same thing in same order with the other pieces of chicken . call your mom or an adult to help with how to bake it & that 's it ! you rock !

column1: coat the chicken in the flour mixture the egg mixture and then the bread crumbs .
column2: take bread crumbs and flour in two separate bowls . take egg mixture in a bowl . coat the chicken in the flour mixture . then dip the chicken in to egg mixture . now coat the chicken with bread crumbs .

column1: coat the chicken in the flour mixture the egg mixture and then the bread crumbs .
column2: coat the chicken in the flour mixture . then put it in the egg mixture . shake off the extra egg . put the chicken into the bread crumbs . push it into the bread crumbs .

column1: add oil to a pan .
column2: heat skillet on medium heat . pour in about 3 ounces of oil . oil should be enough to cover bottom of pan . about on fourth inch deep . once oil is heated , place chicken in pan to start frying .

column1: add oil to a pan .
column2: preheat the skillet over medium high heat . pour 1/4 inch of extra virgin olive oil into the bottom of the pan . allow the oil to come up to temperature .

column1: add oil to a pan .
column2: place the skillet on your stove with the dial turned to medium . pour in extra virgin olive oil until there is about 1/4 of an inch in the bottom of your pan .

column1: fry the chicken in the pan .
column2: carefully add chicken pieces to the hot oil being careful not to splash the oil . do n't put too many pieces in the pan at once . fry the chicken pieces for 2 minutes on one side . carefully turn the chicken pieces over and cook another 2 minutes . put the chicken on some paper towel on a plate to drain it . cook the rest of the chicken in the same way .

column1: fry the chicken in the pan .
column2: lower the chicken into the pan slowly . do not put a lot of chicken in the pan at once . set a timer to 2 minutes . after 2 minutes , turn the chicken in the pan onto it 's other side . after 2 minutes remove the chicken .

column1: fry the chicken in the pan .
column2: start frying the chicken pieces once the oil is hot enough by placing your chicken gently in the oil and remember not to put too many pieces at once . you need to cook them for two minutes until the breading is a nice golden brown , but it 's ok if the chicken is not completely cooked through since you will be baking them . you can use a fork to flip them on the other side and cook for about 2 more minutes . once they 're golden on both sides you can transfer them to plate .

column1: place the chicken in a baking dish .
column2: place the fried chicken in the bottom of a glass baking dish . try to make sure they are n't laying on top of each other .

column1: place the chicken in a baking dish .
column2: take the pieces of chicken . put the chicken in a glass dish . make sure they are not on top of each other / overlapping .

column1: place the chicken in a baking dish .
column2: use your hands to put the chicken into the tray . make sure none of them are on top of each other . then take the marinara sauce and use a ladle to put it on top of the chicken .

column1: add marinara sauce and cheese on top of the chicken .
column2: add sauce to each piece of chicken in the dish . put the sauce on top of the chicken . add cheese on top of the sauce for each chicken . turn the dial on oven to 350 to preheat . " put chicken in oven and take out when it is golden brown . turn dial to off " " to turn off the oven " " . "

column1: add marinara sauce and cheese on top of the chicken .
column2: first add 1/2 cup of marinara to the top of each chicken parmesan . then put a hand full of mozzarella cheese . then sprinkle a little parmesan cheese to the chicken .

column1: add marinara sauce and cheese on top of the chicken .
column2: take a ladle . put half a cup of pasta sauce in the ladle and to add it to each piece of chicken . use your hands to put mozzarella cheese on each piece of chicken . use your hands to put parmesan cheese on the pieces of chicken . bake the chicken in an oven at 350 degrees .

column1: bake the chicken in an oven .
column2: place chicken , tomato and cheese dish into the oven . cook the chicken until it is golden brown on top . remove the chicken dish from the oven using an oven mitt . turn off the oven .

column1: bake the chicken in an oven .
column2: use hot pads and put them into the oven . when they are done use the hot pads with both hands to get your dish out .

column1: bake the chicken in an oven .
column2: wear your oven mitts and place the casserole dish of chicken in the oven . when the chicken is done , turn the oven off , put on your oven mitts again and carefully open the oven . make sure your face is not too close to the oven door , the very hot air will escape when you open the oven . safety first ! carefully take the casserole dish of chicken out of the oven , making sure your arms and face are far enough away from any hot surfaces . close the oven and enjoy your chicken !

column1: flip it over and put some cucumber and avocado on top .
column2: wet the board with a wet towel so that the rice wo n't stick to it . flip the ingredients over so that the rice i said facing down and touching the board . add some avocado slices to the top , making sure to try to keep it in centered in a line down the middle . add some cucumber slices right next to the avocado slices on the middle as well .

column1: flip it over and put some cucumber and avocado on top .
column2: take a wet towel and rub the wooden cutting board to make it a little wet . spread rice over a sheet of nori and make sure to cover the entire piece of nori . place the rice and nori , rice side down on the wet cutting board . cut some avocados and cucumbers into thin slices . place the avocado and cucumber slices on top of the rice .

column1: flip it over and put some cucumber and avocado on top .
column2: use a wet towel and rub it on the cutting board . put the rice face down on the board . add avocado slices to the top of the seaweed . then place some sliced cucumber on top .

column1: season the tuna meat with some chili sauce and chili oil .
column2: take your bowl of finally chopped tuna meat and add with a spoon some chili sauce . then take the bottle of chili pepper oil and drizzle over the tuna .

column1: season the tuna meat with some chili sauce and chili oil .
column2: find a one teaspoon measuring spoon . measure out one teaspoon of vietnamese chili sauce . pour sauce over the cut up tuna meat . measure out one teaspoon of sriracha sauce , pour this on tuna . pour out a tiny bit of sesame chili oil onto tuna , about one teaspoonful .

column1: season the tuna meat with some chili sauce and chili oil .
column2: use a spoon to put one teaspoon of vietnamese sauce in the tuna . put one teaspoon of sriracha sauce in the tuna . put some sesame chili oil into the tuna .

column1: roll it up    sprinkle some more sesame seeds and cover with a plastic wrapper .
column2: grab each corner long ways . fold it over the filling in the middle and roll it . sprinkle more sesame seeds on top . wrap it up with plastic wrap .

column1: roll it up    sprinkle some more sesame seeds and cover with a plastic wrapper .
column2: take the edge of the seaweed and roll the sushi . press firmly while rolling but not so hard that the roll breaks . place a plastic wrapper over the top of the roll .

column1: roll it up    sprinkle some more sesame seeds and cover with a plastic wrapper .
column2: to roll it , grab the edge with your thumb and fingers . push the inside and roll the edge up . make sure the edge is tucked and roll it before you reach the other edge . after you roll it up , cover it with plastic wrap so it will not stick to the bamboo .

column1: sprinkle some sesame seeds on top .
column2: shake some sesame seeds on top of the rice . you can also use black sesame seeds if you 'd like .

column1: sprinkle some sesame seeds on top .
column2: hold the sesame seed shaker over the rice . shake the seeds while moving back and forth so they cover the rice evenly .

column1: sprinkle some sesame seeds on top .
column2: add rice onto seaweed and lightly to flatten . add sesame seeds of your choice on top of rice .

column1: prepare a piece of sushi seaweed wrapper .
column2: set the seaweed wrapper on a cutting board . prepare to add ingredients to the seaweed wrapper .

column1: prepare a piece of sushi seaweed wrapper .
column2: take your seaweed and place it on your cutting board . add water with your hands to the top of the seaweed .

column1: prepare a piece of sushi seaweed wrapper .
column2: place a sheet of seaweed on a cutting board . dip your fingers in the bowl of water .

column1: spread some sushi rice on the wrapper .
column2: place your toasted seaweed onto your cutting board . place your handful pressed rice to your seaweed starting at the top . dip your fingers into water if your fingers become sticky . now tap with your fingers to push the rice down to cover the whole seaweed in a thin layer . work from the top of the seaweed spreading it down to the opposite edge .

column1: spread some sushi rice on the wrapper .
column2: place the seaweed called nori on the cutting board . get the rice and spread it on top of the seaweed . gently press on the rice evenly . wet your fingers to make it easy to flatten the rice . make sure the rice is completely covering the seaweed before rolling .

column1: spread some sushi rice on the wrapper .
column2: set a piece of seaweed on a cutting board . place the cooked rice on the seaweed . spread the rice out evenly onto the seaweed .

column1: mix the seasoning well and put the tuna on top of the sushi base .
column2: use a fork to mix the seasoning into the tuna . if you want it a little higher add extra chili sauce . use the fork to put the tuna mixture onto the seaweed .

column1: mix the seasoning well and put the tuna on top of the sushi base .
column2: mix the seasoning into the tuna very well , using a spoon or fork . place the tuna in a thin strip onto the sushi base .

column1: mix the seasoning well and put the tuna on top of the sushi base .
column2: take a fork and mix the bowl of seasoning all around . scoop up the tuna and put it on the seaweed wrap .

column1: use a bamboo mat to press it firmly .
column2: take a bamboo mat and put it over the roll . squeeze the roll with the mat and push down on it .

column1: use a bamboo mat to press it firmly .
column2: set a bamboo mat on top of the plastic around the rolled sushi . squeeze the mat around the sushi pushing the sushi together .

column1: use a bamboo mat to press it firmly .
column2: cover with bamboo mat . push in each end . push in the middle .

column1: chop the long rod to small rolls .
column2: dip the blade of the knife in water . slice the sushi in the middle . cut the sushi into 8 equal pieces .

column1: chop the long rod to small rolls .
column2: dip the tip of your knife in water and tilt it on its handle so the water coats the blade . now slice the sushi in half . now cut that half in half again . cut that half again through the middle . keep slicing the sushi until you have eight equal pieces and place them nicely on its side so you can see the inside of the sushi .

column1: chop the long rod to small rolls .
column2: dip your knife in some water , so the blade is wet . place the long roll on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to slice the roll into 8 equal size pieces .

column1: place the ground beef on the foil and flatten out .
column2: take the ground beef and smooth it out . flatten the beef on the foil .

column1: place the ground beef on the foil and flatten out .
column2: open hamburger package and put the meat onto the foil . using your hands , press down on the meat until you have a flat , thin circle of meat . wash your hands after you are done touching the meat .

column1: place the ground beef on the foil and flatten out .
column2: take your raw ground beef and place it on the flattened out foil . now you want to the beef and flatten it out until it is smooth . do n't press so hard the meat sticks to the foil though . a rolling pin can also be used , if the right amount of pressure is applied .

column1: cut the beef into square patties .
column2: take a flat piece of beef . take a knife and start cutting . cut the edges . move the edges away from the main piece . cut squares of thin beef .

column1: cut the beef into square patties .
column2: flatten the meat out so it 's spread apart . carefully cut the meat into square shapes . use the knife to push the meat away from the rest .

column1: cut the beef into square patties .
column2: after you have rolled out the beef onto sheets of tin foil , find a sharp knife . at the edge of your rolled beef , gently used the knife to cut a thin rectangle strip . be careful not to cut through the tin foil . use your knife to scoot the rectangle strip over so that you have room to cut another strip . when all of your rolled out beef has been cut into rectangular strips , turn the foil and cut it again , this time making your strips into squares .

column1: toast the buns .
column2: put the buns in a tin pan . put the pan under the broiler for about 30 second to one minute .

column1: toast the buns .
column2: put the bun under the broiler . leave for 30 seconds to 1 minute until they are lightly toasted .

column1: toast the buns .
column2: now take your buns and we will toast them ! all you need to do is place them in their dish and put them underneath your broiler for 30 seconds to a minute .

column1: fry the burger patties and flip when browned .
column2: take a pan and heat the pan . add some oil in to the pan and heat the oil . cut the burger patties in to square shaped pieces . place the patty on the pan and cook on one side . flip it to the other side and cook .

column1: fry the burger patties and flip when browned .
column2: place burger in pan . flip burger after 4 to 5 min . take burger off pan .

column1: fry the burger patties and flip when browned .
column2: place a pan on the stove . add oil to the pan . turn on the heat on the stove so the oil can get hot . carefully , with a spatula , pick up the burger patties and slide them onto the pan . make sure to watch out for oil spitting at you when it makes contact with the moisture in the burger . cook for a few minutes until the bottoms are browned but not to the point they are black ! when the patties are the right color of brown , flip them carefully with the spatula . once again , be aware about the oil spitting . once the other side is browned and the juices run clear out of the meat ( not red ) the burger is ready .

column1: top the patties with cheese .
column2: the meat will be hot and sizzling . carefully place a cheese on each meat piece .

column1: top the patties with cheese .
column2: after the patties look cooked / browned . put the slices of cheese on top . let melt .

column1: top the patties with cheese .
column2: cut a square of sliced cheese a little bit larger than the square hamburger patties . using tongs place the cheese on top of the hamburgers after they have turned brown in the frying pan . it is important not to get your hands to close to the hot frying pan . after the cheese is melted onto the hamburger which takes about 1 - 2 minutes place the hamburger on a bun .

column1: place the patty on a bun and top with a bun .
column2: get the plate with the patties ready . place the top buns on each patty .

column1: place the patty on a bun and top with a bun .
column2: find bun not plate . put this bun on burger .

column1: place the patty on a bun and top with a bun .
column2: place the top of the burger bun on top of the melted cheese ! now your sandwich is ready to enjoy !

column1: press the dough down and roll out .
column2: use your fingers to press on the dough . make a circle with a dough . take a rolling pin and flatten the dough .

column1: press the dough down and roll out .
column2: sprinkle a little flour to the top of the dough . press gently with your fingertips from the inside out in a circular motion to flatten the dough a little . flip it over and keep doing this until you have a flat , circular piece of dough . use a wine bottle ( or a rolling pin if you have one ) to roll the dough by rolling it back and forth over the dough . turn the dough sideways and roll again to make a nice circle .

column1: press the dough down and roll out .
column2: add some flour on the board . take a ball of dough on the board . press the dough with hand . roll the dough using a glass bottle . roll the dough in to thin circle .

column1: sprinkle salt and pepper onto the pizza .
column2: grab some salt and pepper with your hand . sprinkle the salt and pepper on top .

column1: sprinkle salt and pepper onto the pizza .
column2: take the prepared pizza on the board . add some salt on the pizza . crush some pepper in to powder . add the pepper powder on to the pizza . spread the salt and pepper evenly .

column1: cook the pizza in the oven .
column2: take pizza dough and roll it out . cut mozzarella cheese into slices . add basil to the pizza . place on a pizza stone . put in the oven and cook until brown .

column1: cook the pizza in the oven .
column2: heat the oven to 475 degrees . put the pizza into the over . cook for 8 to 11 minutes .

column1: cook the pizza in the oven .
column2: place the pizza in the oven using a pan . cook the pizza in the oven . take the pizza out of the oven using the pan .

column1: spread the sauce onto the dough .
column2: use a scoop to scoop sauce in the middle of the dough . use the scoop to make circles with the sauce to spread it out .

column1: spread the sauce onto the dough .
column2: use a spoon to scoop the sauce onto the dough . spread the sauce evenly around the dough .

column1: spread the sauce onto the dough .
column2: roll the dough on the board . take the thick roll of dough . take the sauce on the bowl . take a big spreading spoon . spread the sauce on to the dough .

column1: place basil onto the pizza .
column2: take the pizza on the board . take some basil leaves . identify the spaces in between cheese . place the basil leaf in between the cheese . cover the entire spaces in between the cheese .

column1: place basil onto the pizza .
column2: break the basil leafs up with your hands . sprinkle the leaves on the pizza evenly .

column1: place basil onto the pizza .
column2: get fresh basil leaves . place them on top of the pizza evenly .

column1: place mozzarella cheese onto the pizza .
column2: pick up the mozzarella cheese your hands . place the cheese in a circle around the pizza .

column1: place mozzarella cheese onto the pizza .
column2: take your slices of cheese and place them in a ring around the outside of the pizza , about 1/2 an inch apart . use less cheese if you like less cheese though . then take three pieces of the cheese and space them evenly in the center of the dough .

column1: place mozzarella cheese onto the pizza .
column2: roll out pizza dough on a pizza pan . pour sauce on the dough and spread around . slice mozzarella cheese into pieces with a knife . then place the mozzarella cheese around the dough . finally get ready to place in an oven .

column1: remove the fried calamari and place them on a paper .
column2: take a pan on the stove . add some oil in the pan . heat the oil in the pan . fry the calamari in the oil . remove the fried calamari from the pan and place them on the paper .

column1: remove the fried calamari and place them on a paper .
column2: use tongs and carefully remove the fried calamari from the oil . put the fried calamari on some paper towels to drain the oil off . leave the heat on high but wait 1 minute before you add more calamari to fry so the oil can heat up again .

column1: remove the fried calamari and place them on a paper .
column2: take the fried calamari out of pan using a fork or something else not your fingers . place cooked calamari on a plate that 's covered in paper for them to dry .

column1: repeat the same procedure for the tentacles also coat them with flour and keep aside .
column2: place pan with prepared tentacles , a bowl with flour coating and a plate on the counter . put the first tentacle in the flour . completely dust the tentacle with flour coating . place the coated tentacle on the plate . repeat for all other tentacles .

column1: repeat the same procedure for the tentacles also coat them with flour and keep aside .
column2: put the tentacles in the flour with your hands . mix it in the flour with your hands so they are covered . grab it and pull it back out and put it aside .

column1: repeat the same procedure for the tentacles also coat them with flour and keep aside .
column2: take the tentacles and also coat them completely with flour . do this one at a time and then set them aside on a plate .

column1: cut calamari into thick rings .
column2: place a calamari onto the cutting board . " with a sharp knife , cut the calamari , beginning at the wide end , in 1/4 strips . " " . " the cut calamari will be in a ring shape . do not cut or chop the tentacles .

column1: cut calamari into thick rings .
column2: hold the other end of the calamari . use a knife to cut finger sized lines which will make rings out of the calamari .

column1: cut calamari into thick rings .
column2: take a cutting board and a knife . take a calamari on the board . cut the calamari in to thick rings . place the rings on the cutting board . cut the entire calamari in to rings .

column1: drop the cut calamari in the flour and mix well to coat the calamari as much as possible .
column2: now make sure your calamari stays wet ! drop the calamari into your bowl of flour and toss them around . keep doing this until each piece is completely covered in flour .

column1: drop the cut calamari in the flour and mix well to coat the calamari as much as possible .
column2: take the cut calamari in a plate . take the flour mixture in a bowl . add the calamari pieces in to the flour bowl . mix the flour well . coat the calamari with the flour mixture .

column1: drop the cut calamari in the flour and mix well to coat the calamari as much as possible .
column2: grab the calamari with your hands and drop it in the flour . use your hands to roll the calamari around covering them with flour .

column1: take the coated calamari out of the flour and put them on a plate .
column2: add a lot of flour to a bowl . add the calamari rings to the bowl . move them around and coat them well . grab a few at a time and shake them off . set them on a plate for 5 minutes before you fry them .

column1: take the coated calamari out of the flour and put them on a plate .
column2: take the calamari out of the flour pan . put the calamari on a plate . wait 5 minutes before putting them in the pot .

column1: take the coated calamari out of the flour and put them on a plate .
column2: now we want to take the calamari out of the pan and let them sit . let them sit for about 5 minutes so the flour will stick well to the calamari .

column1: add salt and garlic powder seasoning black pepper powder to the flour and mix well .
column2: take a medium sized bowl and add some flour in to the bowl . add little salt in to the flour . add some garlic salt in to the flour . add black pepper powder in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

column1: add salt and garlic powder seasoning black pepper powder to the flour and mix well .
column2: add salt , garlic powder , seasoning , and black pepper to the flour in the bowl . use your spoon to mix everything together good .

column1: add salt and garlic powder seasoning black pepper powder to the flour and mix well .
column2: put the seasoning and the black pepper in the flour . use a spoon to mix the seasonings into the flour .

column1: put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil and fry .
column2: grab a piece of coated calamari with tongs . slowly lower the piece into the oil carefully . continue to add pieces like this and cook .

column1: put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil and fry .
column2: take a pan on the stove . pour some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil . fry them in the hot oil .

column1: put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil and fry .
column2: pick up the calamari with tongs and set it into the pan of oil . stir the calamari and let it fry .

column1: heat 2 cups of oil in a pan .
column2: pour 2 cups of oil in a pan . turn the heat on the stove up . heat the oil .

column1: heat 2 cups of oil in a pan .
column2: put two cups of oil in a pan . heat the oil up at 360 degrees .

column1: heat 2 cups of oil in a pan .
column2: put the pan of oil on the stove and heat to 180 celsius or 360 fahrenheit . use high heat when heating the oil .

column1: plate the fried calamari with tabasco sauce lemon slices and lettuce leaves and serve .
column2: set the fried calamari around the edges of a plate . put lettuce leaves in between the sections of the fried calamari . put the tabasco sauce in the center of the plate . add some lemon slices . serve the calamari .

column1: plate the fried calamari with tabasco sauce lemon slices and lettuce leaves and serve .
column2: line up the fried calamari on a plate . place lettuce leaves between each pile of calamari . put the bowl of sauce in the middle .

column1: plate the fried calamari with tabasco sauce lemon slices and lettuce leaves and serve .
column2: take a big plate . take a small bowl . add some tabasco sauce in the bowl and place in center of plate . add the fried calamari on the plate . add the lettuce leaves on the plate . add some lemon slice in the plate .

column1: heat up oil garlic and herbs in a pot .
column2: clean the garlic and herbs properly . put oil in a pot . add garlic in to the oil once oil is hot . add herbs into the pot with oil and garlic . mix altogether and cook it .

column1: heat up oil garlic and herbs in a pot .
column2: put a small pot on the stove and turn the heat to medium . put oil in the pot , enough to cover the bottom of the pot with about a half inch . place two cloves of garlic on a cutting board and use the side of a knife to smash the cloves . place the smashed garlic cloves into the pot of oil , allow to cook for about two minutes . add whatever herbs you would like , turn off the heat , put a cover on the pot and wait for 5 minutes .

column1: heat up oil garlic and herbs in a pot .
column2: place small pot on the burner . add about 1/4 cup of oil . turn heat about halfway ( for medium heat ) . when oil is hot place unpeeled garlic in the pot and cook for 2 minutes . add the herbs to the pot , turn off the heat , cover the pot , and let it sit for about 5 minutes .

column1: cut up the tomatoes .
column2: take the stem out of the tomato . next cut up the tomatoes into 1 inch pieces .

column1: cut up the tomatoes .
column2: take a tomato and place it on the counter . cut up the tomato for the sauce with a sharp nice .

column1: cut up the tomatoes .
column2: wash the tomatoes . remove the stems by pulling them out or using a knife . cut the tomatoes into quarters ( four equal pieces ) on a cutting board , using a knife . chop the quarters into three chunks each .

column1: mix garlic basil and tomatoes in a food processor .
column2: cut tomatoes with a knife . put garlic and basil into the food processor and press the on button . keep the food processor on until the garlic and basil are in tiny pieces . add the cut tomatoes to the garlic and basil in the food processor . put food processor on the pulse setting until they 're in small pieces . remove the food processor .

column1: mix garlic basil and tomatoes in a food processor .
column2: cut tomatoes in to small pieces . keep basil and garlic in a food processor and on it . grind them in to small pieces . add the cut tomatoes in to food processor . grind them also .

column1: mix garlic basil and tomatoes in a food processor .
column2: put in garlic and basil into food processor and push ' pulse ' until the pieces are small . put tomatoes into the mixture and push ' pulse ' for just a little bit until the tomatoes are cut up .

column1: stir in tomato paste .
column2: add tomato paste . then add sugar to tomato paste . next add the salt and pepper to the mixture . stir all ingredients together until mixed together well .

column1: stir in tomato paste .
column2: use the can opener to open the can of tomato paste . use a measuring spoon to measure out as much as you need . stir it into the sauce .

column1: stir in tomato paste .
column2: take sauce from food processor . mix together with spatula in a bowl .

column1: slice the mozzarella .
column2: using a sharp knife . slice the mozzarella into round thin pieces about 1/4 inch thick .

column1: slice the mozzarella .
column2: ask a parent for help with this activity . cut the cheese into thin coin shapes .

column1: slice the mozzarella .
column2: with a sharp knife slice mozzarella . make sure the slices are about the same thickness .

column1: stretch out the dough into a circle .
column2: now , time to stretch out the dough . begin by flattening the dough ball . try to work it into a circle shape . spread your fingers apart and work the dough to the right shape .

column1: stretch out the dough into a circle .
column2: flatten pizza and place over a tray that 's covered in flour . press down on the dough until it resembles a circle . spinning the flat dough on the tray and stretch it gradually with your fingers . lift an edge of the dough and let it slowly fall toward the tray . rotate it like you 're turning a steering wheel until it looks like a pizza crust .

column1: stretch out the dough into a circle .
column2: flatten the dough ball with your hands . stretch the dough in a circular shape . stretch it a little bit at a time .

column1: brush oil on the dough .
column2: your pizza dough needs to be flattened with your hands into a circle . get a pastry brush from your kitchen drawer or use a spoon for oil . dip brush in oil and cover the dough like you are painting . cover the entire surface of your pizza . have and adult help you grate parmesan cheese with a grater to cover the surface ; you can also use cheese from a bag .

column1: brush oil on the dough .
column2: take bowl of herb oil and dip brush in . apply herb oil over dough by brushing gently . make sure to put a layer over whole circle of dough .

column1: brush oil on the dough .
column2: get a cooking brush . get cooking oil . using the brush , brush the oil onto the dough .

column1: add parmesan and tomato sauce .
column2: roll out the pizza dough . put parmesan cheese directly on top of the dough . then add the tomato sauce and spread it over the dough .

column1: add parmesan and tomato sauce .
column2: take pizza base on the plate . take some block of parmesan cheese . grade the parmesan cheese on top of pizza base . take tomato sauce to the middle of pizza base . spread the tomato sauce to cover the entire pizza base .

column1: add parmesan and tomato sauce .
column2: use the grater with the parmesan and spread evenly over the crust . spread the tomato sauce evenly around the entire crust all the way close to the edges . sprinkle the shredded mozzarella around all over the tomato sauce .

column1: add mozzarella cheese on top .
column2: add mozzarella cheese over the pizza . make sure to evenly distribute the cheese so that it covers all of the sauce .

column1: add mozzarella cheese on top .
column2: place the pizza on a pan or a circle pizza pan . bake .

column1: bake the pizza in the oven .
column2: place the pizza into the oven . bake at 550 degrees fahrenheit for 8 minutes .

column1: bake the pizza in the oven .
column2: turn the oven on to 500 degrees . wait until the oven beeps . place your pizza on a pizza pan . put oven mitts on and put the pizza in the oven , bake for 8 minutes .

column1: bake the pizza in the oven .
column2: turn the oven on to the desired temperature . wait for the oven to beep that its ready . put the pizza in the oven for the desired time . take the pizza out when the time is up .

column1: top with basil leaves .
column2: place some raw basil leaves on top of the hot pizza . use enough that everyone will have a least one leaf on each slice .

column1: top with basil leaves .
column2: get some fresh basil leaves . put the fresh basil leaves on top of the pizza .

column1: top with basil leaves .
column2: use an oven mitt to remove the pizza from the oven and place it on a cutting board . take several leaves of basil and place on top of the pizza .

column1: chop onions equivalent to the quantity of beef meat .
column2: take 1 onion on a chopping board . take the peel out of onion and cut it into 2 halves . take one half and carefully cut in to small pieces vertically . carefully turn the slices and cut horizontally in to small pieces . repeat the same with other half .

column1: chop onions equivalent to the quantity of beef meat .
column2: chop an onion in half . slice the onion into strips . turn the onion on the cutting board and cut a checkerboard pattern into it . remember to always practice safe knife use . gather all the chopped onion together .

column1: chop onions equivalent to the quantity of beef meat .
column2: gather a cutting board , knife , and lots of onions . using your knife and cutting board dice onions into small cubes .

column1: heat some oil in a deep pan and add chopped onions and fry till they turn brown .
column2: take a deep pan and add some oil . heat the oil in the pan for sometime . cut the onions in to small pieces .. . now add the cut onions in to the hot oil . fry the onions till they are brown .

column1: heat some oil in a deep pan and add chopped onions and fry till they turn brown .
column2: pour some oil into a pan . heat it until it 's hot - around 45 seconds . add the chopped onions all at once . be careful not to splash the oil as you add it . fry the onions until they turn brown .

column1: heat some oil in a deep pan and add chopped onions and fry till they turn brown .
column2: pour some oil into a pan . put the pan on the stove . turn the heat on to medium and get the oil hot . cut an onion into tiny pieces . put onion in hot oil and cook until it starts to turn brown .

column1: clean and chop 1 whole garlic .
column2: use the side of the knife to smash the garlic . be careful of the sharp edge ! peel off the outside part and throw it away .

column1: clean and chop 1 whole garlic .
column2: take out cutting board and wide knife . pick apart the pieces of garlic cloves . lay knife over garlic cloves . push down on the knife resting on the cloves . cut the smashed cloves into small pieces .

column1: clean and chop 1 whole garlic .
column2: press the side of your knife against a clove of garlic . place your hand on the flat part of the blade . stabilize the blade by holding on tight to the handle with your right hand . press the garlic under the knife until you hear a pop and remove the skin . chop and repeat until every clove in the head has been minced .

column1: stir and let onions fry till they are completely brown .
column2: place cut onions into a heated pan . stir onions in heated pan until brown .

column1: stir and let onions fry till they are completely brown .
column2: stir the onions as they cook . be sure to continue stirring them . be patient because it may take a long time . as the onions begin to brown , keep a close eye on them : you do n't want them to burn . once they are completely brown , you 're done !

column1: stir and let onions fry till they are completely brown .
column2: get a pot and some onions . chop the onions into small pieces and put it in the pot . put the fire level on medium . stir the onions every 3 - 5 minutes until completely brown . turn off stove and put pot to the side .

column1: once the onions are done add garlic and stir .
column2: the onions should start to look brown . once they look brown , add garlic to the pan . stir them up so they mix with the browned onions . make sure you only cook them for a short time . because they can become bitter .

column1: once the onions are done add garlic and stir .
column2: add oil in a big pan . then add onions in to the oil . stir the onion until it is golden brown . add garlic into the onions in the pan . and finally stir it well .

column1: once the onions are done add garlic and stir .
column2: chop up garlic cloves . when the onions are done , put in garlic coves . stir every 3 - 5 minutes until finished .

column1: add the diced beef meat to it and roast it .
column2: you cut the meat into small pieces . pour cut - up meat into heated pan . stir until the meat is brown .

column1: add the diced beef meat to it and roast it .
column2: add the diced meat to the pot . take a wooden spoon . move the beef around so that everything mixes . keep moving the meat around in the pan . until it is dark and roasted .

column1: add the diced beef meat to it and roast it .
column2: add the small cubes of meat to the pot . let the meat heat up and cook .

column1: add pepper cumin salt paprika red pepper powder stir everything and roast .
column2: add the following spices to pan — pepper , cumin , salt , paprika , red pepper powder . stir everything together well . cook in oven .

column1: add pepper cumin salt paprika red pepper powder stir everything and roast .
column2: add a pinch of pepper , cumin , salt , and red pepper powder to the cooking meat . add a small spoonful of paprika to the cooking meat and other spices . stir until spices are not lumped together .

column1: add pepper cumin salt paprika red pepper powder stir everything and roast .
column2: add the cumin . add the salt . add the paprika . add the red pepper powder . stir it all together and let it simmer .

column1: add a cup of tomato puree and cook stirring .
column2: measure one cup of tomato puree . add to pot . stir . cook while continuing to stir .

column1: add a cup of tomato puree and cook stirring .
column2: measure a cup of tomato puree into another container . pout measured tomato puree into pot with cooked meat .

column1: add a cup of tomato puree and cook stirring .
column2: the meat should be simmering now . while it 's hot , add the tomato puree . it should sizzle but do n't let that worry you . give it a good stir . cook the tomatoes .

column1: pour some warm water to it and cook until the meat becomes soft .
column2: take a kettle of boiling water . add the hot water to the boiling pot . be careful not to spill any hot liquid out of the pot . this should make the stew much thinner . cook it until the meat becomes soft .

column1: pour some warm water to it and cook until the meat becomes soft .
column2: take a kettle and add some water in to it . boil the water in the kettle till it whistles . carefully pour the boiled water in to the cooking bowl . mix the water in to the bowl of cooking meat . cook for sometime until the meat becomes soft .

column1: pour some warm water to it and cook until the meat becomes soft .
column2: put some warm water in a cup . pour the water into the pot . stir the pot gently . let the meat cook until the sauce becomes thick . stir again gently .

column1: melt some better in another small pan and add 3 tsp of flour to it and mix and roast until it browns .
column2: take out another small pan and place it on stove . put butter into pan and cook until melted . add 3 tsp flour to the butter and mix with a spoon . the mixture will be finished when it begins to turn brown .

column1: melt some better in another small pan and add 3 tsp of flour to it and mix and roast until it browns .
column2: put some butter in a pan . let the butter melt until it 's liquid . pour 3 tsp of flour into the butter and stir it very well . make sure you keep stirring it so that it combines with the butter . it 's done when it looks like a light - brown play - doh .

column1: melt some better in another small pan and add 3 tsp of flour to it and mix and roast until it browns .
column2: heat up lots of butter in frying pan on stove . add flour to butter . stir until clumpy . make butter dark . remove pan .

column1: add the roasted flour to the cooking meat mixture and mix well and cook for 10 minutes more .
column2: add the roasted flour to the pot of stew . it will start to make the stew thick over time . stir it up so that it mixes well . let it cook for 10 minutes more . you 'll notice that the flour has made the stew thicker .

column1: add the roasted flour to the cooking meat mixture and mix well and cook for 10 minutes more .
column2: add flour to pan with meat mixture . mix well . continue cooking for 10 more minutes . turn off oven . serve .

column1: add the roasted flour to the cooking meat mixture and mix well and cook for 10 minutes more .
column2: put flour in the pot where the meat is and stir with your spoon let cook in the pot . stir the flour and meat with your spoon . when it is bubbly on th stove it will be done . but make sure there is no lumps in the pot from the flour . take off stove put in your plate and enjoy .

column1: finely chop marjoram and add it to the goulash .
column2: place herbs on a cutting board . using a sharp knife , slice across all the herbs . then slice the opposite direction , like a checker board . repeat until the herbs are finely chopped . add to the goulash .

column1: finely chop marjoram and add it to the goulash .
column2: take a chopping board . take the marjoram . cut the marjoram in to small pieces with a knife . carefully take to cut marjoram . add it to goulash .

column1: finely chop marjoram and add it to the goulash .
column2: put the marjoram on the cutting board . put it in a little pile . cut it with the knife until it is in very small pieces ( you can go over it again and again with the knife if you need to ) . pick up the small pieces of marjoram and sprinkle into the pot of goulash . stir the goulash to make sure the marjoram is mixed in .

column1: plate some bread pour the goulash garnish with some chopped onions and serve .
column2: with a knife , slice 4 pieces of bread , put those pieces on one side of the plate . with a spoon , scoop up some goulash , and pour it on the other side of the plate , away from the bread . with a knife , chop up some onions not too big , but not too small . pick some onion , not all of it and gently place it on top of the goulash . enjoy !

column1: plate some bread pour the goulash garnish with some chopped onions and serve .
column2: put a few pieces of bread on a plate . pour the goulash on to plate . add some chopped onions on top . serve .

column1: plate some bread pour the goulash garnish with some chopped onions and serve .
column2: grab 3 slices of bread . place the bread slices on a plate . on same plate , pour the goulash garnish using a cooking spoon . cut onions in small slices and place on top of the garnish . serve the plate when done .
